title: TiMi Studio Group - Narrative Project Game Director
responsibilities: Award-winning TiMi Studio Group (Call of Duty Mobile, Pokémon Unite, Honor of Kings) seeks a versatile and experienced Game Director to take on the lead role in building the next blockbuster narrative-driven game for gaming communities around the world. As the Game Director of this AAA project, you will work closely with a Lead Writer to transform a critically acclaimed science fiction short story into a global IP. You will present innovative ideas to lead the project’s gameplay forward. You will also work closely with the core team and external production partners to spark enthusiasm and ensure clarity and efficiency throughout development. Responsibilities: - Set a high-level creative vision and product strategies, finding ways to connect on an emotional level with players, immersing themselves into the experience. - Lead the project’s gameplay and engagement systems - Manage relationships and collaboration with internal teams as well as external co-development production partners - Establish and maintain the quality bar for the design discipline across the organization. - Report to senior leadership regarding project status and product strategy, taking responsibility for internal gate reviews
qualifications: Qualifications: - 10+ years of experience in AAA game design, including background as Game Director / Creative Director on high-performing titles - Led a AAA project from early concept stage to launch (new IP is a plus) - Proven track record of collaborating with cross-functional teams across all levels of management. - Science fiction enthusiast What’s in it for you? - Create the next blockbuster game with ample resources and support: Create and deliver a unique, exciting experience to players around the world with the support of one of the most successful studio groups in the world in TiMi. - Develop for global audiences to make an impression on the entire industry: Join TiMi in making AAA games that are beloved by the biggest audiences worldwide, true global hits as popular in the western world as the eastern world.

title: TiMi Studio Group - Lead Narrative Project Writer
responsibilities: Award-winning TiMi Studio Group (Call of Duty Mobile, Pokémon Unite, Honor of Kings) seeks a versatile and experienced Lead Writer to take on a driver role in building the next blockbuster narrative-driven game for gaming communities around the world. As the Lead Writer of this AAA narrative-driven project, you will work with a Game Director closely to transform a short science fiction into a fantasy of a new IP. You will enrich the storylines and adapt to a narrative game format that players can connect emotionally and immerse themselves into the experience. You will also be the main creative mind to lead and supervise the collaboration with external production partners to deliver top-notch quality experiences that are unique and appeal to massive, global audiences. Responsibilities: - Transform a science fiction into a game fantasy - Enrich and rewrite the story to make sure it is in the format of a narrative-driven shooter game and can reach global audiences - Define world narrative elements for a new IP - Design a rich lore document from which production partners will create content for years to come - Create world building documentations containing the following elements, but not limit to: - Main Campaign story synopsis - Main Playable Characters and Antagonists biography - Important Non-Playable characters (NPCs) biography - World social and political elements
qualifications: Qualifications: - 5+ years of writing experience in the gaming industry; Previous experience in creative leadership role preferred - Deep understanding and familiarity with science fiction - Rich expertise of critical aspects of the narrative design development process, including concept design, campaign story development, character development, etc. - A highly creative, collaborative, and innovative spirit. - Excellent communication and cross-cultural communication skills What’s in it for you? - Create the next blockbuster game with ample resources and support: Create and deliver a unique and exciting experience to players around the world with the support of one of the most successful studios in the world in TiMi. - Develop for global audiences and make an impression on the entire industry: Join TiMi in making games as part of an ambitious, talented, and seasoned team.

title: Internal Control Manager
responsibilities: Responsibility: We are expanding our internal control Team globally and are seeking experienced Internal Control Managers to join our team. The new role will be based in Palo Alto or Los Angeles to meet the growing needs of Tencent overseas businesses. Risk areas covered by this role marketing activities, media expenses, PR spends, content and design, sponsorships, licensing business, as well as, privacy and data protection, compliance with regulations and policies, information security, business continuity, and process automation, among others. 1. Work independently but collaborate with our IC teams in Shenzhen / Singapore to perform risk assessments and advisory projects across diverse businesses covering financial, operational, IT and compliance risks. 2. Plan and scope internal control / advisory projects, execute project plans, facilitate business responses and action items. 3. Coordinate, lead or facilitate multiple stakeholders to agree on appropriate solutions and verify that risks are mitigated appropriately. We value creativity, insight, agile thinking, and sound business judgment.
qualifications: Basic qualifications - BA in Economics, Accounting, Engineering, Finance, IT or similar fields - 5+ years of experience with Internal Control, Auditing, or Consulting - Excellent written and verbal communication in English, additional language capabilities would be advantageous - Perform well as an individual contributor, quickly learn our business and build relationships with business stakeholders. - Able to understand complex business processes, deal with high degree of ambiguity and prioritize findings and recommendations in tune with our corporate strategy. - Good analytical skills, solid business judgment, strong communication skill, and the capability to influence the organization to the right results. - Demonstrate strong project management skills to coordinate internal controls and business resources and multiple projects at once.

title: Senior Infrastructure Operations Engineer

We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap, and execution. We are currently seeking a passionate IT Infrastructure Architect / Engineer to create a world-class collaboration experience for everyone at Tencent Overseas. Reporting to the Director of Employee Experience, you’ll be responsible for designing and building a highly available content, communications, and collaboration environment that lets employees communicate and collaborate easily and intuitively regardless of where or what time zones they’re in. You will be performing technical planning, architecture development, and modification of specifications. Develops specifications for new IT infrastructure products and service offerings. Assesses the compatibility and integration of products or services proposed as standards to ensure an integrated architecture across interdependent technologies. Begins to influence the strategies. Makes decisions on moderately complex to complex issues regarding technical approach for project components, and work is performed without direction. Exercises considerable latitude in determining objectives and approaches to assignments. Primary Duties & Responsibilities: - Design, planning, scoping, assessment, testing, and technical documentation for the implementation, and support of Office 365 and all its related core technologies including Active Directory, Cloud Identities, Exchange, Teams, ADFS, AAD Connect, and EMS - Perform independent high-level design of enterprise application systems. Establishes the basic structure of the system and defines essential core design features and elements that provide the framework to ensure that solutions will perform satisfactorily regarding security, maintainability, and scalability - Review and design current and future systems and services deployed in Azure, AWS, Tencent Cloud, and other cloud environments. Analyze, review, and implement opportunities for improvement in information systems, and approaches to mitigate risks, resolve security alerts and preempt possible adverse outcomes of identified weaknesses - Work with internal and external partners, infrastructure engineers, and our hardware vendors to design and develop a roadmap for the evolution of our infrastructure platform strategy. Participate in the development and regular testing of Disaster Recovery and Business Continuity solutions. - Contribute to the continuous improvement of IT infrastructure through ITIL service delivery practices. Resolve system emergencies with a significant impact on the integrity of user data and systems - Establish software / hardware standards and systems policies and procedures - Engage in long-term strategic planning regarding systems development and integration - Conceptualize and implement systems within broad technical or structural frameworks - Perform capacity planning for IT infrastructure system configuration, software services, network services, load distribution, and service interrelationships among infrastructure systems - Act as a technical expert or lead for local IT infrastructure system administration - Act as project leader on large-scale infrastructure projects in which strong technical, directional, and personal leadership is necessary; assign and oversee the work of other system administrators as needed
qualifications: Who we are looking for: - Self-motivated, articulate, and passionate to deliver the best result and achieve the highest customer satisfaction. Quick learner. - Love satisfying customers with a state of art cloud solutions, realizing ideas, building services, and unlocking the potential of new technology! - Collaborative, independent, insistent, flexible, and open-minded. And you see no conflict in any of these things - Knowledgeable, resourceful, and show initiative. You always keep the customer’s objectives in mind - Positive by nature, a great team player, and both dependable and autonomous - Customer-oriented and could work at a very fast pace Qualifications: - BS / MS in Computer Science, Engineering, or 8 years of relevant experience - 5+ years in IT operations including Office 365, Active Directory, Exchange, Web Servers, Load Balancers, Relational / Non-relational Databases, Messaging Systems, and Storage Solutions - 3+ years coding / scripting in at least 1 high-level programming language - Python, Go, Rust, etc. - Deep understanding of Linux operation system and TCP / IP fundamentals. Prior experience supporting a container orchestration platform in production, preferably Kubernetes - Expertise with at least 1 major cloud service provider- Azure, AWS, Tencent Cloud - Proficient in modern CI / CD techniques, DevOps, and Infrastructure as Code(IaC) - Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skills. title: Sr. Site Reliability Engineer(Tech Ops)
responsibilities: Description: You are to work with a cross-functional team, multi-location team, and a one of a kind project. With the developer, live ops, infrastructure, data science, and analytics team in the tech side, you will also work with business teams such as publishing to deliver the latest game content and best game experience to players worldwide. You will engage in and improve the whole lifecycle of services, from designing, analyzing to deployment and optimization. You are going to work on DevOps and building CI / CD pipelines. The Site Reliability Engineer is responsible for monitoring and dash-boarding for game observability and ensuring the game is reliable, scalable, and secure. The team is expanding right now, with many challenges and opportunities to unfold and excel at your full potential. -We have two tracks of the role with focus on one of the following: 1. Live Ops 2. Big Data Engineering -1. Live Ops Track Responsibility Support services between development and operations by applying a software engineering mindset to system administration topics to measure and monitor availability, latency, and overall system health; Allocate time to operations / on-call duties and developing systems and software that help increase site reliability and performance; Build and operate cloud infrastructure environments and platforms; Occasional technical coach and mentorship session with junior engineers in the lab. -2. Big Data Engineering Responsibility Focused on the development and integration of the Data Platform; Responsible for tracking, troubleshooting, and optimizing the implementation of challenging problems at the database level; Responsible for the construction planning, development, and implementation of the corresponding supporting system for database management; Responsible for the research and application of new technologies in the field of database storage; Build components that glue the pipeline and integrate with 3rd parties and open source systems such as Spark and Hadoop; Plan, develop, and maintain massively scaled systems that handle billions of messages each day.
qualifications: -Minimal Requirements BS. or advanced degrees in the fields of Computer Science or Software Engineering, or equivalent; 3+ years’ experience of at least one primary cloud provider; 3+ years’ experience in Linux or similar operation systems; 3+ years’ experience at least one of the following languages: C, C++, Java, Python, or Go; Experience with containers and orchestration frameworks (Docker, Mesos); Experience with source code management and version control (Git / GitHub / GitLab); Experience with modern CI / CD tools and techniques; Solid understanding of networking concepts, technologies, and protocols (TCP / IP, IPSec, HTTP, FTP, DHCP, and DNS). -In addition above, for Big Data Track specifically: Proficient in database configuration, backup, optimization, monitoring and fault diagnosis of MySQL, Redis, ES, HDFS and Kafka. -Desirable Bilingual in Mandarin and English; Expertise in designing, analyzing, and troubleshooting large-scale distributed systems; Problem-solving driven. Strong ability to debug, optimize code, and automate routine tasks; Experience of operating worldwide scale games or production systems alongside monitoring and telemetry practices; The successful candidate will have demonstrable experience working in a multicultural environment.

Minimal 10 year’s experience of C / C++ programming. Have implemented at least one of other languages, such as Java and JavaScript. Or have experience of implementing a language’s virtual machine. 3. Have abundant experience of debugging and optimization, including both source code optimization and compiler optimizations, virtual machine optimizations like OpenJDK. Experienced in using performance measuring tools like Perf. Experience in locating and fixing performance issues. 4. Have deep understanding of Operating System, and Linux is a must. Deep understanding of memory management, task scheduling, etc. Deep understanding of the life cycle of a process, from start to end, and the working process of dynamic libraries, memory and CPU. 5. Understand CPU architecture, especially register files, pipeline, cache hierarchy, virtual memory management. 6. Experience of compiler optimizations to unleash the CPU performance by leveraging ISA, pipelines, caches, vector registers, and the likes. 7. 10 years of compiler development experience, including front end, middle end and back-end optimizations. This includes but not limited to expression optimizations, loop optimizations, IPO, registration allocation, instruction scheduling. Have experience of at least two industry compilers, such as GCC, LLVM, Open64 and Maple.

qualifications: Required Skills: - 5+ years’ experience in game design, including senior or lead experience - Strong critical thinking and analytical skills. - Design and implement fully realized ambient character behaviors and interactions that bring depth, texture, and believability to a living, breathing world - Craft ambient content systems that create memorable storytelling moments in a wide emotional range, from tragic to heartfelt, from frightening to cathartic, from thrilling to somber. - Help drive the vision for zones and theming of game systems - Evaluate and implement story concepts, step by step gameplay, ecosystems, character concepts, cinematics, and dialog - Partner closely with other disciplines to ensure that content complements narrative, art, technical and design decisions - Demonstrate versatile game design skills including documentation, planning, tuning, pacing, systems, rewards, and scripting Preferred Qualifications - Expert in establishing high-level ecologies, ecosystems, factions, and AI archetypes - Experience with modern game engines and visual scripting (Unreal, Unity, etc. ) - A strong technical implementation background - A passion for mentoring designers - Shipped at least one AAA open world game from inception to finish - Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience

title: Senior IT Project Manager - Enterprise Applications
responsibilities: Position Overview: Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future ready, global IT platforms, applications and services. We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap and execution. Satisfying our internal / external customers and becoming a world class global IT team are our top aspirations. We are currently seeking a passionate Sr IT PM in enterprise applications, with primary focus on HR, finance, procurement, asset management areas, with future extension to marketing and sales. This position will be based in Palo Alto, CA and report to Director of IT Enterprise Apps. Working closely with our Overseas IT, HQ IT, HR, finance and various business teams, this role will play a critical leadership role to design, build and operate world class enterprise applications with simple, sleek, cohesive digital employee experience. We believe this is a critical component to enable Tencent’s rapid employee and business growth in Overseas market, including North and South America, Europe, Middle East and Asia (Except Greater China). Primary Responsibilities - Project manage the Overseas HCM, procurement, asset management evaluation, design, build and ongoing operations, with possible extension to finance, Marketing & Sales. - Project manage the balance of agile, standardized implementation to satisfy rapid business growth, with integration with HQ business processes and management. - Project manage the rational decision & balance between SaaS adoption and customized development. - Project manage global roll out with global standardization and local adaptation. - Closely collaborate with various business and IT teams in America, Europe and Asia, as well HQ teams in China, align the needs and solutions, influence / drive the necessary changes to achieve timely results. - Define and deliver analytics / metrics to drive and measure the adoption and customer satisfaction. - Develop a continuous improvement program focused on business value, process optimization, cost avoidance, cost reductions and IT “Speed to Market. ”
qualifications: Who we are looking for: - Self-motivated, articulate, passionate to deliver the best result and achieve the highest customer satisfaction. Quick learner. - Love satisfying customers with a state of art cloud solutions, realizing ideas, building services, and unlocking the potential of new technology! - Collaborative, independent, insistent, flexible, and open minded. And you see no conflict in any of these things. - Knowledgeable, resourceful and show initiative. You always keep the customer’s objectives in mind. - Positive by nature, a great team player, and both dependable and autonomous. - Customer oriented and could work at a very fast pace. Qualifications: - 10+ years of project management working experience in IT enterprise applications, with multiple demonstrable HR, finance implementations using leading SaaS services and on prem solutions, such as Workday, SuccessFactors, ServiceNow etc. Experience in global Internet and high-tech companies are strongly preferred. - Demonstratable results in delivering modern, integrated, easy to use, innovative enterprise IT applications, with strong user adoption. - Demonstratable experience leading customization on top of SaaS enterprise IT applications, as well as integration with corporate systems. - Demonstrable knowledge of IT compliance and global regulations in data security, cyber security, and privacy, with implementation of SaaS solutions. - Bilingual (English, Chinese) preferred but not required. - Bachelors degree. MS / MBA preferred.

title: Principal Product Manager and Team Lead – Cloud Enabled Studio Management Platform
responsibilities: Position Overview: Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future ready, global IT platforms, applications and services. We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap and execution. Satisfying our internal / external customers and becoming a world class global IT team are our top aspirations. Cloud Center of Excellence team is part of Tencent Oversea IT. The team will laser focus on providing infrastructure, best practice to enable Tencent’s tens oversea game studios. The team will partner with game studios to define and deliver the best cloud and on-premise infrastructure for both game production and game runtime workloads. We are seeking a Principal Product Manager and Team Lead with extensive cloud and on prem product design / implementation experience on at least one of the major public cloud platforms, plus full stack design and delivery skills. Duties and Responsibilities: This principal role will closely work with our internal IT and Tencent cloud product teams, as well 3rd party cloud providers to design the best global cloud architecture and solution, to enable rapid employee and business growth in Overseas market (outside China). At the same time, this role will also support the studio’s legacy infrastructure and its evolution to the cloud. Our customers include internal or acquired gaming studios, innovative offices / workplaces, various business groups and external customers. The work scope will include understanding the internal customers’ business requirements, collecting the technical requirements, designing the product roadmap and features, developing reference architecture and prototypes based on leading industry best practice, leading implementations and deployments for global locations, as well as issue troubleshooting when necessary. Having worked extensively as a senior role, the right candidate will excel at designing flexible, scalable, secure, cost effective global cloud first (+ on prem or hybrid cloud in some cases) solutions, as well as understanding the unique and common needs of customer, influence / convince / drive the customer adoption of our global IT platform and solutions. He / she will collaboratively define prioritized implementation plans, ensure that the customer's own engineering and business teams consider all key cloud related critical path actions (such as access controls, private / public network separation, data replication / recovery zones, security, code control etc. ), and define the necessary functional test and integration requirements. He / she will have led the successful delivery completion of multiple multi availability zone, cross region, PaaS, IaaS based implementations, and in the delivery of clear standards, guidelines, documentation to stakeholder groups. Based in Palo Alto, CA or Seattle, WA, this person will work closely with the global Overseas IT team, HQ team to enable / deliver our global IT project portfolio.
qualifications: Who we are looking for: - Self-motivated, articulate, passionate to deliver the best result and achieve the highest customer satisfaction. Quick learner. - Love satisfying customers with a state of art cloud solutions, realizing ideas, building services, and unlocking the potential of new technology! - Collaborative, independent, insistent, flexible, and open minded. And you see no conflict in any of these things. - Knowledgeable, resourceful and show initiative. You always keep the customer’s objectives in mind. - Positive by nature, a great team player, and both dependable and autonomous. - Customer oriented, and could work at a very fast pace; Requirements - Must have 5+ years extensive cloud and on prem engineering experience in leading Internet or high-tech companies. Global working experience a big plus. - Must have 3+ years engineering experience with one of the following leading cloud solutions: Amazon AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud, and Tencent Cloud. Experience in multi-cloud a big plus. - Must have experience to lead cloud product and architect team. Knows how to lead a team, break down tasks, and steer the execution. - Experience to lead outsourcing R&D team. - Must understand the legacy infrastructure technologies, such as network, servers and other related technology. - Must have experience on helping business migrating from legacy infrastructure to cloud. - Proficient in leading the design and implementation of a flexible, scalable, secure, global cloud solution, with comprehensive Cyber security, data security, privacy management that are compliant with global and local regulations. - Can effectively collect, synthesize customer (for example internal and acquired game studios) needs and challenges, design / lead the establishment of global IT foundation architecture and solutions. - Can develop relationships with China based Tencent HQ product / IT teams and overseas business / IT teams, leverage our products where ever fit. Become a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in Tencent products like Tencent Cloud. - Can lead initiatives to integrate third party products and services to achieve design goals. - Can act as a strong influencer / driver, can become a trusted advisor to customers to drive the customer adoption of a global IT platform and solution. - Can define global cloud / infrastructure / architecture standards / guidelines. - Bachelor’s degree (or higher), Computer Science, Mathematics, or related science or engineering major - Lateral and logical troubleshooting, follow-through and problem-solving skills, resourcefulness, attention to detail, and communication skills, both verbal and written - Bilingual preferred (English, Chinese) A big plus if you have: - One or two public cloud professional SA certificates - Real-work cloud product design and architecture experience - Global network design experience, cloud exchange experience - Cloud landing zone, IaC, PaC, and Terraform experience - Cloud based identity experience - Cloud log, backup, and audit experience - Cloud NOC and SOC experience - Cloud governance experience, logging and auditing experience - Programing and scripting experience (Java, Python, Shell) - IDC and Private Cloud experience (power, cooling, network, servers, storage, hybrid connection)

Ability to communicate / collaborate with other researchers / engineers. Ability to think out of box.

title: IEG Global HR Intern
responsibilities: During this internship, you will join the Career Development System Optimization Project to streamline existing process and improve efficiency. Work location: Palo Alto, CA Preferred but could be open to remote. Provide recommendations and implement finings in one of the key areas of HR (recruiting / promotion / training) etc. - Support the localization of relevant materials and customize content to help employees around the globe to better understand career development system - Support the communication campaign for employees including newsletters, posters, communication emails, short video clips, long form articles and etc. - Design and promote online and offline employee engagement events - Integrate various culture-related materials from the headquarter and the regional offices, and spread those via internal portals and channels - Support data analysis for talent development and cultural development programs - Support Diversity, Equity & Inclusion projects
qualifications: Requirements and Key Competencies - Bachelor or Master student in HR or Business related major - Fluent in English and Mandarin, both verbally and written - Analytical thinking and research skill - Innovative and always looking for ways to improve - Love to learn and eager to explore new things - Have big picture and good at learning / utilizing resources - Proactive and willing to communicate and interact with internal customers to understand their needs - Strong collaboration skill and team spirit During the internship, you will be able to … - Understand how a world class tech company design and structure HR philosophy - Learn how to conduct the research and provide best practice recommendations to align with market practice - Enhance your problem solving and systematic thinking ability - Turn knowledge and concepts into experiences - Carry out Collaboration and project management skill through cross-team interaction

title: Senior HR Business Partner - Gaming
responsibilities: In the era of technology disruptions sheerly changing how the world works, digitalization transforms the way of working, how we social with others and on many other facets, casting a meaningful impact positively to all. Tencent as an internet company, we use technology enriches the lives of internet users, and assist the digital upgrade of enterprises, at Tencent, we adhere to the mission we believe, embed it into our day to day work - “Value for Users, Tech for Good”. At Tencent, we continue to significant grow our business, eyes on the global expansion of our footprint, along with the belief of Employees are Tencent’s most valuable assets in mind, we are committed to build your skills, grow your career, to enjoy the sterling experience, provide opportunities to build your own legend in the digital world and society. We are looking for a Senior HR Business Partner for our Interactive Entertainment Group / Tencent Games Global. You will have the chance to support the rapid growth of our business in North America region, as well as to provide HR inputs to our investment companies. What you will do in day to day life - - Establish and maintain a strong relationship with business leaders to identify people-related problems or potential and provide professional support in the design and execution of HR related strategy, especially support the Recruitment at the beginning - Study and deeply understand the supported business and organization / team health, and evaluate the HR need from the organization and team perspective, in particular help the North America team build its operating model and team culture - Work together closely with COE teams and HR Operation team in implementing the HR policies, systems, regulations, and key HR projects, to ensure the ultimate goal, the long-term success of the business - Analyze the current people-related problems and work together with COEs to provide HR solutions, and utilize resources from different channels to implement the solutions and solve the problems - Support the leaders to improve the people management skills, pay special attention to the introduction and retention of key talents, ensure the smooth communication and feedback between leaders and employees - Partner with the management team to develop employees, build teams, improve organization culture, and contribute to the success of the business - Provide HR inputs to our investment companies in North America region and build a HR community for best practices sharing with the HR team from our investment companies
qualifications: - Bachelor’s degree or above in Human Resource or related major. - Related experience is required in supporting business from various HR functions (Bachelor’s degree with 10+ years’ experience in Human Resource, especially in Training, Org Design or Coaching; Master’s degree with 8+ years’ related experience) - Creative, with growth mindset and strong learning agility - Excellent interpersonal and communication skills - Proactive to utilize resources to deliver results and reach the goal - Strong time management skills, and able to conduct multi tasks under the fast-paced environment - Comfortable to solve the complex problem under ambiguity - Able to insist on integrity under pressure, and provide professional HR advice and suggestions for others - Collaborative and easy to work with others - Customer-oriented and passionate about helping others - Gaming / Entertainment / High-tech related Industry experience is a big plus

title: Senior Product Manager - Astra
responsibilities: Now, we are seeking for a Senior Product(ion) Manager as our products R&D team leader. You will play a leading role in managing pipelines in North America and Europe. title: Senior Workday Analyst（HCM / Recruiting / Compensation / Absence）
responsibilities: Position Overview: Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future ready, global IT platforms, applications and services. We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap and execution. Satisfying our internal / external customers and becoming a world class global IT team are our top aspirations. We are currently seeking a passionate Sr IT Analyst, with primary focus in HR HCM (Human Capital Management), procurement, asset management areas. This position can be based in Palo Alto, CA USA, Singapore or Amsterdam, Netherland and report to IT Director, Enterprise Apps. Working closely with our Overseas IT, China HQ HR business teams, this role will play a critical leadership role to design, build and operate world class HCM application with simple, sleek, cohesive digital employee experience. We believe this is a critical component to enable Tencent’s rapid employee and business growth in Overseas market, including North and South America, Europe, Middle East and Asia (Except Greater China). Primary Responsibilities - Act as domain expert in both HR SaaS (Workday) and HR business process. - Gather HR business requirements, analyze, provide conceptual and detail design to meet business needs, performing necessary HR SaaS configurations, write detail specifications for development, test and manage the rollout of the solution. - Perform alignment of business needs with standard SaaS capabilities, identify and address gaps either through transformation or possible customization. - Prepare detailed estimates and test plans based on Functional requirements - Analyze, design, document, and test software modifications to existing processes / configurations, reports, forms, extensions, and interfaces in the production environment - Design new interfaces, reports, enhancements as needed - Work closely with business partners to understand business processes, goals and gaps. - Facilitate review sessions with functional owners, subject matter experts and end-user representatives - Provide Solutions options for the business to consider, along with pros and cons for each option and recommendation - Drive the design, configuration and deployment of new projects & system enhancements - Participate in the change management and go live support processes.
qualifications: Who we are looking for: - Self-motivated, articulate, passionate to deliver the best result and achieve the highest customer satisfaction. And you see no conflict in any of these things. - Knowledgeable, resourceful and show initiative. You always keep the customer’s objectives in mind. - Positive by nature, a great team player, and both dependable and autonomous. - Customer oriented and could work at a very fast pace. Qualifications: - 3+ Years Workday HCM development, configuration, implementation and support experience. - Experience in at least in 5 HCM modules such as Core, Absence management, Recruiting, Compensation, Talent management, Performance, Benefits, Analytics, Calculated fields, integration such as Workday Studio. - Experience with the full lifecycle of both implementations and upgrades. - Experience in providing HCM SaaS ongoing Support. - Work collaboratively in a small, cross-functional team. - Excellent analytical, organizational and problem solving skills. - Motivated to continually learn while maintaining a positive attitude. - Ability to adapt quickly to change. - Demonstrate a strong work ethic. - Strong communication (oral and written) and interpersonal skills required to interact with colleagues and internal customers. - Ability to work effectively with others who are in remote locations and varying time zones. - Committed to the success of the team and the company. Sees success of team as a reflection of self. - Owns assign tasks and drives to a conclusion, keeps team informed of progress and challenges. - Experience in integration with other systems (Payroll systems) or Workday Payroll experience. - Bilingual (English, Chinese) preferred but not required. - Bachelors degree. MS / MBA preferred.

title: TiMi F1 Montreal – Senior Technical Animator
responsibilities: Award-winning TiMi Studio Group seeks a Senior Technical Animator to develop a AAA, open-world game based on a new IP. The project will be released on multiple platforms using Unreal’s latest technology. As a Senior Technical Animator, your role will be to develop content creation pipelines and features that support our animation direction. TiMi Montreal is a new studio within TiMi Studio Group, a subsidiary of Tencent Games. We are passionate about creating compelling worlds for players to explore for years to come. Are you looking to push the boundaries of what games can achieve visually? Are you passionate about the combination of art and technology? Then, come join us in our ambitious endeavor. What will you do? The Senior Technical Animator works in collaboration with the Animation Director, Technical Animation Director and Programmers to define and create the pipelines needed to produce high quality animation content. They offer guidelines and support for a team of animators, identifying technological improvements that maximize quality, performance and efficiency. They are comfortable working in a highly collaborative and innovative environment. Develop scalable animation content production pipeline and tools that support our creative vision Establish rules and guidelines for animation content production Produce visual benchmarks that push technology forward and maximize quality Collaborate with programming team to guide feature development Support a team of animators to build content efficiently and consistently Define performance budgets for specific components of the game Profile and optimize performance on console / PC Write and maintain technical documentation Develop robust test plans in collaboration with QA team
qualifications: What we’re looking for? At least six years of professional AAA game development experience At least two AAA open world titles shipped in the current generation of consoles Strong technical proficiency with game development tools and technology Mastery of Motion Builder, Maya and 3DS Max Excellent understanding of animation content production, integration and validation Team player, highly collaborative and results oriented Good communication and presentation skills Autonomous and proactive to develop highly efficient solutions Curious about learning and implementing new technologies based on industry trends Experience developing in and extending Unreal Engine 4 a plus What is in it for you? Create AAA multi-platform games with ample resources and support: Bring incredible game ideas to players around the world with the support of one of the most successful studios in the world. TiMi has developed some of the most popular games worldwide and is looking for talented individuals to join it in making another major hit. Develop for global audiences and make an impression on the entire industry: Join TiMi in making games as part of an ambitious, talented, and seasoned team. Create new worlds for players to explore, experience and enjoy: Join a team who cares about innovation and wants to delight players with new creative game design for open world experiences. Help create the next great game world for players to immerse in for decades to come.

title: Narrative intern
responsibilities: As a Narrative Intern at TENCENT, you will support the chief narrative designer and help coordinate between them and the core team. Part administrative assistant, part creative, you will support the vision established by the chief narrative designer and the directors by participating in the realization of the narrative goals of the game. In your coordinator aspect, you’ll be placed to have a unique view of the development of the project, and as a burgeoning creative, you’ll get tasks and direct support from the chief narrative designer. What you’ll do: Partner with the chief narrative designer to understand the overall game vision. Be a key link between HQ and the global narrative team. This means being available for critical meetings, taking excellent notes, and ensuring that all parties have a good understanding of what is needed and expected of them. Create and maintain narrative documentation. Brainstorm and research ideas and discuss your findings with collaborative teams. Work with other writers, designers, and artists to develop consistent content (plot, setting, characters, barks, dialogue, events, lore, item descriptions, menu text, tutorials, etc. ). Write, rewrite, proofread, polish (and repeat). Revise your work to reflect comments from interdependent teams and changes to gameplay. Help with marketing or community teams, on a case-by-case basis. Help new members navigate the team structure and production pipeline.
qualifications: Qualifications: Speak and write perfect English and Mandarin. A highly creative, collaborate, and innovative spirit. Curiosity, flexibility, and plenty of resourcefulness. Excellent organizational, communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills. Ability to adapt to feedback. A desire to work in games and learn how to tell the best story we can. What we need CV A variety of samples of your best work (attach files or send a link to a portfolio). Whatever else HR needs.

title: Senior Software Engineer - Backend (Cloud)
responsibilities: Position Overview: We are seeking a Senior Software Engineer with extensive cloud experience to design and develop innovative services / solutions on the cloud for Tencent overseas game studios. Duties and Responsibilities: As a Senior Software Engineer, you will work in the agile team, adopt to test-driven development methodologies to continuously deliver services / solutions that meet fast growing business requirements. You will be able to use cutting-edge technologies to resolve most challengeable requirements on mixed multi-cloud environment. Our internal customers include internal or acquired gaming studios. The work scope will include understanding the internal customers’ business requirements, collecting the technical requirements, developing reference architecture and prototypes based on leading industry best practice, leading implementation and deployment for global locations, as well as issue troubleshooting when necessary. Based in Palo Alto, CA, this person will work closely with the global IT team, HQ teams.
qualifications: Who we are looking for: - A quick learner - A positive, self-motivated, and passionate person - Independent, insistent, and open minded - A great team player, and both dependable and autonomous - Customer oriented and could work at a very fast pace Requirements - 3+ years of enterprise software design and development experience - 3+ years of experience on either Python, Java, C#, Java or C++ - Solid understanding of OO design - Excellent problem-solving skills - Deep understanding of agile software development methodologies - Rich experience on test-driven development - 3+ experience on either AWS, Azure or GCP etc. cloud platforms - Bachelor’s degree (or higher), Computer Science, Mathematics, or related science or engineering major Nice to have: - Frontend design and development experience - Network Security knowledge and experience - Bilingual preferred (English, Chinese). Excellent written and verbal communication skills and be able to adjust style to match different audiences About Tencent Overseas IT and Cloud CoE: Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future ready, global IT platforms, applications, and services. We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap, and execution. Satisfying our internal / external customers and becoming a world class global IT team are our top aspirations. Cloud Center of Excellence team is part of Tencent Oversea IT. The team will laser focus on providing infrastructure, best practice to enable Tencent’s tens oversea game studios. The team will partner with game studios to define and deliver the best cloud and on-premises infrastructure for both game production and game runtime workloads. You will work for our strategic Cloud-enable Studio project which aims to transform the game studios from traditional on-premises environment to next generation distributed and remote accessible virtual studio empowered by the latest cloud technology.

title: Senior / Principal Character Technical Art Director
responsibilities: About Us Founded in 2008, Lightspeed & Quantum Studios is an in-house studio of Tencent Games with strong global presence. In addition to developing our own leading titles, we also partner with and invest in exceptional companies across PC & mobile games, digital media, and eSports, such as: Epic Games, Riot Games, Crafton and many more, providing service in over 200 countries / regions and offering high-quality gaming experiences to hundreds of millions of users worldwide. Under Lightspeed and Quantum, Art center makes up of many top game industry veterans as well as young and inspiring talents. We work on all of Lightspeed's creative projects with artists from technical art, concept art, 3D modeling, cinematics, comics, and more. With a profound love for games, Art Center is committed to exploring how the latest, cutting-edge technology can be applied to the artistic projects we oversee. We do our utmost to create future-oriented products, improving the visual quality of our studio's games. Lightspeed's Art Center is currently looking for talented and enthusiastic Senior Technical art Director and Character TD to work with our most exciting overseas projects based in LA, Vancouver and Toronto, focusing on creating a AAA open world console game for the Western market . The ideal candidate will have a strong passion for games and supporting artists and animators in delivering stunning real time visuals for our players. Join our team of industry veterans and help shape a world class team that embraces a culture of respect, diversity, and inclusion. Responsibilities - The tasks of this position will relate mainly to charcter rigging, deformation, muscle, hair and clothe. - Providing general support for Art team and Design team. - Help setting up pipelines and writing tools to support them.
qualifications: Qualifications - A relevant degree or professional experience in the game industry as a Character TD. - Over 5 years of AAA production experience, and at least one AAA title credited and shipped. - An online portfolio showing relevant examples of your work. SKILLS - Advanced skill in skinning and rigging using Maya to deliver complex rig / tool set. - Multiple content development experiences (can be modeling, animation, shader, and VFX) - Good understanding of Unreal / Unity and related tools. - Strong artistic skills and working knowledge of 3D art production. - Good understanding of Python tool and pipeline development. - Communicates and collaborates effectively with the development team. - Strong problem solving and trouble-shooting skills. - Must be flexible and comfortable with prototyping and quick iteration. - An adaptable and continuous learner. - Fluent, In-depth handling Technical and Artistic of IK / FK rigging and skin weight skill. PLUSES - Experience in other scripting and programming languages (Python, Javascript, C++, etc. ). - Familiarity working and developing in a multi-platform, multi-project environment. - Understanding of developing pipelines and creating efficient user interfaces.

Strong teamwork ability, learning ability, and team spirit.

As a Lead Gameplay Designer, you will: - Be the main person and point of contact for all things related to game mechanics, gameplay features, and gameplay system designs - Help build and lead the gameplay design team - Communicate design functionality and vision through presentations, prototyping, and design documentation - Collaborate with design leads to help realize and further develop the vision of the game - Collaborate with the leads of the different dev departments to integrate designs of features and mechanics - Take a holistic approach to design rules and experiences with input and consideration from a multi-faceted team of contributors, including Tech, UX, Art disciplines, etc. - Communicate the vision of the game to the game mechanics design team and be able to break down and translate that vision into tangible tasks on a regular basis - Exercise production skills to help set priorities and tasks for the gameplay mechanics design team and to deliver on those goals - Create and maintain design documentation that will serve as the guide to everyone throughout the entire dev team - Help develop in-game prototypes of gameplay systems and features and evaluate their performance - Adapt to technical and production constraints, and be willing to iterate on your designs as often as needed - Be an integral part of realizing solutions to fix bugs and problems within the implemented systems - Follow up on features pre and post launch to help improve, add, or remove components - Combine passion, skill and expertise to continually raise the design bar

responsibilities: 1. 负责腾讯云用户增长相关的产品、平台的Web前端研发工作。包括但不限于腾讯云官网、控制台、社区内活动页和相应管理Web平台 2. 和产品团队、UI设计以及后台开发人员合作，深度负责和参与上述产品和平台的需求故事开发 3. 负责高质量的前端设计和编码，不断迭代重构，保持良好的代码结构 4. 进行技术预研，共同协作完善团队前端框架及工具，将业界主流前端新技术、新框架等在项目中落地，并进行技术分享
qualifications: 1. 本科以上学历，3年以上Web前端开发工作经验； 2. 负责过web前端项目，熟悉W3C标准，精通JavaScript；熟悉主流JavaScript框架和库，精通至少一种MVVM框架（如angularjs、reactjs、vuejs），有框架优化能力； 3. 掌握HTTP(S)协议，了解前端常用的构建工具，grunt、gulp或者webpack；熟悉git，有良好的代码习惯，对前端开发规范有一定了解； 4. 对前端新技术有敏锐的洞察力，学习能力强，能快速掌握新技术； 5. 对web性能优化、安全有一定的见解和相关实践；注重用户体验，有较好的产品意识； 6. 工作踏实认真、仔细、责任心强，具备良好的学习能力、自我管理能力、热情敬业； 7. 具备Node. js开发经验者优先 注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗位

qualifications: 1. 本科及以上, 财务，统计，数学相关专业优先考虑，3年以上数据分析相关工作经验； 2. 精通SQL，熟练常见统计分析软件（python,R,Tableau），会一种或几种脚本语言； 3. 良好的沟通表达能力，跨团队协作能力； 4. 具有较强的规划、策略分析能力，思维清晰，条理性强； 5. 对数据敏感，具有优秀的数据分析能力和解读能力，对数据监控、风险预警、数据化运营具有独到的见解； 注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗

title: 48377-Z世代新动作射击手游-UE4技术负责人(NR2)

qualifications: 1、本科以上学历，8年以上游戏开发经验,3年以上主程或技术负责人经验；有中大型UE4项目经验，至少深度参与过一款UE4项目； 2、扎实掌握C++语言，掌握至少一种shader language（HLSL / GLSL / METAL SL等）； 3、对UE4 / UE5有较深入研究者优先，了解其关键技术实现原理，熟悉UE游戏开发流程，至少深入理解UE引擎图形渲染、网络、物理、动画、AI等某一个模块的实现机制，对UE跨平台开发有一定认知和经验； 4、擅长Gameplay框架设计，并且能持续优化框架、流程以及工具，提升玩法游戏表现力和开发效率； 5、具有管理者的开放的思维，出色的领导力和自驱力，能进行高效沟通协调、资源整合，快速推进方案落地，并且关领域内的技术发展现状，及时更新，具备适应变化和快速决策的能力，对技术有极客精神； 6、有3D TPS射击 / 动作类游戏玩法开发经验者优先。

title: 24548-美术概念设计师

qualifications: 1. 本科以上学历，相关美术专业院校毕业，5年以上主题乐园、动画或电影美术设计相关经验，美术功底扎实，擅长多种风格表现及绘画技法。 2. 具有线下实景娱乐项目开发经验，如：大型主题乐园、沉浸式演绎项目、室内游乐项目等从0-1的开发经验，项目数量不低于5个，有一定的管理经验。 3. 有丰富的想象力和创造力，同时具备实景概念美术设计及影视美术设计经验者优先考虑。 4. 熟练使用各类绘画软件。 5. 对线下娱乐体验业务富有热情，较强的自驱能力和学习能力，具备优秀的沟通协调及跨团队协作能力。

title: 45324-SSV-行业经营分析师（北京 / 深圳）
responsibilities: 1、 能根据部门战略发展的方向，洞察需求，负责从0到1的制定部门战略规划，运营策略和规则，并搭建经营管理规则及流程； 2、 通过对行业发展趋势、市场竞争格局、内部经营数据等多角度的分析洞察，敏锐发现突破口，产出分析洞察报告； 3、 负责为管理团队提供决策的相关数据分析，充分利用现有数据资源，进行数据提取、整理和挖掘，建立部门内的分析模型以及建立关键指标的日常数据监控机制，定期输出结论及报告，并输出相关建议。 4、 负责参与和完成管理团队专项或年度经营方案撰写和策略材料的输出。
qualifications: 1、 本科及以上学历，3年以上互联网行业或咨询分析工作经验，有公益行业经验者优先； 2、 优秀的商业分析及问题解决能力，能够抓住本质，分析归纳和提炼关键点； 3、 具备很强的信息整合、逻辑组织、观点提炼能力，能够撰写商业分析报告，并提出独立思路和见解，为策略规划提供有价值建议； 4、 优秀的文档撰写、数据分析 / 建模能力，熟悉并能熟练使用SQL、Python或R 等语言工具，熟悉Tableau、SPSS等常用分析工具。 5、高度的职业激情以及出色的团队合作精神。

title: 15605-UE4射击手游关卡策划（深圳）
responsibilities: 负责游戏内的关卡设计与搭建工作，使用2D绘图软件设计关卡并且使用3D软件搭建场景白模，并跟进后续美术实现效果； 能够较为独立地完成模式玩法相关模块，并利用蓝图来实现初步方案； 负责关卡上线后的跟进，关注相关统计数据，调研问卷，论坛，游戏网站等体现具体使用情况和玩家反馈的来源，必要时根据数据和反馈来制定后续优化方案并跟进具体开发； 积极参与产品相关设计及优化工作，完善工作流程，注重产品表现，参与产品测试，不断发现产品不足及有待提高的方面。

title: 28302-图形学研究专员

responsibilities: 1) 负责腾讯专有云产品的需求和架构分析，测试设计和测试开发工作, 包括 IaaS，PaaS，SaaS, 存储，网络等，包括但不限于功能，性能，可靠性，鲁棒性，升级部署验证，用户体验等系统测试； 2) 对测试方案进行有效的落地和执行，以确保项目进度和软件质量，形成自动化测试用例并进一步形成服务化提升效率； 3) 架构并实现IaaS，PaaS等产品自动化测试能力，提升产品测试和交付效率； 4)不断提升测试过程，方法和技术，构建质量评估标准，优化改进措施，提升产品质量和效率； 备注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗位
qualifications: 1）计算机本科及以上学历，2年以上软件或软硬件一体化产品系统测试经验，主导过产品或模块级测试用例的设计； 2）精通一种或多种语言（python,shell / c++等），熟悉CICD 3）满足以下条件之一者优先： - 熟悉IaaS / PaaS平台，有相关测试或开发经验 -熟悉云计算和网络架构整体技术体系或者传统企业级IT解决方案的总体体系（包含服务器、存储、网络、数据库、中间件、安全等） 4）具备良好的团队合作精神，善于协调沟通，具备较强的问题定位和推动解决能力； 5）具备较强的抗压能力，能面对专有云项目的机遇与挑战，在较大压力下保持工作激情

title: 28937-高级 \ 资深技术美术（深圳 \ 北京 \ 上海）
responsibilities: 设计、编写游戏中的Shader； 为场景和角色美术搭建Lookdev环境，确保美术资产在不同光照环境下的效果表现； 与图形开发协作，实现渲染特性，并推进其在项目中的落地； 支持美术和开发团队，解决生产中遇到的问题； 编写并维护技术文档，向美术推广新工具和最佳实践。
qualifications: 5年以上游戏项目经验； 熟悉色彩和物理灯光相关知识，了解PBR理论； 具备图形学基础，及高等数学知识； 熟悉实时渲染管线； 熟练掌握GLSL, HLSL, CG等至少一门Shader编程语言； 熟悉OpenGL ES及当前移动平台上的技术限制者优先； 精通Unreal或Unity引擎的灯光渲染模块； 有二次元风格相关项目经验优先； 良好的书面和口头沟通能力； 良好的英语水平，可以流畅阅读英文技术文档及论文。

title: 28937-渲染向技术美术(深圳)
responsibilities: 实现基于PBR框架的风格化渲染和部分对象的NPR渲染，并搭建TOD，天气系统，使整体渲染效果实时自洽，以上同时兼顾性能，并维护美术制作规范； 通过搭建灯光环境和配置后处理，以营造不同的环境氛围，并使之与其他系统联动； 搭建LookDev环境，以确保美术资产正确验收；
qualifications: 艺术类专业背景或有相关工作经验，具备良好的审美能力； 具备图形学基础，熟练掌握至少一门Shader编程语言； 深入了解PBR理论，熟悉PBR美术资产制作管线； 精通UE4，Unity等至少一款主流商业引擎，UE4优先； 熟练使用至少一款DCC软件(3dsMax, Maya, Blender, Houdini等)，Maya优先； 良好的书面和口头沟通能力，优秀的团队协作能力； 加分项：3D角色或3D场景工作经验、灯光经验(实时或离线渲染)、后期效果与校色处理相关经验、 C++开发经验；

title: 24548-IP授权服饰配设计师
responsibilities: 1. 负责腾讯视频IP授权图库（Style Guide）设计开发，包括IP品牌顶层设计、主题图库开发、品类应用开发等。 2. 负责IP授权设计监修工作，包括玩具文具、鞋服配、快销、3C数码、生活周边、游戏网服等产品品类，支持被授权商产品开发中IP应用设计，与被授权商共同打造优质IP商品。 3. 对接并管理合作供应商设计创意及品质把控，协调内部资源及外部客户，规划多项目并行、设计进度管控确保最终效果的呈现
qualifications: 1. 服装染织设计专业本科及以上学历，5年以上相关设计经验，熟悉材料、配色、包装等工艺流程，熟悉服装配饰工艺、材质选择，裁剪等工序者优先。 2. 有图案开发经验，具有较强的审美和生产工艺基础，能够很好的掌控最终设计呈现效果并保证产品的落地可实施性。 3. 关注设计趋势与行业发展，了解时下潮流的设计语言，提炼符合市场流行及用户特征的设计，对设计领域及作品有灵敏的辨识度，确保最终呈现设计的原创性。 4. 对IP有较深的理解和分析，善于发现与IP内容相符的设计语言并转换为符合当下流行审美趋势的设计形式。 5. 有优质设计资源整合管理能力，可以独立完成多项目并行、设计进度管控确保最终效果的呈现。思维敏捷，思路清晰，对工作有激情并富有创新意识，乐于发现和思考问题。

qualifications: 1，本科及以上学历，有CDN、云计算、人工智能、大数据等销售经验者优先； 2，要求对手机、家电、IOT等行业有一定的了解，对新技术、新商业模式有激情； 3，有较强的分析和沟通协调能力，具备良好的团队合作精神，执行能力强，能承担工作压力， 适应经常性出差； 4，通过腾讯云技术认证或同等资格认证的优先录取。 通过腾讯云从业资格证或同等资格认证的优先录取

title: 33370-汽车行业大客户销售
responsibilities: 负责汽车行业战略大客户的销售 / 客户管理工作，包括： 1. 客户关系发展与维护，建设与管理腾讯公司与客户C Level高管、中层及关键工作层的良好立体化合作关系； 2. 深刻理解客户的战略、产品技术及市场策略、投资重点等并可以引导客户需求，具有智慧出行（云计算 / 智能驾驶 / 车联网 / 地图服务)等产品解决方案的专业理解力，深耕客户，不断拓展新的价值合作机会； 3. 充分发挥腾讯公司生态平台优势，具有业务创造力，发掘多赢合作模式； 4. 承担并完成年度销售业绩指标，与售前团队协作，发掘商机，管理商机销售漏斗，完成商务谈判、合同签订、合同回款等工作； 5. 协调内部产研 / 项目等资源，及时高效协助解决重大客户需求或投诉，维持客户满意度和忠诚度。
qualifications: 1. 管理、计算机、通信、IT相关专业大学本科以上学历； 2. 8年以上工作经验，5年以上KA销售经验； 3. 熟悉云产品，了解主流云产品的特色和差异竞争点，理解行业用云特点和需求的优先；有2年及以上云计算销售经验者优先； 4. 具有很强的抗压能力、判断与决策能力、人际沟通能力、计划与执行能力、客户服务导向；熟悉汽车行业，心态开放，能够快速学习； 5. 优秀的英语书面、口头表达能力； 6. 有国际 / 合资车企集团销售经验优先。

title: SD3-PUBG MOBILE高级项目经理（安全向）
responsibilities: 岗位职责：负责大型射击手游安全项目管理工作。 1 跟进安全需求从规划，评审，开发到测试，上线各个阶段，保证需求高效敏捷交付； 2 负责版本安全风险评估和降级工作，确保上线风险可控； 3 协同跨多部门合作事宜，牵头目标制定，负责风险监控和过程跟踪，推动安全各项关键指标的达成； 4 负责安全紧急外网问题的处理和闭环。从技术对抗，运营舆情等角度提升游戏安全口碑； 5 不断优化当前协作流程（需求研发流程，监控告警流程等等），完善工具配置，提升团队内外合作效率； 6 组织各项会议，做好信息同步和梯度管理，满足不同干系人的预期。
qualifications: 5年以上游戏安全运营或者项目管理经验； 具备良好的沟通技巧和团队合作精神，能够建立良好的团队氛围； 具有较强的风险意识，能够很好的识别项目风险，并做好风险应对； 具有较强的执行力，推动团队向目标前进； 善于归纳总结，能够推动团队效率不断提升

title: 25663-泛互出海售前解决方案架构师
responsibilities: 1. 对接腾讯云泛互出海客户(文创 / 电商 / SaaS服务)，为客户提供技术咨询 / PoC验证等技术支持服务，维系客户及支持客户的持续高速发展,协同商务团队数字目标达成； 2. 理解互联网企业出海业务场景, 在研发、运营工作中对网络、计算、存储等基础设施的需求，分析其快速发展过程中，在基础设施层面所遇到的挑战和未来业务发展的方向； 3. 向客户提供IDC上云的方案和以及PoC验证，针对客户出海业务场景，向客户推荐腾讯云平台所提供的互联网开放能力，并出具可行的、包含应用迁移和数据迁移的上云落地方案； 4. 在客户迁云过程中，根据项目本身的需要，协助研发团队或实施团队（客户或合作伙伴）完成Demo系统搭建，PoC测试及最终迁移工作； 5. 在持续服务中，挖掘 / 获得客户在腾讯云上的新增长点，并组织方案，和产研及相关支持团队紧密协作，逐个落地 6. 负责上云案例、技术方案的更新维护，及相关的布道工作。
qualifications: 1. 本科以上学历，5年以上互联网产品运维或开发、架构设计工作经验；在此基础上有公有云售前架构师工作经验或项目管理经验优先； 2. 熟悉服务器虚拟化技术及常见的云计算框架，例如：KVM，Xen，Openstack等； 熟悉负载均衡、各类VPN网关（支持IPsec、SSL等）、路由器等网络产品； 熟悉常用的消息中间件，如rabbitMQ、kafka等产品，熟悉容器化、大数据技术的基本原理； 3. 熟悉数据库相关产品，如mysql \ sqlserver \ Redis \ MongoDB等，理解各类数据库产品的适用场景和配置； 4. 熟悉公有云网络、计算、存储相关产品和解决方案，有管理和配置公有云基础设施经验最佳； 5. 熟悉某一领域互联网产品（如文创(音视频 / 短视频)、电商(DTC / 建站 / 支付)、SaaS服务(数字推荐)）的技术体系、了解知名互联网公司典型产品的技术架构； 6. 优良的客户服务意识，严谨的工作态度和强烈的责任心； 7. 具备与客户的CEO,CTO、运维负责人等关键人员的沟通能力和技巧。 通过腾讯云TCP或同等资格认证的优先录取

title: IT Intern
responsibilities: About Tencent Founded in November, 1998, Tencent is a leading provider of Internet value added services in China. Since its establishment, Tencent has maintained steady growth under its user-oriented operating strategies. On June 16, 2004, Tencent Holdings Limited (SEHK 700) went public on the main board of the Hong Kong Stock Exchange. Tencent is focused on bringing high-quality and engaging internet services and entertainment to its users. In China, Tencent is the largest publisher of online games and we work together with world-renown developers such as Activision, Epic Games, Halfbrick Studios, King, and Riot Games. About Our Team Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future ready, global IT platforms, applications and services. We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap and execution. Satisfying our internal / external customers and becoming a world class global IT team are our top aspirations. We are currently seeking a passionate IT Project coordinator, reporting to Tencent’s APAC IT Center. This position will be based in Singapore, responsible for IT projects like IT products, platforms, applications, infrastructure and process optimization projects and user support. Responsibilities Primary Responsibilities - Expert in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and After Effects with strong sense of design fundamentals and an understanding of video editing. - Able to work around tight schedules and provide punctual delivery of projects - Collaborate with global IT team to standardize employee Hardware / Software, streamline procurement / shipping process, and Support Overseas IT AV equipments - Communicate with customers to identify their requirement and ensure their needs are met, provide follow up services to ensure customer satisfaction and resolve client issues. - Properly escalate unresolved issues according to Overseas IT Escalation Process. - Manage PC setup and deployment for new employees, develop automation to create optimized Windows / macOS images, updated as needed. - Consolidate overseas IT knowledge documents and videos in one place for overseas users’ self-help and regional peer support. - Align with continuous improvement program focused on business value, process optimization, cost avoidance, cost reductions and IT “Speed to Market. ”
qualifications: Who we are looking for: - Self-motivated, articulate, passionate to deliver the best result and achieve the highest customer satisfaction. Quick learner. - Love satisfying customers with a state-of-the-art cloud solution, automation, realizing ideas, building services, and unlocking the potential of new technology! - Collaborative, independent, insistent, flexible, and open minded. And you see no conflict in any of these things. - Knowledgeable, resourceful and show initiative. You always keep the customer’s objectives in mind. - Positive by nature, a great team player, and both dependable and autonomous. - Customer oriented and could work at a very fast pace. Qualifications - Degree or diploma with relevant experience in designing ,Computer Science, Business (Other) or equivalent. - Working experience in providing technical network system and desktop support to ensure smooth and effective delivery of IT services. - Experience working with global IT teams and delivering towards global+local business / IT needs. - Knowledge of collaborative productivity tools, for example but not limited, instant messaging, collaboration, workspace, knowledge management, issue resolution, ticketing is preferred. - Have strong conceptual thinking, excellent in applied graphic ability to work in a fast-paced environment with high attention to detail - Essential to have the ability to work both independently and collaboratively within the team.

title: S2-Procurement Risk Manager
responsibilities: 1. Perform process assessments of procurement functions for the company, and provide optimization suggestions or plans. 2. Prepare and deliver supplier management report. 3. Set up and develop cost analysis models for all categories and evaluate price bench mark. 4. Responsible for compliance audit of company supplier admission, and conduct periodic onsite inspections on existing suppliers. 5. Lead to issue procurement-related internal control standards and policies. Provide professional advices for procurement consultations from business departments. Contribute to key procurement projects regarding risk management and other support. 6. In charge of procurement procedure reviews, identify potential risks and offer controlling solutions or strategies. 7. Work on continuous optimization of procurement procedures and drive cost saving. 8. Coordinate with Audit Team to define the parts to be improved that identified in internal audit projects, follow up and report the improvement progress. 9. Promote the business staffs' awareness of procurement risks and cost control through public education and trainings.
qualifications: 1. Bachelor degree or above. 2. A minimum of 5 years’ work experience in marketing procurement or professional procurement consulting. 3. Deep understanding of procurement philosophy and solid knowledge of procurement process and management as well as e experience in methodologies and practice in cost control. 4. Can work independently with strong project management ability. 5. Excellent demonstration in team work, strong organizational and communication skills. Advanced skills in Office contents compiling and reporting. 6. Excellent communications skills in English and another local language 7. Familiar with management of corporate risks. Has solid experience in Internal Control, Audit or Financial Management. COSO background preferred. 8. Applicants with procurement certifications、 CIA, CPA、CERM etc. and internet Industry working experience preferred.

title: 【ゲーム事業】IP監修担当
responsibilities: ■業務内容： ライセンサーから許諾をいただいたIPをゲームなどの商品にする際に、設定通り問題ないかのチェックを行い、画像や素材などの制作物をライセンサーに提案と報告し、承認をしていただく作業 【具体的には】 ・ゲームなどの制作物に対する監修作業 ・ライセンサー、各国関連会社とのやり取り ・許諾された内容に対しての資料準備および提供

title: SD3-PUBG MOBILE高级项目管理（玩法向）
responsibilities: 1 负责大型手游的研发项目管理工作。推动需求规划，评审，开发，上线整个流程的闭环和落地，保证需求的按时高质交付； 2 负责版本研发过程中的风险管理和进度管理工作。对于风险较为敏感，并能及时制定预案进行风险消除。对过程中出现的未知问题快速响应和解决； 3 协同各职能的跨团队协作，满足不同干系人的预期，确保团队目标对齐，高效协同，输出成果； 4 对于当前流程和工具有自主优化的意识，能够不断迭代，提升整个团队的运作效率。并且助力团队进行组织过程资产沉淀； 5 建立不同梯度的沟通方式，拉通信息流转和同步，对于阶段进展做有效汇报和总结；
qualifications: 3年以上游戏研发项目管理经验； 具备良好的沟通技巧和团队合作精神，能够建立良好的团队氛围； 具有较强的风险意识，能够很好的识别项目风险，并做好风险应对； 具有较强的执行力，推动团队向目标前进； 善于归纳总结，能够推动团队效率不断提升。

title: 40163-《王者荣耀·世界》游戏UI设计(上海 / 成都）
responsibilities: 1、负责游戏产品界面与交互设计； 2、负责游戏中UI界面、切图、游戏图标、道具等设计； 3、能够执行和制定相关设计规范； 4、正确理解策划需求案和项目需求，参与游戏资源管理，配合程序输出美术资源。
qualifications: 1. 美术或相关专业毕业、具备优秀的设计表现能力。游戏行业从业经验3年以上,至少有1款上线游戏的完整UI设计经验，并经历过改进过程； 2. 具备独立设计制作符合项目美术风格的游戏界面、交互动画等的能力； 3. 对交互设计有深刻的理解，并对RPG类UI有研究者优先； 4. 有较强的综合分析能力，创新能力，准确理解工作需求并高效完成。

title: 15571-《科幻开放世界PVE射击手游》资深宣发运营
responsibilities: 负责射击品类战略产品的全生命周期营销增长工作，包括全球市场推广及品牌建设策略制定、内外部资源规划与运用、各项营销工作统筹执行等； 对游戏行业及玩家有精准洞察，敏锐把握全球各区域市场动态和方向，策划有创意、有影响力的营销活动，助力业务目标达成。
qualifications: 三年以上互联网 / 市场营销相关工作经验，数据分析及驱动意识强，熟悉海外营销流程各模块内容，有完整游戏项目海外上线推广经历者优先； 热爱游戏行业，具备较好的游戏理解深度，有海外游戏推广背景或射击品类深度体验者优先； 开拓精神及学习能力强，具备较佳的内驱力及抗压能力，能够胜任项目统筹管理及多线程工作； 可以英语作为日常办公语言者优先。

title: 43475-FPS游戏市场经理（深圳）
responsibilities: -负责FPS类游戏市场营销工作，以增长为导向，制定市场策略到各个阶段的品牌推广方案，统筹线上线下执行，包括但不限于TVC、艺人合作、内容营销、PR、活动策划与BD跨界合作等各模块的统筹安排； -负责游戏品牌力建设，持续提升产品影响力、用户关注度及引导正向口碑，反哺游戏新进、活跃及回流； -协同各市场模块完成具体市场工作落地，包括但不限于节点市场推广落地、整体UA策略、PR、跨界合作、电竞等市场向工作落地。
qualifications: -本科及以上学历，3年以上相关工作经验 ，有负责统筹大型游戏营销推广成功案例，熟悉国内及海外游戏营销各模块、平台的运作方式； -具备商务英语能力，熟悉跨文化工作场景，有海外留学经验或工作经验者优先； -热爱游戏行业，有丰富的游戏经验（FPS类经验优先）； -对国内外文化有认知，对公关信息及政府政策信息敏感，有一定的风险评估能力； -具备良好的沟通能力，学习能力，项目协调管理能力和团队合作； -可以承受较强的工作压力，工作积极主动，有责任心，结果导向。

title: 17229-和平精英-资深战斗策划(深圳）
responsibilities: 参与《和平精英》的枪械体系的构建，包括新枪械设计、数值平衡性调整、枪械手感调整优化等； 参与《和平精英》的核心战斗的3C体验，对游戏的操作交互、角色表现、玩法流程等模块进行优化和跟进； 参与《和平精英》的各类玩法模式的局部区域、开放世界的关卡设计和跟进工作； （依据团队需求结合个人爱好专长，共同选择匹配的工作内容和发展方向；） 根据玩家反馈、数据分析、调研报告等途径进行版本迭代升级，提高游戏整体战斗体验； 挖掘游戏存在的体验问题，分析原因并设计方案，最终推动落地解决。
qualifications: 本科及以上学历，3年以上射击游戏的研发经验或相关从业经验； 热爱主流游戏及各类射击游戏，有丰富的游戏阅历，具备深厚的游戏理解能力和分析能力； 具备强大的自我驱动力、良好的沟通能力、团队协作能力； 熟悉各类军事科技、枪械体系的爱好者优先。

title: 27141-《APEX英雄》手游2D美宣
responsibilities: 根据项目需求进行角色场景宣传向概念气氛稿和宣传图、角色表现分镜概念设计、游戏美宣资源的制作，精修； 配合多方需求完成整体包装和制作； 负责CP外包跟进与培养。
qualifications: 美术类专业教育背景，熟练掌握科幻题材风格，具备很高的审美造诣，扎实的美术造型能力，对形体结构、解剖透视、空间、光影和色彩原理有深刻的理解，材质细节刻画和面部绘制能力过硬； 有独立绘制叙事性插图、宣传图能力，能快速适应多种风格和绘制指定新风格的能力。能绘制动画分镜有加分； 能熟练使用各个渲染器，调整灯光，后处理，镜头等效果。有影视海报渲染经验的优先； 具备良好合作态度及团队精神，富有工作激情、创新欲望和责任感，能承受高强度的工作压力。 熟悉APEX英雄，或者有同类型科幻风格项目经验优先。

title: 53281-Senior IT Engineer
responsibilities: Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future ready, global IT platforms, applications and services. We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap and execution. Satisfying our internal / external customers and becoming a world class global IT team are our top aspirations. We are currently seeking a passionate Senior IT Engineer to work closely with our Overseas IT, HQ IT, HR, finance and various business teams, this position will play a critical role to support all Singapore users, provide the best DAY 1 experience for new Tencent employees, as well as daily experience for all users. You will collaborate with global IT team to standardize IT procurement and asset management, continuously improve Overseas IT Escalation process. And if keen on developing / adopting automation tools and cloud solutions, you find the right place. Primary Responsibilities Collaborate with HR, Admin and Training team to provide the best DAY 1 experience for new Tencent employees, as well as daily experience. Collaborate with global IT team to standardize employee Hardware / Software, streamline procurement / shipping process, and establish Overseas IT Asset management. Oversee the maintenance, repair or replacement of computer units or other technological components. Communicate with customers to identify their requirement and ensure their needs are met, provide follow up services to ensure customer satisfaction and resolve client issues. Properly escalate unresolved issues according to Overseas IT Escalation Process. Manage PC setup and deployment for new employees, develop automation to create optimized Windows / macOS images, updated as needed. Consolidate overseas IT knowledge documents in one place for overseas users’ self-help and regional peer support. Align with continuous improvement program focused on business value, process optimization, cost avoidance, cost reductions and IT “Speed to Market. ”
qualifications: Who we are looking for: Self-motivated, articulate, passionate to deliver the best result and achieve the highest customer satisfaction. Quick learner. Love satisfying customers with a state-of-the art cloud solution, automation, realizing ideas, building services, and unlocking the potential of new technology! Collaborative, independent, insistent, flexible, and open minded. And you see no conflict in any of these things. Knowledgeable, resourceful and show initiative. You always keep the customer’s objectives in mind. Positive by nature, a great team player, and both dependable and autonomous. Customer oriented and could work at a very fast pace. Requirements Bachelor’s degree in Business (Management Information Systems), Computer Science, Business (Other) or equivalent. 6+ years of working experience in providing technical network system and desktop support to ensure smooth and effective delivery of IT services. 6+ years of experience working with global IT teams and delivering towards global+local business / IT needs. Strong knowledge of ITIL Service Management concepts and experience managing ITIL processes Knowledge of collaborative productivity tools, for example but not limited, instant messaging, collaboration, workspace, knowledge management, issue resolution, ticketing is preferred. Knowledge of IT compliance and global regulations in data security, cyber security, and privacy is preferred Experience with Jira Service Desk, WeCom, Google Suite is preferred. Fluent in Chinese and English is preferred in order to communicate with various stakeholders in headquarters.

title: 31506-海外安全资深产品专家（新加坡）
responsibilities: 1. 负责海外安全产品的整体策划及运营策略，为产品成功负责； 2. 负责国外市场洞察与竞品分析，研究分析行业政策、趋势、报告等，向产品研发团队提供战略规划的建议，推动产品迭代； 3. 协助各个团队贯彻执行产品生命周期管理，包括产品定价、需求管理、质量管理、交付管理等流程； 4. 负责对售前架构师的产品赋能，并协助标杆客户的项目落地及持续跟踪满意度。
qualifications: 1. 全日制本科及以上学历，至少8年以上网络安全产品策划，解决方案等工作经历； 2. 精通DDoS、WAF、网络加速等相关领域的技术原理，熟悉边缘计算、CDN者优先； 3. 具备前瞻性的技术视角和洞察力，对安全市场和相关公司有深入研究； 4. 具备出色的跨部门工作推动能力，以及协调和组织能力，能够完成大量需要横向推动的项目工作； 5. 具备CISSP、CISA、CISP、PMP等认证经验者优先。

title: 15618-3A开放世界手游宣发合作运营
responsibilities: 负责腾讯北极光A1工作室自研游戏的品牌建设与市场策划推广工作。 负责产品的市场营销工作，提供全生命周期的营销增长服务（新品测试期与上线期品牌建设、用户口碑维护、产品版本营销、内容营销; 成熟阶段后的长线运营市场策略制定和方案撰写） 负责跟进和把控产品创意素材、事件营销等不同营销模块的方案策划和执行工作；并且能够不断优化执行效果，将各版块的执行效果与核心业务指标关联。
qualifications: 3年以上品牌管理、市场营销或广告策划相关工作经验；有一线互联网 / 游戏公司品牌、创意、策划、营销类岗位或服务游戏类的4A广告公关公司从业者优先；有MMO、SOC、射击游戏营销经验优先； 具备一定的数据分析和用户洞察能力，熟悉品牌和市场推广运作，有出色的品牌营销策略能力和资源整合能力，能够独立完成推广策划方案； 对年轻圈层与流行文化趋势有深入研究和独特理解，熟悉年轻用户常用平台属性与各文化圈层营销模式与推广运作规律； 积极向上、学习能力强，具备良好的团队合作精神，有较强的执行力、沟通力和创新意识

title: 21089-美术指导
responsibilities: 1、管理整体美术创意、原画设计、美术品质，基于游戏世界观，为游戏美术提供创意设计思路； 2、明确、支持并推动项目的艺术视野，使之与游戏的整体创意方向保持一致； 3、协调公司内外美术资源，为游戏创造统一的视觉风格； 4、主导高品质艺术资产的交付，为研发美术团队提供建议和灵感。
qualifications: 1、优秀的美术专业能力，较高的审美能力，能够准确判断各种美术资源的设计和制作质量； 2、精通游戏美术各类资源开发流程和制作方法； 3、具备大型游戏项目经验者优先； 4、善于表达，需要跟内部提案清晰表达你的想法，以及内外部的团队协作高效的指导项目进程； 5、有强烈责任心，对待工作认真负责，能够主动承受工作压力。

title: 21089-英雄联盟社区高级产品经理(深圳)
responsibilities: 负责英雄联盟IP系列游戏社区产品建设，通过深入的游戏理解及游戏用户理解，持续创新游戏社区周边服务，凝聚核心及更大规模游戏玩家，服务游戏发行，对社区可触达游戏用户规模及游戏发行项目负责。
qualifications: 本科及以上相关学历，3年及以上互联网或游戏类产品策划工作经验； 对产品流程、用户操作流程、及用户需求有深入理解，具有成熟社区构建经验者或移动游戏发行相关经验优先； 热爱游戏行业，热爱与用户交流，熟悉国内外玩家社区行业动态，关注用户需求，熟悉游戏玩家习惯，并能够以此为指导把握内容及产品的顺应方向； 具有数据敏感性及分析能力，能够结合行业与用户数据敏锐捕捉用户需求； 优秀的项目管理和沟通表达能力，具备强力推进和优化项目的能力，确保项目按期上线； 具备优秀的学习、自驱力，善于沟通、合作，关注用户体验细节，有较强的理解力和出色的沟通、执行能力，能承受工作挑战和压力。

title: 21089-金铲铲之战本地化运营策划
responsibilities: 负责金铲铲之战（英雄联盟云顶之弈正版授权手游）的本地化运营工作。 规划统筹产品研发和发行计划，推动包括核心玩法及周边系统在内的各项需求具体规划落地和功能系统的把控验收； 基于项目目标制定版本计划，并推动落地； 根据项目运营节点及用户需求，策划拉新、留存、回流运营方案； 运用数据分析工具，监控版本、评估运营活动效果，并结合运营节奏及产品数据，主导相关游戏系统的调优、更新及进行创新性系统的设计。
qualifications: 2年以上游戏行业运营策划方向工作经验，有至少一个完整的项目研发上线经历； 有游戏整体框架的把握能力，能够统筹规划，推进研发，进行系统调优; 对主流游戏的游戏内界面设计、经济系统、社交系统等系统模块了解； 具备项目主导与推动能力，有优秀的英语沟通能力，团队协作能力，文档撰写能力。

title: 21089-英雄联盟IP相关手游品牌经理
responsibilities: 负责英雄联盟端游及金铲铲之战、英雄联盟手游等拳头游戏产品品牌定位、市场策略制定等工作； 负责英雄联盟端游及金铲铲之战、英雄联盟手游等等拳头游戏的用户研究和调研方案输出、年度推广的策略制定和执行工作； 负责英雄联盟端游及金铲铲之战、英雄联盟手游等拳头游戏的广告创意、广告投放、公关传播、事件营销等策划和执行工作； 以项目管理的方式，独立完成各项活动的主题策划、方案设计、内容整合、执行全过程，验收评估； 协调整合内外各类资源，推进品牌推广计划的实施。
qualifications: 3年以上品牌管理相关工作经验，有参与运作游戏产品品牌定位的完整经验； 热爱游戏，有比较深度的对于不同类型游戏及游戏玩家的认知； 思维活跃，积极主动，善于学习和提升自我，具有创新精神； 良好的团队意识以及计划执行能力，勇于承担工作压力； 品牌意识强，熟悉公关媒体品牌推广运作，具有出色的品牌策略能力及整合传播技巧； 具有良好的沟通及表达能力，能与各个合作方沟通顺畅，推动项目进度。

title: CSIG07-零信任后台开发工程师（CSIG全资子公司）
responsibilities: 1、负责腾讯安全产品iOA产品的后台架构方案设计； 2、负责腾讯安全产品iOA产品的模块开发工作； 3、负责腾讯安全产品iOA产品的线上问题分析与调优。 备注：此岗位为CSIG全资子公司编制。
qualifications: 1、本科及以上学历，3年以上私有化后台架构研发和架构经验； 2、掌握Linux平台下的C / C++ / Go一种以上语言并有实际工程经验，熟悉网络编程，掌握常用的通信协议； 3、精通后台的常用中间件原理和应用，包括PostgreSQL，Redis，etcd等； 4、熟悉K8S, Sevice Mesh微服务架构、消息推送等技术者优先考虑。

title: S2-Accounting Specialist, GL & Reporting
responsibilities: The Overseas Finance Center, based in Singapore, has an exciting opportunity for a suitably qualified and experienced Financial Accountant. Reporting to the Head of the Team, this role would suit a seasoned Financial Accountant or Auditor who has extensive experience in Accounting and Reporting. - IFRS accounting plus Local GAAP adjustment, including preparation of journal entries - Manage GL activities i. e. asset registers, intercompany transaction, loan / borrowing, payroll and employee entitlement etc. , Be responsible for the completeness and punctuality of month / year-end closing - Ownership and delivery of financial control on financial master data, general ledger, including balance sheet reconciliation and analysis - Ensure compliance with accounting standards, best practices and local government regulations - Liaise with a variety of departments and key stakeholders in the business to ensure accurate financial reporting - Prepare financial reporting packages, investigate variances, and respond to enquiries - Work with auditor, ensure the delivery of accurate and timely completion of local statutory report, note analysis, appendices, and relevant Board papers - Provide support and / or attend management board meetings relating to financial report approvals - Prepare technical accounting advices and memos, contribute to major transactions including adoption of new / amended accounting standards, share-based payments, acquisitions, PPA, capital and debt raising etc. - Establish and maintain financial statements model, templates, standard operating procedures, work papers, processes, and systems supporting the report deliverables across the team - Undertake systems projects i. e. BI, HFM etc. with the objective of creating efficiencies, and the automation of the reporting process - Take a pro-active approach to identify opportunities to implement process improvements in the full financial process
qualifications: The successful candidate will have the following: - Bachelor’s degree or above - CA or CPA Qualified, minimum 5 years work experience with corporations / public listed companies or professional firms - Sound knowledge of IFRS and financial statement disclosures demonstrated either in a commercial environment or in a professional firm - Ability to apply technical accounting skills in a practical manner to achieve problem identification / resolution - Strong analytical ability, verbal and written communication skills, including presentation experience - Highly skilled and experienced in implementing organisational systems, procedures, and processes - Ability to prioritise, meet strict deadlines and have high attention to detail - Ability to develop strong working relationships with key stakeholders - Professional work ethic, strong personal integrity and stewardship - Ability to work autonomously and in a team, show initiative and be self-motivated - Proficiency in Oracle (or similar) general ledger or Hyperion is a Plus

title: 22989-专有云POC测试工程师（武汉 / 西安）（CSIG全资子公司）
responsibilities: 1、负责专有云行业项目的测试方案制定，用例编写及评审和执行，并设计自动化； 2、负责交付类项目相关的测试方案评审，用例编写和用例执行； 3、保证被测系统的质量，并通过测试流程和方法，提升研发的质量和效率。
qualifications: 1、计算机本科及以上相关专业3年以上工作经验，有TOB业务的测试经验、专项测试或测试开发经验者优先； 2、有相关自动化测试、专项测试或测试工具平台建设者优先，能够掌握Python / Go / C / C++等至少一种编程语言； 3、有云架构、kvm虚拟化技术、docker技术、虚拟网络技术、分布式存储技术、关系型数据库等任意一个方向的开发或测试经验优先； 4、具备良好的团队合作精神，善于沟通协调，具备较高的问题推动解决能力； 5、有不错的工作抗压能力，富有激情，责任心强，做事公正客观。 此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗位，通过腾讯云从业资格证或同等资格认证的优先录取。

title: 22989-云原生私有化技术专家（武汉 / 西安 / 重庆）（CSIG全资子公司）
responsibilities: 腾讯云专有云产品中心底层基础技术团队，在云原生的技术风口为打造精细化调度与智能的专有云产品提供基础技术支撑能力，参与容器调度、中间件、大数据组件的建构演进、运维能力建设和稳定性保障。
qualifications: 1、具备突出的技术创新力，前瞻性，对新技术有热情，乐于学习和分享 2、熟悉 kubernetes 核心组件以及周边生态，精通 kubernetes 各种特性，具备各模块排障能力。 3、熟悉关系型数据库与分析型数据库原理和机制，熟悉数据库备份恢复、高可用、灾备恢复。 4、熟悉大数据hadoop / flink等相关组件的运维能力建设与故障分析定位与恢复。 5、熟悉大规模集群下的运维能力建设与开发，有过运维平台子系统落地经验。 6、有大型互联网运维开发、数据库架构规划、大数据或大规模 kubernets 集群运维经验，较强的故障定位和处理能力。 7、熟悉MongoDB，NoSQL，消息队列，NewSQL 的优先。 8、熟悉Python、golang任意一种语言优先，具备运维自动化建设能力。 此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗位，通过腾讯云从业资格证或同等资格认证的优先录取

responsibilities: 腾讯云专有云产品中心平台研发技术团队，为腾讯云私有化输出建设高效率的运维能力，保证专有云产品稳定运行，建设完善的提前发现问题、定位问题、分析问题、解决问题的自动化系统，包括但不限于日志、监控、报警、发布、巡检、全链路跟踪、高可用切换等。
qualifications: 1. 三年以上研发经验，熟悉shell 与 linux、能独立完成后台系统的开发、部署、维护； 2. 熟练掌握python、go开发语言一种，有良好的的工程研发习惯并有对应的项目落地经验； 3. 了解数据库原理，熟练掌握一种以上数据库，如Mysql、Redis、MongoDB等； 4. 从事过运维开发工作，对部署、发布、监控、报警、运维自动化各系统技术栈有深入的了解，参与或负责开发的运维系统所管理服务器节点数不低于2000。 5、对工程质量、架构、系统性能有极高追求并有优化经验。 6、对代码标准、测试覆盖、代码结构有偏执的极致追求。 通过腾讯云从业资格证或同等资格认证的优先录取。 注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗位

title: 22989-腾讯云云开发后台开发工程师（CSIG全资子公司）（武汉）
responsibilities: 负责腾讯云云开发Serverless云端一体化应用产品的后台开发； 负责微搭产品后台服务设计与开发。

responsibilities: 负责云原生产品市场整体技术选型、架构设计和系统开发，确保产品市场持续演进，保障产品竞争力和技术领先性； 结合业界云原生基础设施，负责云原生产品市场行业标准制定和新方向探索，覆盖产品接入、编排、部署、运维，推进产品市场大规模落地。
qualifications: 三年以上工作经验，掌握Python、Golang至少一种编程语言，有良好的的工程研发习惯和相应的项目落地经验； 熟练掌握一种以上数据库，如Mysql、Redis、MongoDB等，熟练使用 Linux、MQ、ES等； 熟悉微服务架构和治理，具有丰富的服务治理、服务编排、服务调度等实战经验； 具备良好的沟通能力和团队协作能力，具备较好的系统化分析能力，对技术和业务有前瞻性思考； 熟悉云原生周边生态（Docker、Kubernetes、OAM、Helm、Service Mesh等），了解Kubernetes CRD Operator扩展机制，有云原生相关研发经验者优先； 有Activity、Go-WorkFlow等工作流程引擎开发经验，熟悉业界标准BMPN2. 0规范者优先； 注：此岗位为腾讯旗下全资子公司岗位。

title: 22989-专有云产品经理（知识库方向）（西安）(CSIG全资子公司)
responsibilities: 1、负责专有云TCE&TCS、各云产品的文档知识库开发管理工作。和产研团队紧密合作、按产品定位和用户需求进行相关产品文档设计、二次开发等工作。按版本组织产研写作，随产品交付文档。 2、在知识库建设过程中，完善和优化文档写作规范和标准；改善、优化开发流程和工具，提高交付效率；并推动研发团队提高规范化意识。 3、深入理解售前售中售后客户需求、有效闭环意见。对数据进行运营分析，持续提升知识库质量并反推提升产品体验。
qualifications: 1、计算机相关专业本科以上学历，3年以上工作经验，有良好的学习能力与技术理解力，能快速学习了解不同云产品的功能与特性； 2、有云计算产品的从业经验，对IaaS、PaaS层云产品有一定的基础及理解； 3、文字功底扎实、语言组织能力强，擅长技术内容组织与编写； 4、具备较强的良好的沟通能力和推动能力，较强的逻辑思维，思维灵活，性格豁达阳光，合作意识强，工作主动积极，能抗压。 5、 有云计算 / 存储 / 网络 / 数据库 / 中间件 / 安全 / 大数据 / ToB企业的产品知识库开发工作经验者优先；通过腾讯云技术认证或同等资格认证的优先录取。 注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制。

title: 22989-腾讯云容器开发工程师（西安 / 武汉）(全资子公司)
responsibilities: 1、负责腾讯云边缘容器公有云 / 私有云 / 开源产品的方案设计和研发工作，负责现网问题 troubleshooting； 2、承接腾讯云边缘容器在落地客户业务场景时出现的需求； 3、负责大规模容器集群的性能优化和系统高可用等相关研发工作； 4、探索最新的边缘容器功能特性（边缘mesh、边缘网络、边缘存储、云边端协同等），并进行方案验证及特性推广，保持产品能力处于行业领先地位； 5、参与腾讯云边缘容器开源社区治理以及公司内部开源协同等相关工作，提高产品行业影响力； 6、对技术和业务有前瞻性思考，以技术方案解决行业通用痛点、促进行业发展。 注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗位
qualifications: 1、 熟悉Linux系统、TCP / IP网络协议等计算机基础知识； 2、 熟悉Golang语言开发，有独立解决各种系统问题的能力，对Golang语言有深刻的理解者优先考虑； 3、 有Kubernetes / Docker项目经验的同学优先， 熟悉源码和原理者加分； 4、 有Docker / Kubernetes / lstio二次开发，扩展幵发者、社区经验者优先； 5、 参与过边缘容器研发，或是有边缘容器使用和落地实践者优先； 6、 对linux内核有一定了解，知道一般问题的定位方向和手段，具备Linux内核开发能力者优先； 7、 有良好的沟通能力与自我驱动能力，愿意投身云原生边缘计算领域的浪潮中。 注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗位
