title: TiMi F1 Montreal – Senior Tools & Pipeline Programmer
responsibilities: Award-winning TiMi Studio Group seeks a Senior Tools & Pipeline Programmer to develop a AAA, open-world game using Unreal’s latest technology. The project will be released on multiple platforms, with an objective to reach a global audience. As a Senior Tools & Pipeline Programmer, you will develop features that empower content creators with a focus on productivity and scalability. TiMi Montreal is a new studio within TiMi Studio Group, a subsidiary of Tencent Games. We are passionate about creating compelling worlds for players to explore for years to come. Are you someone who loves participating in building new worlds, understands what captivates players, and cares deeply about gaming as a medium? Are you ready to channel your passion and energy into creating expansive open world games for global audiences? Are you passionate about building technology that supports a unique creative vision? Then, come join us in our ambitious endeavor. What will you do? You will design and develop features that allow content creators to produce high quality content. You will work closely with artists and designers to find creative solutions that respond to their needs. You will participate in continuous improvements of our tools & pipeline based on user feedback. You will establish the foundations for a productive and scalable work environment. Implement technology that supports our game vision and empowers content creators Collaborate with artists, designers, animators to design solutions that respond to their needs Measure pipeline performance for continuous improvement Debug and troubleshoot issues within our pipeline Maintain high quality coding standards and documentation Focus on productivity, scalability and efficiency
qualifications: What we are looking for: At least eight years of professional AAA game development experience At least two AAA action titles shipped, one during the current generation of video games (PS4 / XBOX ONE) Broad knowledge of game content creation pipelines Proficiency in various programming languages, especially C# and C++ Excellent debugging and optimization skills Good analytical skills Ability to quickly prototype and iterate in collaboration with others Experience with Unreal Engine is a plus Experience with Live Service games is a plus What is in it for you? Create new worlds for players to explore, experience and enjoy: At TiMi Montreal, we see everyone as a game developer. Join a team of industry veterans to create engaging and innovative experiences that players will enjoy for years to come. Share your passion, your ideas and take initiative to increase our product’s quality. Deliver AAA multi-platform games with ample resources and support: TiMi is dedicated to bringing incredible game experiences to players. As one of the most successful studios in the world, TiMi has what it takes to produce a AAA game. We wish to empower all game developers to reach their full potential.

responsibilities: 1、 负责腾讯出行产品线效能相关的研发测试工具链的建设。包括项核心 / 重要模块的设计、编码、测试以及相关文档的编写；参与系统稳定性、性能和扩展性设计开发和测试等。 2、 负责协同公司级devops全链路的建设和在研发项目落地实施。 3、 负责工具平台在项目线落地支持和推广工作。 注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗位
qualifications: 1、计算机相关专业本科及以上学历，3年以上服务器端研发经验；有中大型项目经验优先; 2、熟悉后台技术栈，微服务框架，具备java语言的实践经验；同时具备golang语言经验者优先，有单元测试经验者优先。 4、熟悉掌握Redis、Kafka、MongoDB、ES等开源组件; 5、熟悉常见的设计模式、HTTP / TCP / UDP等常用通讯协议，熟悉数据库的设计和使用,具备问题的分析定位能力; 6、责任心强、主动思考，对待技术有强烈兴趣，具备良好沟通能力和团队协作能力; 7、抗压能力强，能适应一段时间内的较高强度工作

title: 25928-高级商业分析经理
responsibilities: 扫描游戏行业技术及发展动态，针对游戏研运领域开展纵深研究，输出研究报告； 参与制定游戏研运体系发展战略规划，为各业务模块提供战略发展方向指引及建议，为业务负责人提供必要的决策支持； 主导战略项目执行，协调内外部团队确保战略项目目标达成； 新业务孵化的推动与支持，横向协同业务各部门，结合当前业务重点和发展阶段，研究行业对标产品及案例，为新业务落地提供策略参考； 推动与战略合作伙伴、投资公司等生态企业的合作，创造业务侧协同发展机会。
qualifications: 热爱游戏行业，有实际参与过游戏研发与运营经验者为佳； 3年以上相关战略、咨询、商业分析岗经验； 具备成熟的商业分析框架和商业嗅觉，有较强的沟通协调能力和团队协作能力，有定量分析能力和数据处理能力优先； 本科及以上学历； 有责任感，强大执行力，良好的团队合作精神及开放的心态。

title: 25667-渠道生态架构师（北京 / 深圳 / 上海）
responsibilities: 岗位职责： 1. 为腾讯云合作伙伴提供技术咨询、云解决方案培训赋能及项目支持等专业服务； 2. 与合作伙伴一起根据客户IT特性，设计基于腾讯云平台的架构方案，并帮助客户或合作伙伴进行系统迁云，提供应用迁移和数据迁移咨询服务；支持客户或合作伙伴在腾讯云平台上构建上层应用程序和服务； 3、协调后台产品、服务、运营等团队资源，对伙伴重点项目进行售前支持； 4、参与合作伙伴的技术团队建设。
qualifications: 岗位要求： 1. 本科以上学历，3年以上云计算相关工作经验，了解各家的公有云产品或熟悉虚拟化相关技术(例如：KVM，Xen，Openstack等)。 2. 深入了解某一个垂直行业(例如：互联网 / 金融 / 工业 / 政务 / 教育等)，参与过该行业的重大项目投标，可以梳理该行业的合作图谱。 3. 具备与客户的CEO,CTO、运维负责人等关键人员的沟通能力和技巧。 通过腾讯云技术认证或同等资格认证的优先录取。 4. 优良的沟通能力及客户服务意识，严谨的工作态度和强烈的责任心； 岗位职责： 1. 为腾讯的合作伙伴提供业务技术咨询、云解决方案培训赋能及项目支持等专业服务 2. 与合作伙伴一起根据客户IT特性，设计基于腾讯云平台的架构方案，并帮助客户或合作伙伴进行系统迁云，提供应用迁移和数据迁移咨询服务；支持客户或合作伙伴在腾讯云平台上构建上层应用程序和服务； 3、协调后台产品、服务、运营等团队资源，对伙伴重点项目进行售前支持。 4、参与合作伙伴的技术团队建设。

title: 31506-安全运营工程师CRE（CSIG全资子公司）
responsibilities: 1、加入腾讯云DDoS服务运营团队，通过主动服务、监控、售后支持等方式提供优质的安全咨询和应急服务； 2、负责控制故障事件的影响，对事件进行分类并组织问题讨论解决会议，与相关的工程师及项目团队一起最快速的处理问题，并在后期参与复盘，长期帮助服务和产品改进； 3、负责对腾讯云安全客户进行综合管理，对客户信息进行综合归档并根据客户情况提供最佳的解决方案； 4、负责对客户侧需求进行综合管理，和产品沟通需求进展并最终闭环。
qualifications: 1、熟悉云环境DDoS攻防原理和相关产品功能，有实际攻防经验； 2、熟悉路由协议，对国内和海外云和运营商层面网络架构有一定了解，并有一定的网络问题分析能力； 3、熟练使用如Curl，Tcpdump，Wireshark，Kibana等工具完成日常工作； 4、了解基本的云架构以及安全产品在云环境中的部署和原理； 5、能使用Python，Go或其它编程语言完成自动化任务，提高工作效率； 6、具有客户服务和沟通经验； 7、有良好的沟通交流能力，自驱力，团队合作能力和文字表达能力。

title: Localization Manager
responsibilities: - Work with multiple internal stakeholders, including HQ Localization Team, marketing, operations, and community teams to define success criteria for in-game and publishing localization. - Become point-of-contact between WEU Regional Publishing Team and Tencent HQ to identify opportunities for improvement and optimizing content. - Co-manage vendors with Tencent HQ to improve the quality of in-game localization of the supported languages and V / Os. - Work with vendors to ensure all publishing related-content is localized into supported languages. - Coordinate localization requirements between the development team and other regional departments – publishing, marketing, operation, esports. - Project follow-up and controlling to meet quality standards, budget and deadlines.
qualifications: - 5+ years of experience in localization, QA and product roles in gaming. - Proficiency in one or more non-English European languages (French, German, Spanish or Italian and Mandarin is a plus) - Understanding the unique challenges of localizing and publishing mobile MOBA games and games-as-a-service. - Ability to work under pressure and manage ambiguous situations. - Proven experience in localization tools. - A passion for mobile, pc and console games. - A valid passport and willingness to travel regularly to London.

15575-《王者荣耀》动漫画制片人
responsibilities: 协同动漫画项目制片，完成项目的选题、前期内容策划； 负责各阶段文本（大纲 / 剧本）审读，提出详细的书面意见并统筹外部编剧进行修改，直至达到制作要求；全流程负责剧本品质； 持续发掘、梳理作者 / 编剧资源，建立创作资源人才库并负责日常维护，为项目精准匹配编剧资源。

title: 15575-《王者荣耀》衍生品-平面设计师（成都）
responsibilities: 负责王者荣耀IP衍生品设计，包括品牌色、元素、图案、整合排版、字体设计等，应用于服装、手办、生活用品等； 负责王者荣耀IP业务相关宣发物料设计； 与王者荣耀衍生品团队商务、产品、宣发等其他环节同事沟通配合，共同完成衍生品的开发 / 监修工作；
qualifications: 艺术设计相关专业，热爱ACG和周边，3年以上游戏、动漫、影视、或文娱周边设计工作经验，有图库开发经验或了解周边产品的研发流程； 具备优秀的审美和颜色搭配及构图创意能力，能根据游戏设定素材进行二次创作； 熟练运用平面相关各类设计软件，责任心和执行力强，能控制内外设计进度及设计品质的监督工作； 热爱创作富有激情，了解时尚潮流文化，对大众消费市场保持敏感，有用户洞察意识； 沟通能力强，能积极有效串联内外部设计团队，合作意识强，有创新精神，抗压能力强； 有图库开发经验优先，熟悉制作材料及工艺与相关流程者优先，熟悉王者荣耀游戏玩法和英雄角色优先；

title: 41310-中东区域高级游戏运营（深圳）
responsibilities: 1. 负责中东地区产品运营发行工作，根据项目运营节奏和运营数据，做出判断并提出有效的运营方案； 2. 负责项目日常活跃、及商业化数据监控，对项目数据波动敏感，且能够快速定位问题并与研发沟通，确认优化方案； 3. 负责日常线上问题的跟进和处理，包括版本稳定性和用户反馈监控，及时推动问题修复，和版本质量及内容优化； 4. 负责产品运营活动的策划、效果分析及复盘迭代，对活动数据效果及用户满意度负责。
qualifications: 1. 本科及以上学历，3年以上游戏行业工作经验，有海外运营经验者优先； 2. 熟悉产品不同生命周期的运营活动和商业化目的与手段； 3. 对数据敏感，了解用户需求，有敏锐的洞察力和快速学习能力； 4. 热爱游戏行业，对海外移动游戏市场有浓厚的兴趣和深入了解，擅长FPS游戏优先； 5. 优秀的自我驱动力，工作认真负责，有敏锐的洞察力和快速学习的能力； 6. 具备较好的英文书写和沟通能力，英语可作为工作语言。

title: 29777-智慧工业和服务业工程器械行业架构师
responsibilities: 1、为大型集团企业客户的IT相关项目提供轻咨询、技术规划、设计等专业服务； 2、基于业界标准和最佳实践为大型集团企业提供解决方案和顾问式服务； 3、为客户提供信息化和数字化的整体规划； 4、全生命周期服务客户，并且达成客户和公司双赢。
qualifications: 基本要求： 1、大学本科以上学历，计算机或相关专业；5年以上集团客户IT项目建设经验； 2、深入理解数字化转型概念，熟悉云计算、人工智能、大数据等互联网技术在大型集团企业业务中的应用，尤其数据中台和业务中台领域； 3、具备与客户信息化、技术负责人等关键人员的沟通能力和技巧，能够影响上述人员的上云决策；  4、具有优秀的学习能力，良好的承压和问题解决能力，习惯于寻找创新方法来达成目标。  具备以下行业技能优先： 1、具备集团客户业务基础架构,解决方案整体咨询和概要设计能力，熟练掌握咨询设计相关方法论。 2、对央国企等相关业务领域有大型咨询项目或者实施项目经验者优先考虑，熟悉政府工作流程，深度参与过相关政府信息化工作支撑者优先考虑。 3、熟悉业内相关大数据、区块链等新技术，可独立支撑其相关业务咨询、技术咨询、规划、设计等专业服务者优先考虑。 4、通过腾讯云技术认证或同等资格认证的优先录取。 通过腾讯云从业资格证或同等资格认证的优先录取

title: 54876-Senior Researcher
responsibilities: Tencent Games Global Publishing Technology Centre (PTC) is building the leading platforms for game development, publishing, and operation. It has an exciting opportunity for a Natural Language Processing (NLP) Researcher. The ideal candidate will have experience and interest in the use of Natural Language Processing techniques to solve problems targeting multilingual text understanding tasks, especially tasks related to multilingual sentiment analysis including sentence-level and aspect-level. The candidate will have the opportunity to work with other top research scientists and research engineers to research and develop the market intelligence and public opinion services for Tencent's global games. There is also the opportunity to publish papers at top-tier conferences and journals. This position is a great fit for candidates with research and engineering who want to be at the cutting edge of research on multilingual natural language processing, and at the same time have direct real-world impact. Responsibilities 1. Exploring multilingual aspect-level and sentence-level sentiment analysis techniques for developing the market intelligence and public opinion services for Tencent's global games. 2. Research on multilingual sentiment analysis algorithms and follow up with the latest researches to iterate the models behind the scene. 3. Working closely with other team members to explore the cutting edge of research on multilingual natural language processing.
qualifications: 1. Master or PhD degree in Computer Science, mathematics, statistics, or similar area. Ph. D. with Strong publication record is preferred. 2. 5+ years of experience of building multilingual natural language processing models for business application. 3. Expert in multilingual sentiment analysis including sentence-level and aspect-level. 4. Familiar with deep learning applications and experienced with deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, Caffe, PyTorch or Mxnet.

title: 45273-Corporate Communications Manager, Southeast Asia
responsibilities: Job description The candidate will have an opportunity to drive the development and implementation of communication strategies to develop and share Tencent’s story. In this role, you will work closely with various internal and external stakeholders to increase awareness and understanding of the company, its businesses, and key initiatives in Southeast Asia (SEA). Reporting to the associate director of corporate communication of SEA and India, the candidate will partner with the Global Communications and Public Affairs team members to protect and promote the Tencent brand by helping to manage corporate reputation and response to key issues. To succeed, you will combine creativity with organizational skills to manage multiple issues and projects with tight deadlines simultaneously. Founded in Shenzhen, China in 1998 and listed on the Main Board of the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong in 2004, Tencent is an internet-based value-added service provider that uses technology to enrich the lives of Internet users and assist in the digital transformation of industries. In SEA, Tencent has offi¬ces in Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore and Thailand to support its growing business. Our growth strategy is built upon attracting the best people and creating an amazing work atmosphere that balances the energy of a start-up with the resources of a global innovation leader. As a company which is pursuing new markets and growing rapidly, we maintain an entrepreneurial spirit and an open mindset. Responsibilities - In alignment with global communication strategies, plan and execute corporate public relation (PR) programs in SEA, as well as cascade corporate PR messaging across regional business groups, to generate Tencent’s reputation awareness, through global and regional, trade and local media, and social media. - Work with country communication teams and business leaders to identify opportunities for media outreach and media response, as well as to create content for corporate digital and social media channels to promote Tencent’s regional and local stories. - Support reputation management by anticipating and identifying relevant risks to Tencent in the region, particularly in relation to its products and business. Help mitigate risks to Tencent’s reputation with crisis communications plans. - Support global communication teams to review product PR content to assess alignment with Tencent’s narratives, minimize and prepare for potential risks to the corporate reputation. Include reviews, edits and approvals of comms and marketing assets, and social media contents. - Support regional offices and HR team members in preparation of messaging and approaches for the execution of internal communications programs to inform and engage Tencent employees. - Manage the regional content creation for Tencent-owned media channels and coordinate for relevant content sharing with business groups for awareness amplification - Monitor and analyse related news coverage and social sentiment for insights and issue management using a combination of social listening and reporting tools.
qualifications: - At least 3-5 years of experience in corporate PR and regional communication is essential, ideally with an understanding of the technology and internet industries - A strong understanding of the SEA markets and its diversity. Experienced working with markets including Singapore, Thailand, Indonesia, Malaysia, Vietnam and the Philippines is preferred. - Able to offer sound advice on strategies to both promote and protect the Tencent brand considering of the regional dynamics - Able to work under pressure and find solutions to multiple and varying needs. - Willing to roll-up sleeves and get the work done - Possess comprehension with analytical and problem-solving mindset - Experience in editorial writing and PR content creation preferred. Multilingual is a plus. - Experience blending traditional communications tactics with digital media also preferred - Driven and resourceful individual with strong organisation skills, able to handle multiple stakeholders, projects and timelines - Willing to travel (as necessary) to international locations with valid passport

title: Senior IT Engineer (Japan)
responsibilities: Position Overview: Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future ready, global IT platforms, applications, and services. We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap, and execution. Satisfying our internal / external customers and becoming a world class global IT team are our top aspirations. We are currently seeking a passionate IT Manager, Reporting to Tencent’s APAC IT Center, this position will be based in Japan. You will work closely with our Overseas IT, HQ IT, HR, finance and various business teams, this position will play a critical role to support all business across Japan and other geo-locations, provide the best IT solutions and user experience for Tencent employees, as well as affiliate users. Your main responsibilities are high-quality system maintenance, IT product support and system user support, while being able to work closely with business users, IT development teams, undertake missions and work independently to complete various tasks. If you have programming skills and keen on developing / adopting automation tools and cloud solutions, you find the right place. Primary Responsibilities - Collaborate with HR, Admin and Operations team to provide the best IT solutions and user experience for Tencent employees, as well as affiliate users. - Provide support, troubleshooting and resolve problems to meet end user ‘s satisfaction, including IT hardware, IT systems, business platforms and applications. - Participate in the implementation of global IT projects of Tencent Overseas IT, and can adapt to the local business need of Japan, and contribute to the output of Japanese IT products and solutions. - Be the expert and first point of contact for a certain product and area of IT, such as cloud products, business systems, network or infrastructure. - Proactive attitude, able to accept the mission and execute it independently, strong sense of ownership - Can use scripting languages, support automated system deployment and operation & maintenance practices in Japan IT team. - Work with business department to coordinate important system maintenance, changes and IT requirements from business side. - Support R&D lab servers, including server installation, configuration and daily maintenance. - Align with continuous improvement program focused on business value, process optimization, cost avoidance, cost reductions and IT “Speed to Market. ” - Consolidate overseas IT knowledge documents in one place for overseas users’ self-help and regional peer support. - Other IT tasks arranged by the management team including IT office build / infrastructure project, system deployment, changes and upgrades, etc.
qualifications: Who we are looking for: -A all-rounder, who's technical enough to understand the full picture of overall IT projects and operations, and able to have it managed and deliverd with positive outcomes in a fast-paced tech environment. -A seasoned IT manager who has solid Project management skills with a proven track records in global IT project and operations delivery, who can thrive and stay on top of things to make things happen in a dynamic environment. -A relationship manager who can build good relationship with local businesses / users to understand their needs and pain points and have them addressed in a timely and effectively manner. -A hands-on person who can roll up the sleeve and get his / her hands dirty to make things work while needed and putting customer's need at first. - Self-motivated, articulate, passionate to deliver the best result and achieve the highest customer satisfaction. Quick learner. - Love satisfying customers with a state-of-the-art cloud solution, automation, realizing ideas, building services, and unlocking the potential of new technology! - Collaborative, independent, insistent, flexible, and open-minded. And you see no conflict in any of these things. - Knowledgeable, resourceful and show initiative. You always keep the customer’s objectives in mind. - Positive by nature, a great team player, and both dependable and autonomous. - Customer-oriented and could work at a very fast pace. Qualifications: - Bachelor’s degree in Business (Management Information Systems), Computer Science, Business (Other) or equivalent. - 5+ years of working experience in providing technical IT system support to ensure smooth and effective delivery of IT services. - 5+ years of experience working with global IT teams and delivering towards global+local business / IT needs. - 2 + years of experience in software development and knowledge of development methodologies. - Experience with a variety of programming languages such as C, Java or python. - Strong knowledge of ITIL Service Management concepts and experience managing ITIL processes - Knowledge of collaborative productivity tools, for example, but not limited to, instant messaging, collaboration, workspace, knowledge management, issue resolution, ticketing is preferred. - Knowledge of IT compliance and global regulations in data security, cyber security, and privacy is preferred. - Experience with ServiceNow, Workday, Jamf, Faronics, Slack, WeCom is preferred. - Fluent in Local language, English, Chineseis preferred but not required, in order to communicate with teams located in different countries.

title: TiMi F1 Montreal – Character Artist
responsibilities: Award-winning TiMi Studio Group seeks a Character Artist to develop a AAA, open-world game based on a new IP. The project will be released on multiple platforms, with an objective to reach a global audience. As a Character Artist, you will create high-quality characters based on our unique artistic direction. Every character you produce will contribute to building a living, dynamic and engaging world. TiMi Montreal is a new studio within TiMi Studio Group, a subsidiary of Tencent Games. We are passionate about creating compelling worlds for players to explore for years to come. Are you someone who loves participating in building new worlds, understands what captivates audiences, and cares deeply about gaming as a medium? Are you ready to channel your passion and energy into creating expansive open world games for global audiences? Then, come join us in our ambitious endeavor. What will you do? You will participate in bringing a unique cast of characters to life. You will work with art direction to define our character art style, using different proportions, silhouettes and shading techniques. You will collaborate with animators to create characters that players can interact with in a memorable way. Create high-quality 3D models / textures for characters and creatures Integrate characters in-engine following technical requirements (polycount, etc. ) Validate characters respect in-game lighting and shading requirements Collaborate with animators and technical animators to provide them with animatable elements Contribute to character art pipeline and rendering improvements Optimize character models based on engine constraints TiMi Montreal is a new studio within TiMi Studio Group, a subsidiary of Tencent Games. We are passionate about creating compelling worlds for players to explore for years to come. Are you someone who loves participating in building new worlds, understands what captivates players, and cares deeply about gaming as a medium? Are you ready to channel your passion and energy into creating expansive open world games for global audiences? Are you passionate about the combination of technology, animation, and gameplay? Then, come join us in our ambitious endeavor. What will you do? You will collaborate directly with our animation team to develop technology supporting our creative vision. You will build animation systems that are scalable and sustainable in a live-service context. Your contribution will allow animators to reach the highest-level of realization quality. We believe animation plays a major role in the success of our new franchise. Implement animation systems and technology based on our creative vision Collaborate with animators, technical animators and programmers to develop high-quality software Analyze existing tools and software that could be integrated in our pipeline Iterate to reach highest animation quality Debug and optimize animation systems for an Open World game Develop debugging tools for content creators Respect high quality coding standards Write and maintain technical documentation
qualifications: What we are looking for: Expert knowledge of character creation tools (ZBrush, Substance Painter, 3DSMax, Maya, Photoshop, Marevelous Designer, etc. ) Strong portfolio showcasing modeling, texturing and rendering skills Good understanding of real-time rendering concepts (shaders, polycount, PBR, etc. ) Strong high & low resolution character modeling Good understanding of human anatomy Knowledge of movie and games industry Experience with Unreal Engine is a plus Experience in professional AAA game development experience preferred What is in it for you? Create new worlds for players to explore, experience and enjoy: At TiMi Montreal, we see everyone as a game developer. Join a team of industry veterans to create engaging and innovative experiences that players will enjoy for years to come. Share your passion, your ideas and take initiative to increase our product’s quality. Deliver AAA multi-platform games with ample resources and support: TiMi is dedicated to bringing incredible game experiences to players. As one of the most successful studios in the world, TiMi has what it takes to produce a AAA game. We wish to empower all game developers to reach their full potential.

title: 41317-Senior Brand Manager, Level Infinite
responsibilities: The Senior Brand Manager role will be responsible for Managing and driving the growth of our global brand Level Infinite. Responsible for developing industry- and consumer-facing brand strategies, as well as implementing brand plans. Increase the brand's awareness and repute through well-planned brand campaigns, high-quality marketing assets, and effective public communications. Developing the brand identity and key messaging components (brand positioning and pillars) that drive the overall vision and brand marketing strategy; Tracking all marketing activity and being able to provide capable analysis and guidance that result in identifying areas for improvement; Lead in collaborating with internal stakeholders (including Product Development, Business Intelligence, Demand Planning, Creative Development, Finance, Community, and Executive Management); Drive weekly syncs between brand, campaign and key partners to achieve strategic objectives and future content planning; Manage, guide and mentor direct reports and assist with career and skills development.
qualifications: 5+ years of brand management experience; Experience with brand management and marketing in top game / internet is preferred. Experience in creating popular marketing campaigns or building global brands is preferred; Knowledge in various marketing fields. Outstanding in marketing strategy development and content creative; Good project management skills. Results-driven. Ability to effectively support teams working towards the same goal; Maintain a complete understanding of global markets and the gaming industry; Skilled in analytical and critical thinking with the ability to assess KPI data and focus on ROI metrics; Self-motivated, detailed oriented, independent, organized and proactive; highly responsive, flexible, and adaptable when working across multiple business units and product teams; Great teammate with strong collaboration skills who is comfortable with open and consistent communication; Excellent communication, presentation, organizational and writing skills; Knowledge and / or experience in interactive entertainment industries; Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and deal with ambiguity; Avid gamer with extended experience in console and mobile products a plus.

title: 41317-Senior Concept Artist- Marketing
responsibilities: Tencent is a world-leading internet and technology company that develops innovative products and services to improve the quality of life of people around the world. Founded in 1998 with its headquarters in Shenzhen China, our guiding principle is to use technology for good. We are not only a major video game publisher in the world, we also produce other high-quality digital content, enriching interactive entertainment experiences for people around the globe. We offer a range of services such as cloud computing, advertising, FinTech, and other enterprise services to support our clients' digital transformation and business growth. Interactive Entertainment Group (IEG) is responsible for the R&D, operation, and development of the company's interactive entertainment business including games and eSports. Through online gaming, live broadcasts, and offline eSports, IEG assists the company in leading the global interactive entertainment market to create better interactive entertainment content experiences for users. Work alongside the creative team to illustrate industry leading concept and brand art for AAA game marketing. In this exciting role you’ll be creating game covers, key visuals, storyboards for trailers and concepts for marketing campaigns. Responsibilities: - Work with the Creative Director to develop strong concepts and proactive visual solutions. - Work with the producer to adhere to workflow, project tracking, timelines, budgeting. - Concepting for storyboards, key visuals and iconic characters. - The creation of game marketing key assets. - Creation of art resource packages for partners. - Develop and implement processes to increase effectiveness and efficiencies for our clients and team
qualifications: Requirements: - 2-3 years of live action film / games / animation / advertising experience as an illustrator / artist. - Must be able to prioritize and jump from task to task while coordinating with those around you. - Expert Photoshop knowledge. - A strong understanding of anatomy and dynamic posing. - Great at brainstorming, taking direction, collaborating and being part of a team. - Interest / passion for games. - Experience telling stories through dynamic and dramatic keyframe illustrations. - Experience communicating storytelling / blue sky ideas through image sequences, rough sketches, or 3d models. - Ability to explore multiple art directions. - Ability to solve problems creatively in a fast paced environment. - Ability to develop ideas through sketches, take feedback, and take the sketches to a high level of finish. - Z-brush / Keyshot / 3D experience a plus. - A positive attitude and solid oral communication skills. - Adheres to internal and external standards. - Portfolio review will be part of the interview. What we offer Employees are the most valuable assets at Tencent, we customize and cater the best-in-class experience from the moment you apply, throughout your entire employee journey. We can offer, - A fun and exciting career opportunity. - A strong and solid company committed to the grow of its employees. - Competitive remuneration package. - Comprehensive benefits plan.

title: 41317-Senior 3D Artist- Game Marketing
responsibilities: Tencent is a world-leading internet and technology company that develops innovative products and services to improve the quality of life of people around the world. Founded in 1998 with its headquarters in Shenzhen China, our guiding principle is to use technology for good. We are not only a major video game publisher in the world, we also produce other high-quality digital content, enriching interactive entertainment experiences for people around the globe. We offer a range of services such as cloud computing, advertising, FinTech, and other enterprise services to support our clients' digital transformation and business growth. Interactive Entertainment Group (IEG) is responsible for the R&D, operation, and development of the company's interactive entertainment business including games and eSports. Through online gaming, live broadcasts, and offline eSports, IEG assists the company in leading the global interactive entertainment market to create better interactive entertainment content experiences for users. The Senior 3D Artist will work alongside the creative team to create industry leading concept and brand art for AAA game marketing. In this exciting role you’ll be creating high quality assets, high-poly models for CG trailers, upscaling in-game assets, lighting and rendering for game covers, logo animations and basic mo-cap. Responsibilities: - Collaborate with Creative Director and Producer to ensure all aspects of the project are at the highest quality. - Work with the producer to adhere to workflow, project tracking, timelines, budgeting. - Work with concept artist to properly convey approved 2D concepts in 3D. - Sculpt high-poly 3D characters and objects. - Rig and animate 3D characters and objects. - Lighting and rendering at large scale - Create textures for 3D assets. - Upres in-game assets to high-poly for marketing renders. - 3D logo animations. - Intro sequences.
qualifications: Requirements: - 3-4 years of live action film / games / animation / advertising experience as an 3D artist. - Must be able to prioritize and jump from task to task while coordinating with those around you. - Ability to solve problems creatively in a fast paced environment. - Sculpt high-poly 3D characters and objects (high-quality characters is the top priority). - Rig and animate 3D characters and objects. - Lighting and rendering. - Create textures for 3D assets. - Knowledge of multiple suites to work with many assets is needed. (Maya, 3DS Max) - Unreal engine experience is a plus. - A positive attitude and solid oral communication skills. - Adheres to internal and external standards. - Portfolio review will be part of the interview. What we offer - A fun and exciting career opportunity. - A strong and solid company committed to the growth of its employees. - Competitive remuneration package. - Comprehensive benefits plan.

title: 41317-Associate Producer, Creative Marketing
responsibilities: Tencent is a world-leading internet and technology company that develops innovative products and services to improve the quality of life of people around the world. Founded in 1998 with its headquarters in Shenzhen China, our guiding principle is to use technology for good. We are not only a major video game publisher in the world, we also produce other high-quality digital content, enriching interactive entertainment experiences for people around the globe. We offer a range of services such as cloud computing, advertising, FinTech, and other enterprise services to support our clients' digital transformation and business growth. Interactive Entertainment Group (IEG) is responsible for the R&D, operation, and development of the company's interactive entertainment business including games and eSports. Through online gaming, live broadcasts, and offline eSports, IEG assists the company in leading the global interactive entertainment market to create better interactive entertainment content experiences for users. The Associate Producer, Creative Marketing will with a team of creatives making high-quality marketing assets for AAA gaming. Communicate daily with clients to take clear, concise notes and relay them back accurately to the creative team. Create, update and maintain daily internal and client project schedules. Conduct and compile project research when needed. Assist in managing client projects on a daily basis. Maintain relationships and coordinate deliverables with outside partners. Responsibilities: - Work with the Creative Director to develop strong strategic insights and proactive solutions (internal and external). - Work with the production team to manage workflow, analytics, project tracking, timelines, budgeting. - Relationship management with key client contacts and multiple agencies / vendors. - Proactive and strategic thinker with experience in brand marketing, consumer product, research and client reporting functions. - Excellent oral communication as well as presentation and writing skills (both long-form and PowerPoint). - Manage client expectations with the ability to recognize critical issues and resolve them strategically and diplomatically. - Partner with other teams and vendors to provide ongoing added value to our clients through strategic recommendations, POV’s and proposals. - Manage the full creative process from start to finish; specifically project timing and expectations for all deliverables and conduct quality assurance. - Ensures all deliverables (internal, client and partners) are accurate, on time and routed through the appropriate departments for approvals. - Work to coordinate meetings (internally and externally) as well as attend meetings. - Work to write follow-up emails, meeting reports (within 24 hours) and maintain daily / weekly status reports (Agency and Client). - Develop and implement processes to increase effectiveness and efficiencies for our clients and team. - Adheres to internal and external processes.
qualifications: Requirements: - Must have at least 1 - 3 years of experience in a producer, project management or account services role. - Video game industry experience is a plus. - Must have general knowledge of the creative media process. - Must have outstanding verbal and written communication skills. - Must be able to prioritize and jump from task to task while coordinating with those around you. - Must have strong organizational and analytical skills with the ability to contribute on multiple projects at once. - Must be detail oriented, resourceful and have the ability to follow directions. - Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, etc) is mandatory, basic understanding of graphic design applications are a plus. - Ambition, self-motivated, strong work ethic, and willingness to learn. What we offer - A fun and exciting career opportunity. - A strong and solid company committed to the growth of its employees. - Competitive remuneration package. - Comprehensive benefits plan.

Preferred -Technical background (Computer Science or EE). -Gaming, and / or entertainment law experience. -Privacy law experience

title: Research Engineer or Applied Scientist
responsibilities: - Research, develop, implement and optimize algorithms and software solutions related to 3D computer vision and scene understanding, 3D reconstruction, vision robot SLAM, or human pose estimation - Create production level code that is elegant, efficient, and maintainable - Take accountability for solutions that are modular and testable - Build unit testing to prove that your code and solutions truly work - Work closely with hardware and other software engineering teams on tech selections and solutions - When necessary, debug, optimise and aspire to make things excellent
qualifications: - Must hold a Master / MPhil or above degree in computer science, computer vision, computer graphics, robotics, video game programming, or machine learning, or have suitable alternate expertise and experience - Proven track record in research excellence as evidenced by published in at least one of the following conferences as an author, SIGGRAPH, CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, ACCV, WACV, BMVC, ICCP, ISMAR, NeurlPS, ICLR, ICRA, IROS, RSS, or in major CV / CG / Robotics / Machine learning journals - Must be passionate about generating new ideas, solving problems, and building working systems - Must be self-motivated, proven collaborators, good communicators, attentive to details, and keen to learn - Ideally have practical experience working in an academic or industrial research environment - Must have research or development experience in one or more of the following areas: · 3D computer vision, ideally including experience of pose estimation · Deep learning, representation learning, transfer learning · 3D computer graphics, real time rendering algorithm development · Robot SLAM and dense mapping · SFM, stereo, optical flow, and 3D visual reconstruction · Image semantic segmentation and scene understanding · 3D point clouds, mesh and surface geometry model compression · Neural rendering and novel view synthesis · Camera calibration and multi-view geometry - Must be strong computer programmers with software engineering experience and good code-testing and debugging skills. Experience in the following would be advantageous: - Fluent in Python and C / C++ with at least 3 years of experience writing quality code - GPU programming (especially CUDA) - High-level and low-level CPU / DSP level code optimization - Must have strong mathematical skills, familiar with Probability and statistics, and or numerical algorithms, e. g. nonlinear optimization such as Eigen, G2O, Ceres, Levenberg-Marquardt, Gauss-Newton, sparse solver, BLAS, and bundle adjustment - Track record of shipping working code and solutions based on your ideas - Team player, ability to perform in cross functional teams and to share knowledge to others - Good communication skills in English

responsibilities: 1. 对接腾讯云泛互行业头部VIP客户，为客户提供技术咨询服务，维系客户及支持客户的持续高速发展； 2. 理解互联网企业在研发、运营工作中对网络、计算、存储等基础设施的需求，分析其快速发展过程中，在基础设施层面所遇到的挑战和未来的方向； 3. 向客户提供物理设备到云的方案和建议，针对客户业务场景，向客户推荐腾讯云平台所提供的互联网开放能力，并出具可行的、包含应用迁移和数据迁移的上云落地方案； 4. 在客户迁云过程中，根据项目本身的需要，协助研发团队或实施团队（客户或合作伙伴）完成Demo系统搭建，PoC测试及最终迁移工作； 5. 在持续服务中，挖掘 / 获得客户在腾讯云上的新增长点，并组织方案，和产研及相关支持团队紧密协作，逐个落地 6. 负责上云案例、技术方案的更新维护，及相关的布道工作。

title: 15851-游戏计算机视觉AI研究员Game Computer Vision AI Researcher（北京）
responsibilities: 1、研发计算机视觉及图形学的交叉领域在前沿游戏场景下的落地应用 2、与世界顶尖的全栈游戏开发团队一起共同交付人脸及人体重建、表情及动作跟踪及迁移、声音驱动的口型及舞蹈生成等算法系统，及根据需求会涉及到的包括但不限于图像理解、生成算法、NeRF、相机位姿估计、行人跟踪及ReID、重定向等相关技术的研究； 3、跟踪并理解分析工业界及学术界相关方向的最新进展，为业务及技术规划提供参考意见； 4、和光子内各工作室及职能方进行合作，探索前沿游戏内容设计及生成方式，提升游戏内外的玩家体验。 R&D on the techniques of computer vision and computer graphics in the cutting-edge 3D video-gaming scenarios; Work with the world's top full-stack gaming developement team to deliver algorithm systems involving face / body reconstruction, expression / motion tracking and retargeting, music-driven dance generation, speech lip synchronization, as well as other CV / CG related researches including but not limited to image understanding, generation, NeRF, camera pose estimation, pedestrian tracking&ReID, rendering, etc. ; Follow the state of the art of related direction, and provide inspiring ideas for business development; Communicate with other studios / groups within our organization, explore pioneer game design techniques and generation approaches to improve end players' game experience.
qualifications: 1、具有计算机方向的硕士或博士学位，在上述工作内容涉及到的一个或多个领域有过不错的学术或工业产出，同时具备计算机视觉及图形学背景或经验的候选人优先 2、人脸方向上，了解人脸重建、关键点检测、人脸解析、人脸重演、重光照、编辑及风格化等相关技术 3、人体方向上，了解行人重识别、检测跟踪、2D / 3D及单目 / 多目等不同信息源下的关键点（含手指）检测、人体重建、高精度人体骨骼重定向、基于神经网络的动作生成类方法。有多人交互、遮挡场景下的相关处理经验者优先。 4、在图形学方面，尤其是建模、绑定、动画、渲染等方面具备一定的理论或实践经验为佳 5、编码能力良好；熟练掌握PyTorch、TensorFlow等深度学习框架； 具有网络模型加速、压缩等经验，并能较好地根据业务场景针对性改进模型和算法。 6、优秀的分析问题和解决问题的能力，对解决具有挑战性的问题充满激情 7、有较强的研究能力优先，在领域顶级会议如Siggraph, Siggraph ASIA, CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, NeurIPS, TPAMI, ToG, IJCV等发表过高质量论文 8、有一定的抗压能力，业务思维上佳者优先。 9、热爱游戏行业者优先； A Ph. D. or Master in Computer Science, with distinguished work (including but not limited to published papers, industrial projects, etc. ) in related fields, and experience in both computer vision and computer graphics. Familiar with human face research areas, e. g. : face recognition, face keypoint detection, face parsing, face re-lighting, face editing, portrait style transfer, etc. Familiar with human body research areas, including person re-id, person detection, person tracking, body keypoint detection with 2D / 3D input using monocular / multi-view information source, motion retargeting, action generation based on neural networks. Better with experience dealing with challenging scenes: multi-person settings, severe occlusion conditions, etc. Better to have experience involving graphics modeling, rigging / skinning, animation, rendering, etc. Good coding skills, familiar with popular deep learning frameworks (e. g. PyTorch, TensorFlow). Experience in deep model compression, deep model acceleration are highly welcome. Good abilities in analyzing problems; full of enthusiasm for challenges. Better to have outstanding research abilities, authors published influential papers in CV Top conferences (e. g. Siggraph, Siggraph ASIA, CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, NeurIPS, TPAMI, ToG, IJCV) are highly welcome! Positive stress tolerance ability; Good understanding of business intentions. Devoted to Games!

title: TiMi F1 Montreal - Technical Design Director
responsibilities: Award-winning TiMi Studio Group seeks a Technical Design Director to develop a AAA, open-world game based on a new IP. The project will be released on multiple platforms using Unreal’s latest technology. As a Technical Design Director, your role will be to lead the development of content creation pipelines to achieve our creative vision. TiMi Montreal is a new studio within TiMi Studio Group, a subsidiary of Tencent Games. We are passionate about creating compelling worlds for players to explore for years to come. Are you looking to develop the next benchmark in Open World design? Are you passionate about the combination of design, storytelling and technology? Are you someone who cares about team efficiency? Then, come join us in our ambitious endeavor. What will you do? Collaborate with other members of the core team to define a unique, forward thinking and achievable creative vision Develop scalable content production pipeline and tools that support our creative vision Empower and support a team of designers to build content efficiently and consistently Facilitate communication between multiple disciplines to reach common goals Lead a team of technical designers and foster their professional development Stimulate innovation across multiple design disciplines Define performance budgets for each component of the game, optimize data to maximize quality Represent our studio’s core values and create a collaborative and inclusive environment for everyone
qualifications: What we’re looking for? At least eight years of professional AAA game development experience At least having shipped two AAA open world titles, including one during the current generation of video games (PS4 / XBOX ONE) Strong technical proficiency with game development tools and technology Solid understanding of the video game industry and market Team player with an ability to communicate technical concepts to non-technical people Good communication and presentation skills Share a passion to innovate, especially in the design and development of open world games Experience developing in and extending Unreal Engine 4 a plus What’s in it for you? Create AAA multi-platform games with ample resources and support: Bring incredible game ideas to players around the world with the support of one of the most successful studios in the world. TiMi has developed some of the most popular games worldwide and is looking for talented individuals to join it in making another major hit. Develop for global audiences and make an impression on the entire industry: Join TiMi in making games as part of an ambitious, talented, and seasoned team. Create new worlds for players to explore, experience and enjoy: Join a team who cares about innovation and wants to delight players with new creative game design for open world experiences. Help create the next great game world for players to immerse in for decades to come.

title: PCG17-前端Tech Lead
responsibilities: 负责游戏中心、平台增值、QQ直播、商业广告等项目的Web 前端架构设计和研发，指引开发团队的技术方向、方案把关及技术团队管理工作； 建设 Web 前端团队的技术氛围，提升团队的技术能力、开发效率，打造高水平的技术团队； 钻研各种前沿技术和创新交互，增强用户体验、开拓前端能力边界； 推动和引导部分内技术项目的方案最优化及快速落地； 对于现有系统持续优化，对团队基础功能组件抽像，对基础能力的规划和积累，以及具体的实现及落地； 把关团队代码质量及技术导向，推动技术在产品上的实际使用及效果提升，推动技术中台项目在业务侧的落地；
qualifications: 本科及以上学历，计算机科学与技术相关专业，从事Web 前端开发8年及以上工作经验； 熟悉 Web 性能优化，有移动 Web 或 Hybrid App 或 RN 开发调试及优化经验者优先； 具备较好的计算机基础，掌握至少一门服务器端编程语言，熟悉 HTTP、HTTPS 等常见网络协议，有服务器运维经验者优先； 能对现有产品和开发流程进行观察和思考，提出优化改进方案，具备良好的学习能力和分析解决问题能力，责任心强；有一定的产品sense； 较强的学习能力，具备良好的知识沉淀习惯，有技术博客撰写、Github 开源项目者优先； 热爱分享、开源，有开源项目维护经验优先； 对系统优化和前沿技术有兴趣并保持关注，能紧跟业界最新技术，最好是某个前端领域的专家； 熟悉算法、对 AI 方面有兴趣优先； 有大型 web 项目性能极限优化、实时通信系统开发经验优先；

title: PCG17-客户端Tech Lead
responsibilities: 1、负责客户端架构设计和开发 2、负责客户端高性能渲染和离线数据处理开发 3、负责钻研各种前沿技术和创新交互，增强用户体验 4、负责研发团队技术升级和前沿探索 5、思考和提升研发团队研发效率和质量
qualifications: 1. 熟悉游戏分发、直播、增值支付、广告等商业场景相关业务逻辑，具有相关领域解决方案和架构设计经验 2. 能指导研发团队构建基础服务组件，打造行业最优用户体验 3. 能指导研发团队进行新技术研究和应用，并推动落地到项目 4. 具有扎实的技术基础，了解客户端架构，了解移动和桌面平台开发技术，了解跨平台和动态化开发框架 5. 有较强的学习能力和解决问题的能力，具有行业和技术前瞻视野和探索精神。

title: PCG17-游戏产品中心-游戏运营（深圳）
responsibilities: 1、 负责手Q游戏中心精品手游和小游戏运营对接工作； 2、 对游戏有深刻理解，能根据QQ用户游戏属性，制定游戏优化方案，从而提升游戏整体活跃和收入，包括但不限于对玩法创意、功能优化、提升资源效率等； 3、围绕游戏全生命周期，制定行之有效的运营策略，针对QQ用户多重属性进行精细化运营，并能及时调整运营策略； 4、 具备很强的沟通能力，与项目各角色进行有效沟通，确保高效协作完成目标； 5、 对各内容平台用户偏好、内容机制有一定理解，具备游戏行业和内容的精准洞察。
qualifications: 1、本科及以上学历，3年以上手游或小游戏平台运营经验； 2、热爱游戏，密切关注游戏行业动态，有游戏平台相关运营经验者优先； 3、具备良好的逻辑思维能力及创新能力，具备良好的数据敏锐度； 4、具备良好的跨团队沟通协调能力，合作意识强，抗压能力强。

title: PCG17-游戏产品中心-平台产品策划（深圳）
responsibilities: 负责游戏中心核心渠道用户增长：主导增长各个环节的策略设计、输出和最终落地，并梳理过程中的关键路径，配合团队北极星指标的达成，最终为游戏分发效果负责。
qualifications: 本科及以上学历，2年以上互联网产品策划相关工作经历； 负责并主导过游戏分发平台类互联网产品的策划，有比较强的数据分析能力； 具备强烈的自我驱动能力，使命必达，善于分析市场及提炼用户需求； 具备用户增长方面的理论和实践能力，能够结合社交平台流量特点，提升平台手游和小游戏分发效率； 热爱游戏，有丰富游戏经历者优先。

title: PCG17-直播中心-平台内容运营（深圳）
responsibilities: 1、有较高的内容敏感性和策划能力，能够有效策划组织用户喜闻乐见的直播内容，不断挖掘和创造新的直播内容线，对直播内容的观看时长和互动率负责； 2、擅长对外沟通，能够有效调动MCN、公会等合作伙伴的力量为平台贡献更多的优质内容节目，提高平台优质内容占比； 3、围绕核心数据进行内容设计，通过完整闭环的内容玩法 / 大型综艺节目策划，提高直播用户的活跃和回流；擅长数据复盘，能够结合用户反馈不断对内容进行优化迭代。
qualifications: 1、3年以上大型互联网产品相关工作经验，有大型内容策划、直播行业从业经验者优先； 2、内容敏感，数据敏感，良好的数据分析能力，有利用内容带动用户活跃的经验者优先； 3、较强的执行力、沟通力和推动能力，能承受较大的工作压力。

title: PCG17-游戏产品中心-后台开发工程师（深圳）
responsibilities: 1. 负责手机QQ游戏中心用户侧后台服务的设计和开发工作，基于云原生技术栈，构建高并发、高可靠的后台服务，实现产品需求，提升用户在游戏中心的体验； 2. 负责手Q游戏中心运营平台设计和开发工作，通过搭建一站式游戏运营资源平台，包括游戏、资源和数据的闭环管理，支撑内外部高效率运营能力； 3. 负责手机QQ游戏中心用户数据处理服务的设计和开发工作，基于主流实时和离线数据处理平台，完成海量游戏和运营数据的加工处理，为游戏中心的日常运营提供基础数据支撑；
qualifications: 本科以上学历，计算机相关专业； 对后台开发有浓厚的激情，热爱编程，具有一定的后台Server架构设计、开发以及性能调优能力； 3年以上Unix、Linux下C \ C++ \ golang开发经验，有一定的理解和开发经验； 熟悉Unix、Linux操作系统原理及常用工具； 熟悉TCP / IP等网络协议、进程间通讯编程，熟悉Unix / Linux下常用架构设计方法； 熟悉Mysql等数据库，熟悉NoSQL存储； 熟悉常用的数据结构与算法，具备良好的分析解决问题能力； 主动好学，责任心强，具有良好的对外沟通和团队协作能力，能独立承担任务，有系统进度把控能力，能承受一定工作压力； 有大容量通信系统开发经验、异地容灾部署的相关经验者优先； 有复杂后台运营平台系统、实时流计算处理系统的相关经验者优先；

title: 43470-资深3D角色美术
responsibilities: 与内部资深专家共事，解决源源不断的技术难题，做行业最前沿的探索研究。 助力腾讯游戏合作伙伴3D角色美术品质优化，向合作伙伴提供专业的3D角色美术设计支持，包括项目研发和发行阶段的美术原画整体风格设定、设计质量把控、技术支持等； 远程专业指导或现场攻坚，可能存在不定时出差情况，助力合作伙伴3D角色美术质量提升； 协助推动合作伙伴美术开发标准和流程的制定和优化，助力合作伙伴人才培养。
qualifications: 5年以上游戏美术工作经验，有至少一个完整项目的研发经验，具备3A游戏开发经验者优先； 对画面处理有较好理解和沉淀，具有较强的手绘能力和学习能力，能快速适应各种游戏风格的制作和要求； 对游戏行业有热情，关注行业技术更新，热爱3D角色发展方向，会主动学习和更新有关3D角色的技术理念，引导合作伙伴不断改进提高游戏美术表现力； 熟练使用3dsMax或Maya、Zbrush、Marvelous Designer、Substance Painter、UE4等开发制作软件 ； 对游戏引擎（如UE、Unity3d等)有一定了解； 具有较强的责任心、团队合作能力与沟通表达能力； 应聘简历请务必附带作品" 特别优秀者可酌情放宽

title: 33676-内容电商经理
responsibilities: 1. 负责腾讯Nintendo Switch在电商平台的店铺自播与大V直播工作； 2. 根据公司的产品战略与电商渠道的定位，制定支持销售发展的直播、内容考核目标； 3. 与电商渠道直播频道负责人、内容负责人沟通，指导进在天猫、京东、抖音等卖货直播agency的表现； 4. 挑选内部游戏运营团队与内容生产团队的产出，在电商平台进行合理分发，与直播机构产出销售导向类的内容填补内容空白； 5. 监控指导官方旗舰店直播内容的形象设立与装修维护，保证账号的规律性与人格统一； 6. 配合游戏运营团队与平台内容营销团队，指导供应商完成电商活动的直播策划与落地； 7. 积极开拓短视频带货与内容向直播运营玩法，对社群内容社交平台等新渠道不断尝试； 8. 与电商销售、市场团队配合，大促期间自播与直播的销售效果，带货转化率。
qualifications: 1. 熟悉社交电商平台与内容带货玩法，有直播行业从业经验或钻研经验； 2. 有较强的用户洞察能力，能发掘消费者与用户痛点，对爆点事件有敏感度； 3. 良好的数据分析能力与商业敏锐度，熟练使用Excel PPT等办公软件； 4. 学习能力强，工作态度积极，擅于不同部门与团队间的沟通与资源协调； 5. 本科以上学历，2年以上社交电商、内容营销或直播带货从业经验；

title: 33676-连锁零售渠道销售经理
responsibilities: 管理KA连锁零售渠道的销售以及运营工作，完成季度 / 全年销售目标，提高单店产出以及其他核心KPI； 完成全年和阶段性开店目标，开拓新渠道，包括会员制商超以及传统数码3C零售渠道，区域连锁客户等； 对接KA渠道的采购经理和市场经理，制定相应的产品销售策略，以及和KA渠道客户市场部展开合作，争取相应的展陈位置，开展市场宣传和市场活动，提高品牌在该渠道的曝光和推动销售； 维护KA渠道的客户关系，建立公司与重点KA的高层关系，达成深入战略合作； 定期收集KA渠道的销售数据，根据销售数据以及客户情况协助制定KA连锁渠道的渠道策略并执行，优化KA渠道整体投入； 管理终端陈列，配合市场活动，配合公司整体市场策略需求执行落地并对结果负责； 组织KA渠道店员以及促销员培训，监管总代转训效果，并反向输出培训需求； 组建和管理总代KA销售团队以及终端促销员团队，巡店、到店培训，管理促销员；赋能促销员包括终端客户体验产品，介绍产品，提升销售业绩，执行市场营销活动。
qualifications: 1. 本科即以上学历，具备至少3年相关线下连锁零售体系销售经验。有会员制商超或其他新兴零售渠道经验优先。 2. 具有较好的责任心、结果导向、一定的抗压能力。 3. 熟练掌握Excel, Power point等办公软件。 4. 熟练的中英文读写能力，并能使用英文进行基本的工作交流

title: 52909-高级游戏数据分析
responsibilities: 工作职责： - 负责游戏筹备期的数据分析体系搭建，包括TLOG埋点、日志上报、分析系统规划等工作； - 负责日常数据分析工作，从数据分析的角度为研发和运营的各个模块提供决策依据； - 负责游戏各节点的效果分析，包括留存及流失分析，玩法模式分析，商业化效果分析等，并能依据数据表现提出合理建议，为后续调优提供依据； - 与区域团队和用研团队配合，协助支持产品的版本调研和专项研究工作； - 与公司平台部门合作，协助支持产品的数据平台搭建，包括数据系统的搭建维护、精细化运营建设等。
qualifications: 要求： - 本科及以上学历，3年以上游戏数据分析相关工作经验，熟悉海外游戏市场或，有海外项目运营经验者优先 - 对数据敏感，具备较强的逻辑思维和数据分析能力，擅长从数据角度进行深入挖掘研究； - 能熟练使用SQL，且熟练掌握excel、SQL、Python / R等分析工具，实现常用统计模型分析及结果解释 ； - 了解各项数据指标含义、以及游戏各阶段数据生态，有完整的游戏项目分析经验者优先； - 热爱PC / Console游戏，精通FPS或开放世界RPG游戏者优先； - 具备一定的英文书写和沟通能力

title: 31504-平台前端开发工程师（CSIG全资子公司）
responsibilities: 1、精通HTML5 + CSS3 + JavaScript(ES6+) + Webpack 技术栈，熟悉Web组件编程思想，能够熟练运用至少一款2、主流的JS框架，具有良好的代码风格、接口设计与程序架构，有主导基于ReactJS组件研发设计大型Web应用项目经验为佳； 3、至少掌握一种服务器端编程语言，熟练SQL查询，熟悉前后台联合开发的技术原理和协作流程； 4、具有高度的责任心、勇于承担责任； 积极主动，敢于接受挑战，性格开朗，有较强的团队合作精神。 工作地：重庆 / 西安
qualifications: 1、负责腾讯云IAAS智能化运维平台的前端工作； 2、负责web前端页面的开发，维护和优化工作； 3、负责前端框架的搭建，公共组件的开发和维护。 注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗位

title: 25667-腾讯云运营商行业架构师（北 / 上 / 广 / 深 / 成都）
responsibilities: 负责运营商行业客户的咨询规划，在行业方案上进行前瞻性布局，能够与行业中高层客户进行有效沟通，准确识别中长期市场机会，挖掘运营商IaaS、PaaS、SaaS在技术和业务能力的合作需求； 负责腾讯云运营商行业方案或产品的售前支持，具体包括项目的技术咨询、方案编写、现场讲解、用户答疑、招投标等工作； 根据客户需求，协助客户进行云服务产品测试，并收集测试过程中遇到的问题反馈给后端，整理重点客户现有IT架构和业务情况； 熟悉招投标流程、有丰富的投标经验，能够独立完成招投标文件的编制工作； 协助产品、交付团队进行项目实施，保障项目方案顺利交付落地，推动行业产品持续打磨优化。
qualifications: 大学本科以上学历，5年以上运营商行业经验，3年以上售前解决方案与咨询规划经验； 熟悉云计算、人工智能、大数据等技术在运营商业务中的应用，熟悉各大云厂商的产品特点与市场格局，对运营商自用IT系统和产业互联网ICT业务有清晰了解； 掌握IT咨询方法论，有运营商行业产品或方案顶层设计经验； 具备与客户部门总经理、技术负责人等关键人员的沟通能力和技巧，能够影响上述人员的技术决策； 具有优秀的学习能力，良好的承压和问题解决能力，习惯于寻找创新方法来达成目标； 较强的方案（PPT、WORD）演讲和呈现能力，良好的沟通和表达能力； 通过腾讯云技术认证或同等资格认证的优先录用。

title: 21227-大IP-MMO手游本地化策划
responsibilities: 1、负责知名IP MMO手游的本地化策划，可针对游戏的数值、玩法、经济循环、社交系统等进行针对性调优，并协作研发团队落地实现； 2、负责产品的商业化设计，如定价策略、投放、商业化活动等内容，完善运营节奏、并协作研发团队落地实现； 3、通过用研、数据分析等手段，负责产品及用户数据调优，对产品转化的各关键节点，如新用户转化、留存、老用户活跃、流失用户召回等各环节持续优化。
qualifications: 1、3年以上游戏研发 / 本地化策划相关工作经验，成熟MMO手游研发数值策划、有长线运营经验者优先； 2、了解热门端手游MMO产品的核心设计，对MMO品类有较深的理解与洞察； 3、优秀的沟通、协调能力，责任心强，能够协调内外部团队推进工作，并具有较强的抗压能力； 4、优秀的数据分析、定位问题并迭代优化产品的能力； 5、对游戏策划工作富有激情、具备持续钻研学习的自驱力；

title: CSIG17-AI智能助手测试工程师（CSIG全资子公司）（武汉）
responsibilities: 负责语音助手相关ToB业务质量保障工作及开放平台质量保障工作，开放平台对外输出腾讯在AI领域特别是人机对话场景中的各项领先技术，在各种行业方向上和多家优质企业进行了深度的合作，包括腾讯车联网，智能家居，智能音箱，智能穿戴，智能机器人，文旅等领域都有合作。具体工作内容如下： 1、负责开放平台的质量保障及ToB业务定制需求的质量保障工作，负责全流程质量管控，包括参与需求分析，帮助完善需求与开发设计实现，合理设计测试计划，实施测试活动，跟进缺陷，协助研发分析定位问题； 2、负责产品相关的测试方案，测试工具平台，自动化测试架构设计及实现工作； 3、保证被测系统的质量，并通过测试流程和方法创新，提升研发的质量和效率 注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗位
qualifications: 1、计算机或软件相关专业，本科及以上学历，具备扎实的计算机和软件技术基础； 2、有扎实的测试基础，能独立负责一个产品线的测试工作 3、有良好的学习能力和技术钻研能力，具有自我持续优化的驱动力，具有发现问题的灵敏嗅觉，具备针对复杂问题的分析和解决的能力 4、具备良好的团队合作精神，善于协调沟通，具备较高的问题推动解决能力。 5、有ToB相关质量管理经验和较强项目管理能力者优先考虑 6、有相关的自动化测试、专项测试或白盒测试工具和平台建设者优先；

title: CSIG17-车联网产品测试工程师（腾讯云全资子公司）（武汉）
responsibilities: 负责车联网车载方案质量保障，负责和产品开发等人员密切合作，通过质量内建，过程管控等，全程全面推动质量达到交付要求。 根据产品需求，拟定产品测试方案，编写测试用例，准备测试数据，搭建测试环境； 定位分析软件缺陷问题点，对研发设计方案、优化方案给出合理建议； 高效组织软件全覆盖测试，包括功能、性能、安全性等，确保软件发布质量； 与产品经理，项目经理和开发成员积极沟通，主动积极推动问题的解决。 注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制岗位。
qualifications: 计算机相关专业，本科及以上学历，三年以上开发或系统交付工作经验； 熟悉C / C++ / Java等至少一种编程语言; 有app性能、安全、白盒测试等专业测试领域经验者优先； 有小程序框架测试经验者优先； 精通测试流程和测试用例设计方法,能主动进行技术钻研； 解决复杂问题和编写自动测试工具和系统的能力； 很强的逻辑思维能力，谈判的能力和冲突管理的能力； 善于团队合作，理解和适应变化，以结果和行动为准则，努力追求成功。

title: 15569-QQ飞车手游-高级系统策划
responsibilities: 负责qq飞车手游系统设计，包含核心模块，目标系统、社交系统及各种功能系统； 系统设计过程中，关注功能、规则、表格设计、交互体验和视觉、听觉反馈； 设计过程中拥有一定的创新维度能力，以及拥有独立的思维逻辑和设计方法； 系统设计中对基础玩家情绪和情感有一定的理解和认知，有一定的细节设计； 跟进、分析统计数据，根据数据和反馈来制定后续优化方案并跟进具体开发； 关注自身产品以及同类竞品的运营状况，从用户侧理解用户痛点并解决问题。

title: Machine Learning Researcher (Internship)
responsibilities: Responsibilities: - Research on machine learning / deep learning algorithms and follow up with the latest researches. - Build data-driven game products, including product analysis, algorithm design, implementation and maintenance.
qualifications: - MS / PhD in Computer Science, mathematics, statistics or other related fields. - Familiar with at least one programing language, e. g. Python / C++ / Scala / SQL / R is required. - Good knowledge in statistical analysis (probabilities, hypothesis testing, multivariate analysis, time series analysis, generalized linear model, A / B test) is preferred. - Experience with large-scale data analysis frameworks such as Hadoop or Spark is preferred. - Publications in relevant Tier 1 conference / journal is preferred. - Good knowledge in reinforcement learning, recommendation system, natural language processing or computer vision is preferred.

title: 54878-高级运维工程师
responsibilities: 负责腾讯游戏海外技术运营规划的工作,协调并推动技术团队保障服务处于高可用的水平； 理解海外游戏上云对计算、存储、网络、CDN等需求，基于云的产品及架构，输入满足业务需求的服务解决方案； 组织解决业务上线过程及长期运营中，遇到的技术问题，发现运营风险及技术难点，优化业务流程，优化游戏架构，提升运维工作效率和服务质量； 与项目组建立良好的合作沟通与信任关系，对业务存在的风险问题进行定期反馈和改善跟进，保障业务稳定运行。
qualifications: 熟悉游戏行业以及云计算，五年以上游戏、互联网、和云计算行业工作经验； 熟悉游戏运维以及云上运维，有AWS / Azure / 阿里云 / 腾讯云等行业产品使用经验，熟悉云的基础产品功能以及使用场景； 熟悉linux操作系统运维，具有快速定位问题和问题解决能力； 熟悉Kubernetes和Docker等相关的容器技术，有实际生产的平台运维或开发经验； 精通掌握Shell，熟悉至少一门开发语言（go / python均可），具备底层脚本开发能力； 逻辑思维能力强，高度的责任心和学习接受能力，善于思考，勇于接受有挑战的工作； 具备英语的交流和沟通能力者优先。

qualifications: 1. 本科及以上相关学历，3年以上互联网或游戏类产品 / 社区相关产品经验，具有完整的项目经验及独立产品策划能力； 2. 了解各类型游戏是某个品类的资深玩家，能够深刻洞察用户需求，具有成熟游戏社区搭建经验者优先； 3. 具备良好的项目管理能力，熟悉产品设计开发的各流程环节，较强的项目推动力，确保项目进程和准时交付； 4. 数据驱动意识强，对用户体验有深刻理解，产品逻辑清晰，具有从0到1搭建方法论的策略能力。

title: 30361-腾讯文档前端开发工程师（武汉）
responsibilities: 负责文档新品类前端架构设计和开发； 负责结合业务场景，规划合理的需求与架构，解决实际问题； 负责 Code Review，持续和团队一起输出高质量代码； 负责团队建设和新员工培养。
qualifications: 本科及以上学历，8年及以上前端开发工作经验； 2年以上团队管理经验； 计算机基础知识扎实，熟悉常见数据结构、算法和设计模式； 对新技术持有敏感性以及愿意致力于新技术的探索和研究； 强烈的责任心和团队精神，具有良好的沟通能力； 有文档编辑器或低代码平台开发经验者优先。

title: 43470-资深UE引擎工程师
responsibilities: 与内部资深专家共事，解决源源不断的技术难题，做行业最前沿的探索研究。 对外部游戏研发的技术方案进行协助和把控，针对重难点问题设计解决方案，跟进落地； 负责商业引擎的开发与扩展（动画，物理，光照，资源管理等）； 负责引擎及客户端的性能优化； 注前沿技术，设计与实现高效的美术与资源管线，提升项目的研发效率与品质，推动工业化建设； 能与团队进行良好沟通，提升游戏体验，提高游戏品质。
qualifications: 5年以上C++及游戏客户端研发经验，深度使用过UE进行大项目开发，有开放世界项目经验更佳。对UE有定制化和扩展经验，对游戏研发技术有系统的了解与关注。 有丰富的引擎开发实践经验，了解关键技术原理，有实际的二次开发和维护经验。 在渲染，动画，物理，场景，性能，资源管理等其中某一技术领域有丰富经验。 具备良好的解决问题能力，出色的学习与研究应用能力以及良好的沟通协作能力。

title: 54877-Web前端开发工程师
responsibilities: 1. 负责腾讯游戏海外技术中台统一工作台架构设计和实现； 2. 负责腾讯游戏海外技术中台账号&组件配套运营系统设计和实现； 3. 负责团队前端技术规范制定、推动团队技术升级迭代。
qualifications: 1、计算机相关专业本科以上学历； 3年以上前端开发工作经验； 2、至少精通VUE、React其中一种前端框架，并了解其技术生态圈； 3、有主导前端的技术方案设计的能力和经验； 4、能使用前端业界主流解决方案实现业务需求； 精通前端性能优化方案；精通网络安全知识； 5、有良好的分析和解决问题的能力； 有较强的责任心和主动性，良好的团队协作能力；抗压能力强

title: 54877-运营开发工程师
responsibilities: 1. 负责腾讯游戏海外技术中台账号&组件运营系统的架构设计与后台实现； 2. 负责腾讯游戏海外技术中台统一工作台架构设计和实现； 3. 负责团队后端技术规范制定、推动团队技术升级迭代。
qualifications: 1、本科以上学历，计算机相关专业，2年以上Unix / Linux下C / C++、Go开发经验，熟悉面向对象设计； 2、熟悉Unix / Linux操作系统原理、系统管理命令、开发工具； 熟悉分布式 的常用架构设计方法； 3、熟悉Mysql、Redis等数据库，熟悉数据库原理，熟悉常用的NoSQL存储； 4、 精通网络编程、熟悉网络知识，熟悉TCP / IP协议； 5、具备全面的软件知识结构认知（操作系统、软件工程、设计模式、数据结构、数据库系统、网络安全）； 6、具备良好的分析解决问题能力，能独立承担任务，有项目进度把控能力； 7、责任心强，具有良好的对外沟通和团队协作能力，主动，好学； 8、有游戏运营系统相关开发经验的相关经验者优先；

title: 15575-《王者荣耀》国际版资深游戏视觉设计（成都）
responsibilities: 负责王者荣耀UI界面的整体视觉设计包装； 对UI设计概念的深挖和验证； 游戏内相关ICON和LOGO的设计产出； UI资源的输出和管理； UI界面版本的还原跑查及调整； UI界面动效的概念产出。

title: Xi'an
31506-研发高级项目经理
responsibilities: 1. 负责产品线研发项目管理以及重点攻坚项目的研发项目管理工作； 2. 纵向以支持产品线收入突破按时高质量打造卓越产品为目标，建立产品线从客户需求及问题处理、到产研规划、项目开发、测试、打磨以及发布的全过程管理； 3. 横向负责建立产品线PMO研发规范、流程制定、落地推动、从而提升研发与前场各角色的握手机制的落地执行，达到客户满意度提升，研发高效有节奏地打造卓越产品的目的； 4. 要求具备丰富的toB端研发项目管理经验，有丰富的沟通协调能力以解决客户侧需求到产研规划各角色之间的人财物等各类问题； 5. 有丰富的经验以建立整体管理机制以及各个环节的标准、规范、流程、落地机制、质量和效率提升的度量以及推动团队文化建设； 6. 执行力强，抗压能力强，能有效分解工作，将多而杂的工作高效率分解提炼，通过有效的管理方法和工具，化繁为简，提升整体效率；
qualifications: 1. 5年以上toB项目管理工作经验； 2. 有专业的项目管理理论基础和基于自身实践的方法论 / 方法体系，熟悉研发管理体系标准、规范、流程、机制建设，有丰富的落地经验； 3. 曾负责大规模研发团队项目管理、项目群、项目集、项目组合管理等； 4. 目标感强，有独立思考和判断能力、执行力强、不墨守成规、个人影响力强； 5. 勇于探索和创新管理方法，擅长挖掘和构建项目管理工具、平台、流程以及规范； 6. 工作态度积极主动，自信阳光，抗压能力强，不怕困难，敢于担当。

title: 29777-工业行业生态高级运营经理

title: 15618-UE4技术美术
responsibilities: 担任UE4项目技术美术，完成相关美术管线和工具开发; 指导美术团队高效的推进制作，提升美术生产效率，实现高品质的画面效果。
qualifications: 3年以上游戏美术或者TA开发经验； 熟悉Houdini引擎和工具，有参与过程序化管线的开发，并在项目中有落地的经验； 可以灵活运用Houdini内置功能节点、VOP功能、Houdini表达式、VEX语言等方法打通制作思路； 对Houdini和其他程序生成软件的更新与发展有敏锐的嗅觉，对美术生产效率的提高有着不懈追求； 可以对目标效果做出规律的分析与拆解，并找到还原思路； 熟悉场景美术各部分的制作流程和工具并有相关经验； 熟悉python编程，有c++开发能力优先； 熟悉UE4引擎以及有实际的项目经验这优先； 较好的学习能力和交流沟通能力； 面试需要附带个人项目技术成果展示，和相关作品。

title: 15585-国际IP大世界幻想写实手游-引擎开发工程师
responsibilities: 1. 定制引擎，包含但不限于前沿的渲染、动画、物理或寻路方案；定制引擎底层功能模块； 2. 优化IOS / Android上的游戏性能； 3. 配合TA / LD共同制订3D美术 / 动画 / 关卡制作标准及工作流； 4. 开发引擎配套工具。
qualifications: 1. 有MMO大型游戏开发经验（或熟悉）； 2. 熟悉游戏引擎架构及主流游戏图形算法，熟悉C++； 3. 有UE4引擎开发经验， 熟悉UE4渲染管线及线程模型、完整UE4项目上线经验为佳； 4. 熟悉3D美术相关（如场景、角色、动画、特效）工作流； 5. 熟悉移动端性能优化及崩溃分析，熟悉移动端CPU和GPU架构； 6. 了解Android NDK或IOS XCODE平台C++开发。 7. 热爱游戏，沟通、协作能力强，有责任心。

responsibilities: 1、负责腾讯云DDoS高防安全产品后端运营运维平台的架构设计； 2、负责运营运维平台的前后端开发，如运维配置工具、监控告警看板等； 3、负责质量相关关键指标的持续分析和运营，用指标促进能力的建设提升。
qualifications: 1、本科及以上学历，计算机类或相关专业，具备2年及以上运营开发经验； 2、至少熟悉1门开发语言：Python、Go、C / C++，熟悉MYSQL或其他大型数据库，熟悉Web开发框架优先； 3、具有良好的学习能力、沟通能力、团队合作意识；强烈的责任心和主动性； 4、有安全产品运营支持系统、质量监控等开发经验者优先。 注：此岗位为腾讯集团旗下全资子公司编制

title: Shenzhen

title: SD3-顶级IP移动手游-高级游戏技术策划
responsibilities: 连接程序和策划，能从开发者和使用者的双重角度参与玩法开发和工具完善，提供符合项目需求的解决方案；密切关注开发流程中的痛点，配合开发团队合作推进开发流程优化，提升开发效率；能够运用编辑工具和脚本语言，进行模式原型、地图场景、技能、AI等与玩法相关联的内容制作
qualifications: 熟练掌握至少一款主流商业引擎，UE4最佳； 有一定的脚本能力，有计算机相关背景者优先； 有不错动手能力和问题解决能力，能独立完成游戏原型功能设计和实现，熟练使用一款或多款游戏编辑器者优先，如csgo-hammer、魔兽编辑器、Dota2编辑器等，有成熟玩法作品的地图作者优先； 具备射击游戏相关的设计经验，包括关卡，系统，AI等，或者热爱射击游戏，具备主流射击游戏经历

title: SD3-顶级IP移动手游-高级 / 资深角色策划
responsibilities: 1、负责角色的能力设计、调整与开发推进落地 2、负责角色的数值规划与平衡性调整 3、推进角色的表现实现，把控和持续优化如打击感、动作反馈等体验反馈
qualifications: 本科或以上学历，3年以上游戏从业经验，1年以上射击游戏从业经验； 良好的逻辑性与角色设计能力，熟悉竞技游戏的角色设计要素且有一定积累，包括且不限于动作表现、打击体验、技能定位、手感及结构关系等； 良好的推动能力与抗压能力；

title: SD3-顶级IP移动手游-高级关卡策划
responsibilities: 1、负责竞技地图的设计与推进，并持续优化打磨 2、参与开放性地图的设计规划和推进，平衡地图体验要素 3、参与新模式与玩法的设计

title: SD3-顶级IP移动手游-高级 / 资深玩法策划
responsibilities: 对战斗相关的关卡、枪械、数值、角色等进行设计和把控，确保各方面能够符合整体的战斗设计体验； 对研发过程中战斗相关的资源和设计规划进行协调把控，确保战斗模块的持续迭代研发和优化； 能够快速对特定产品的关卡进行拆解分析，提炼核心设计要素，进行海外本地化改造和优化创新。
qualifications: 3年以上网络游戏战斗设计相关的工作经验，有完整FPS项目或海外项目经验者优先； 对战斗系统有深入的研究和经验，熟悉国内外各类主流游戏玩法设计，在玩法和枪械设计方面有较成熟的方法论； 具备一定的数值理解能力或设计功底，有使用过UE4、Unity（或其它3D游戏编辑器）制作关卡的经验； 抗压、沟通能力强，有强烈的主人翁意识及团队合作能力。

title: SD3-顶级IP移动手游-高级 / 资深系统策划
responsibilities: 1、负责游戏内的战斗外系统开发与迭代优化，基于用户需求洞察持续推动新系统的设计与实现，包括但不限于社交系统，竞技排位系统，成就系统，收藏系统等。 2、发掘需求，设计并推动新系统和功能的落地，合理规划用户成长体系及过程中的资源投放，促进玩家的长期留存和活跃度。 3、基于玩家需求变化与市场特点，在游戏内设计开发新的创意内容及体验系统，与版本事件 / 营销热点及重点内容结合形成联动体验，促进玩家参与热情与持续活跃。
qualifications: 本科或以上学历，2年以上游戏从业经验，1年以上射击游戏从业经验； 良好的逻辑性与游戏周边系统设计能力，熟悉竞技游戏的周边系统设计，包括且不限于社交系统、排位系统及生涯系统等；能够从用户引导、社交巩固及成长拓展等角度出发，挖掘和设计新游戏系统来提升玩家体验，促进玩家增长与留存。 良好的推动能力与抗压能力； 热爱游戏行业，游戏经验丰富，熟悉了解国内游戏市场； 为人正直，积极上进，有良好的人际沟通能力及环境适应能力； 英语流利沟通者优先考虑。

title: Software Testing Intern (2023 graduate)

Improve quality, efficiency and depth of testing process.

Experience in mobile, console and PC games. - Strong knowledge of software development. Experience in C / C++ / Java / Python / PHP / GO. - Strong knowledge of LINUX. Familiarity with Internet Protocols such as TCP / IP, HTTP, etc. - Excellent execution and ability to handle stress. Provide feedbacks and think proactively.

title: PCG17-游戏产品中心-高级平台增长运营
responsibilities: 1、 负责QQ游戏中心平台运营，支持手游、小游戏等各形态游戏产品在游戏中心、QQ内外合作场景的平台运营业务，强化用户对QQ游戏中心的渠道认知，提升用户平台粘性。 2、 梳理平台运营策略，提炼核心目标、拆解对应增长指标，针对策略假设设计科学实验方案，回收效果数据，最终保障目标达成； 3、 建立游戏运营、产品等横向团队的协作机制，推动中心化平台的运营能力和推广渠道的能力升级和共建，不端创新流量运营工具和效率； 4、 根据平台用户特征、结合游戏大事件等，构思平台个性化运营方案，包括不限于年度大事件、节日和热点活动、日常专题等，整合内外合作渠道资源，保障推广效果最大化； 5、 针对不同合作场景特征和诉求，搭建长线合作机制，持续探索和尝试新的合作关系，保障合作场景分发目标达成；

title: 41314-Compliance Manager
responsibilities: Compliance & audit professional-oriented leader position, mainly to assist the team and the industry compliance field to align. 1. Responsible to build up the company's compliance system, standards and process; have an excellent collaboration with legal team and expert team, to manage the compliance review of games and products. 2. Have good insight into compliance industry dynamic condition, quickly identify policy information, improve and optimize the management and process. 3. Responsible for the planning and implementation of business audit, cooperation with external consulting companies to keep and protect the business in compliance status. 4. Cultivate team learning atmosphere and continuously improve the professional ability of team members
qualifications: 1. Bachelor degree or above, experience in leading a team, with 5 years or more experience in security assessment or IT audit of famous professional consulting companies or large multinational enterprises, understanding the global compliance regulatory requirements and certification qualification requirements in various regions 2. Familiar with the Internet business processes (development / product / marketing process etc. ); experience in internet / game industry will be preferred. 3. Familiar with global privacy regulations in various regions, with extensive global privacy experience, including privacy principles / standards, operational legal security framework and compliance solutions, and have excellent partnership with legal teams 4. Familiar with IT audit, information security management, IT / technology risk management, able to solve compliance risk issues 5. Understand the security control items of technology / application, can use ISO27001, ISO20000, ITIL and COBIT flexibly for information security management, IT service management etc. , cooperate with the information security team to landing compliance requirements. 6. Strong awareness of problem solving and proactive work attitude, flexible thinking, good at learning, and strong anti-stress ability. 7. Good collaboration and communication, Ability to solve problems and project management. With teamwork spirit.

responsibilities: 1. 负责游戏产品在本地化精细化运营中的项目管理工作； 2. 负责游戏海外版本的多语言翻译和多语言适配的管理； 3. 负责游戏海外版本的各区域，各语言的精细化运营内容制作的管理； 4. 负责与多个跨部门团队的通力协作，确保业务问题的解决； 5. 负责各类流程机制的建设与推广及工具链的完善； 6. 及时发现并跟踪解决项目问题，有效管理项目风险；

title: TEG03-广告算法专家 / 总监（深圳 / 北京）
responsibilities: 负责计算广告系统算法模型的优化及研究； 负责广告场景的数据的分析及机器学习技术的研究分析工作； 结合广告的场景，积极探索机器学习在互联网广告行业的应用场景，并提供产品或技术解决方案。 冷启动优化、在线优化算法新方向尝试、联邦学习在广告的应用、autoML在广告的应用优化、多任务改进策略、GPU 训练性能优化、复杂模型迭代效率优化、NLP中台建设、深度检索算法和平台优化。
qualifications: 计算机、应用数学、模式识别、人工智能、统计学等专业5年以上工作经验； 对机器学习、数据挖掘、概率统计，最优化等算法原理及其在互联网行业的应用有深刻的理解； 有深度学习、强化学习、海量数据处理和并行计算开发经验者优先； 基础扎实、编码能力强，熟悉常用的算法和数据结构知识； 有计算广告、推荐，搜索，自然语言处理等行业相关知识背景者优先。

title: 15575-《王者荣耀》系统数值策划（成都）

title: Software Engineering Intern (2023 graduate)
responsibilities: Role: We are looking for highly motivated college students to join our team. As an intern, you will work on a real project (or a few) and have an opportunity to enjoy our dynamic environment and culture. you will collaborate with multi-functional teams, receive mentorship, and gain insight into our value-driven process. Our goal is both to support your growth and development while empowering you for a successful start to your career. Responsibilities: As a Software Engineer Intern, * You will build innovative solutions that enable rapid development. You will get to work with smart and hardworking individuals who are doing state of the art development work in areas of anti-cheating, content moderating and large-scale event streaming to deliver best-in-class business value to our customers. You will be interacting with product management and customers to understand detailed requirements. You will also work with other engineering teams across the organization to design and build high-performance solutions. * You will design, develop, code and test software systems, or applications for software improvements and new products * You will actively contribute through participation in multiple phases of the agile development * Your feedback will influence our processes and procedures, and will directly contribute to standard methodologies, architecture, and implementation.
qualifications: - Bachelor’s, Master’s, or PhD in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics or a related technical field, and a strong record of academic achievement. - Familiarity with object-oriented programming concepts, large-scale software architecture, networking and distributed systems, and UNIX / Linux environments - Familiarity with some of the following programming languages including but not limited to Go, C++, Java, Python, Javascript - Familiarity with REST API and micro-services - Familiarity with CI / CD concepts - Familiarity with tools and technologies like Git, Jenkins, Gitlab, AWS, Docker, GCP - Experience building meaningful software applications: in a class, as a personal hobby, as a job, or as part of an open source project - You enjoy collaborating with others in a fast-paced environment - Strong communication skills, verbal and written

title: 41317-(Senior) Market Research Manager
responsibilities: Responsibilities / What you’ll get to do: - Plan and execute research to uncover insights into global video game markets. - Keep track of the following video game markets: 1. the U. S. and European markets, 2. the Japanese market, 3. Newly emerging markets in Southeast Asia, South America, and the Middle East. Deliver reports based on in-depth analysis of market conditions, trends, products, and consumers. - Perform competitive product analysis as well as market study on specific topics; Carry out research projects by identifying business goals, devising research plans, executing the plans, examining the results, and presenting professional reports.
qualifications: Qualifications / What we are looking for: - 3 ~ 5 years’ experience in market research; Conversant with methods including but not limited to qualitative & quantitative research; Capable of conducting research independently. - Undergraduate or graduate degree in psychology, sociology, marketing, economics, international business, or related field. - Proficiency in English — ability to communicating fully in English and reading English papers with academic expressions. Also, proficiency in Japanese, Spanish, French, German, or other languages of aforementioned regions is preferred. - Advanced Microsoft Office Software skills, and familiar with data analytics tools such SPSS, SAS, and Tableau. - Strong communication skills. Motivated, team-minded, self-disciplined, and capable of taking on challenges. - Previous experience of studying abroad or working at an international company is a bonus point. So is work experience in the gaming industry or general expertise in video games.

In particular, we are looking for techniques for large scale rendering, dynamic direct and indirect lighting, procedural geometry construction, dynamic destruction, and general improvements to fidelity or performance. If you are interested in pushing the boundaries of graphics in large-scale, dynamic worlds, apply now! Responsibilities Researching as well as implementing novel, or improvements to state of art, graphics techniques for use in upcomings games or as part of the production of same Stay up to date with current research in the domain of real-time computer graphics and games Collaborating with other Tencent teams and studios to ensure techniques are useful in upcoming titles and on current and next generation hardware platforms
qualifications: Requirements Very solid experience with modern GPU programming using DX12, Vulkan, console APIs, or equivalent APIs Experience with the use of compute shaders and, preferably, ray-tracing and mesh shaders Hands-on experience with implementing modern GPU techniques such as temporal anti-aliasing, volumetric effects, shadowing techniques, or similar Experience with debugging, profiling, and optimizing code on both CPU and GPU Strong familiarity with modern C++ multi-threaded programming. Experience with shipped games Preferred skills Experience working with Unreal, Unity, or comparable in-house engines Experience with streaming systems and / or open-world games Console optimization and debugging experience MSc or PhD in a relevant area

qualifications: Requirements Solid experience with modern animation programming techniques, for example multi-joint IK, motion matching, motion fields, animation compression, etc. Experience with debugging, profiling, and optimizing CPU code Understanding of related topics: animator workflows, mocap data cleaning, skinning techniques, game character / NPC locomotion, … Experience with shipped games Preferred skills Experience working with Unreal, Unity, or comparable in-house engines Experience with streaming systems and / or open-world games Console optimization and debugging experience MSc or PhD in a relevant area

title: Animation technology expert
responsibilities: We are setting up a new R&D cell to focus on improving the state-of-art of animation technology for our upcoming titles. This includes developing techniques for the in-game runtime, targeting improved fidelity, compression, motion synthesis, as well as animation production time tooling and techniques. Responsibilities Researching as well as implementing novel, or improvements to state of art, animation techniques for use in upcomings games or as part of the production of same Stay up to date with current research in the domain of real-time animation in the context of computer games Collaborating with other Tencent teams and studios to ensure that the techniques being developed are useful in upcoming titles and on current and next generation hardware platforms

title: 17229-和平精英-资深2D角色设计师（深圳）
responsibilities: 负责角色原画造型、动态等设计；负责道具、饰品等原画设计； 负责优化宣传素材，攻坚重要海报宣传设计； 负责外包资源的审核修改，包括对外包资源制作进行审核修改，统一风格，提高美术设计品质。
qualifications: 本科以上学历，5年以上相关工作经验； 态度严谨，工作认真负责，有团队精神，沟通能力配合工作能力强，对游戏角色制作有热情； 美术功底扎实，良好的绘画技巧，对结构、线条、色彩等的把控； 视野广阔，有一定高度的审美水平； 有灵活的与时俱进的设计思维，丰富想象力和创新能力，对自己作品有高度要求； 精通各种绘画软件（Photoshop、Sai等等）。

title: 17229-和平精英-高级3D场景物件设计师（深圳）
responsibilities: 负责游戏内场景物件的模型贴图制作； 使用UE4引擎导入物件并且调整材质效果； 推动项目3D场景物件的持续提升和优化； 审核外包提交的3D资源，并指导外包制作； 配合制定游戏场景物件的美术风格，优化场景美术制作及技术规范流程。
qualifications: 熟悉场景关卡设计制作流程，精通3D Max或Maya 熟练使用PS及次世代PBR流程相关软件； 有优秀的美术功底及整体把控能力，能迅速的为不同时期项目中碰到的问题提出解决方案； 热爱游戏，熟悉虚幻4引擎景制作流程；有5年以上项目开发经验者优先； 抗压能力强，能积极主动的交流沟通解决技术及美术方便的各类问题，有强烈的责任心。

title: 17229-和平精英-文学策划（深圳）
responsibilities: 1，负责IP内容制作过程中，从文学源头、到影视制作再到游戏制作全流程中的内容生产与内容协调； 2，负责工作室游戏产品的世界观、文学设计； 3，负责工作室IP衍生品文学质量的总体把控、梳理、统筹，以及IP影视化制作的前期策划、编剧监修工作； 4，负责工作室IP自研的内容创意与创作工作；
qualifications: 1，文学、影视、传媒相关教育背景，具有一定的文学修养和艺术审美，文笔优美，有创作能力； 2，有至少两至三款游戏完整项目经验，能独立、熟练、高质完成项目从概念到细化的全流程； 3，对影视行业有一定认识，有编剧创作、小说创作、影视传媒从业经验者优先； 4，沟通能力强，反应敏捷，能有效、妥善处理多面问题，有责任心，抗压能力强； 5，简历请附带个人作品，含策划工作相关文档与创作向作品。

title: 17229-和平精英-高级技术策划(深圳）
responsibilities: 找与游戏产品的结合点，探索游戏玩法原型关卡的设计和实现，配合开发团队建立模式关卡设计的工作流和工具建设； 为提升内部研发效率，能够与技术美术和引擎工具程序合作，开展游戏内技术编辑工具的开发和优化； 能够运用编辑工具和脚本语言，进行模式原型、地图场景、技能、AI等与游戏内容相关联的内容制作。
qualifications: 对主流商业引擎有一定的动手经验，UE4最佳； 有一定的脚本能力，有计算机专业背景者优先； 有不错动手能力和问题解决能力，能独立完成游戏原型功能设计和实现，熟练使用一款或多款游戏面向用户的编辑器者优先，如csgo-hammer、星际编辑器、魔兽编辑器等； 同时也欢迎具备一定产品思维想转策划的程序同学投递简历。

title: 17229-和平精英-高级关卡策划(深圳）
responsibilities: 负责《和平精英》的各类玩法的关卡设计与搭建工作； 包括开发世界地图编辑、交火关系构建、关卡性能优化等； 探索战术竞技游戏的地图场景迭代方向，通过数据分析、玩家反馈等手段，逐步升级玩家的开放世界的射击体验。
qualifications: 本科及以上学历，3年以上射击游戏的研发经验或相关从业经验； 热爱主流游戏及各类射击游戏，有丰富的游戏阅历，具备深厚的游戏理解能力和分析能力； 具备强大的自我驱动力、良好的沟通能力、团队协作能力； 有使用过UE4编辑器制作关卡或编辑蓝图的经验者优先。

title: 17229-和平精英-高级商业化策划（深圳）
responsibilities: 拓展游戏内商业化内容空间，持续进行精细化的深度商业化挖掘； 跟据不同用户行为进行针对性的商业化活动设计； 对商业化内容和活动进行持续性效果分析；
qualifications: 对主流非数值成长类游戏有大量体验和深度理解，对游戏内外成功的商业化逻辑有广泛认识； 具备数值理解能力和设计功底，逻辑性强，对数字敏感，有成熟的数据分析思路 ； 具有优秀的团队沟通和执行能力， 工作细致、耐心、抗压，有强烈的责任感；

title: 17229-和平精英-高级经济系统策划（深圳）
responsibilities: 1. 设计物品，商店，拍卖行等交易相关系统； 2. 保证局内外的流通控制和投放控制，协助玩法模式制定难度和产出消耗； 3. 分析并跟踪产品的各项运营数据，完善良性的游戏资源循环
qualifications: 1. 善于沟通，积极主动，玩游戏投入，有优秀的学习能力和团队合作精神 2. 熟练使用EXCEL等工具，数值敏感，熟悉货币经济体系，设计过完整的经济体系 3. 过去的项目中独立完成负责完整的成长规划设计优先 4. 注重体验和新对于自己所负责的经济和玩法品质有高要求 5. 5年以上研发经验，有独立完整跟过立项到上线项目的优先

title: 17229-和平精英-游戏客户端开发工程师（深圳）
responsibilities: 负责UE4游戏客户端的设计和开发工作； 与相关同事进行良好的沟通，进行FPS游戏开发； 优化工具及工作流程，提高开发效率。
qualifications: 3年以上游戏开发经验； 深入理解C++，熟悉3D技术； 有优秀的问题分析和解决问题的能力，善于沟通， 热爱游戏事业； 熟悉UE引擎底层架构，对FPS游戏熟悉和热爱者优先。

title: 17229-和平精英-游戏客户端开发工程师（上海）
responsibilities: 负责手游客户端的模块设计和开发，能够合理评估工作量，进行玩法、功能模块实现，并持续跟进性能、体验优化工作； 与服务端开发及策划、设计人员进行良好的沟通，负责前后端功能联调和视觉效果还原； 优化工具及工作流程，提高开发效率；
qualifications: 熟练使用C / C++，熟悉lua或者其他脚本语言，开发基础扎实(操作系统、数据结构算法、网络等)； 熟悉UnrealEngine或者Unity3D，3年以上游戏开发经验，熟悉性能和内存优化； 有优秀的问题分析和解决问题的能力； 热爱游戏，对FPS游戏熟悉者优先；

title: 17229-和平精英-游戏服务器开发工程师（深圳）
responsibilities: 负责游戏服务器端设计及开发，参与分布式后台系统开发、解决外网的各种bug； 能与客户端策划同事高效沟通 合作设计； 熟练和冷静的应对运营中的各种突发事件，严格按照运营流程处理各种事务。
qualifications: 3年以上后台开发工作经验； 3年以上分布式系统开发经验，对海量用户进行并行系统设计及系统优化有比较丰富的经验网络游戏行业优先； 熟悉linux操作系统下的c / c++开发及脚本使用，熟悉数据库相关应用开发； 了解tcp / Udp等协议相关知识，熟悉网络编程； 具备良好的分析、解决问题能力，及良好的沟通能力，能承担较大的工作压力； 能够清晰完整的理解需求，并对可能出现的变化提出自己的预期思考以及梳理功能需求。

title: 17229-和平精英-高级特效设计师（深圳）
responsibilities: 根据需求独立跟进完成项目特效设计制作； 设计编写特效shader，制作相关贴图，提升引擎中特效的表现力； 了解项目在设计和技术上对美术的需求，有产品意识，从客户调度考虑整理美术设计和制作； 积极沟通，努力提升特效质量。
qualifications: 特效设计相关的工作经验； ue4引擎项目开发经验，熟悉ue4特效制作流程，对UE4的粒子系统有深入的了解，熟悉UE4特效相关shader编写，对UE4引擎特效性能有把控能力； 能够配合程序进行性能优化； 有良好的审美，特效的设计上要有自己的想法； 有较强的自学能力，能积极把新技术运用到项目中去； 有热情，善于沟通，积极主动地提出自己的意见； 思维活跃，善于沟通，有责任心和敬业精神，能够承担一定的工作压力。

title: 17229-和平精英-高级动画设计师（深圳）
responsibilities: 对接和拆分动画需求，并且全程跟进直到版本内体验； 整合资源合入引擎，和策划程序多环节进行效果联调； 必要时需要动作捕捉。
qualifications: 5年以上的游戏或影视动画制作经验，动画制作能力和设计能力强，熟悉maya，max，MotionBuilder，UE4等软件； 沟通能力强，能够很好的跨部门、跨环节合作； 为人诚恳，充满激情，做事积极效率高，抗压力强，具有很强的执行力； 具有较强的逻辑思维能力，工作有条理性； 具备一定的产品意识和审美情趣； 虚幻4项目、写实射击类项目经验者经验者优先。

title: 17229-和平精英-游戏系统策划（深圳）
responsibilities: 负责游戏内系统设计、玩法设计和跟进执行； 负责内容上线后的运营数据，通过运营数据和用户研究进行总结，并持续进行优化； 负责数据挖掘，提炼和优化算法，并设计定向机制跟进执行；
qualifications: 热爱游戏，有丰富的游戏体验； 至少主导过一款游戏的核心系统设计，有较强的系统策划能力； 有强数值能力者优先； 有数据分析挖掘能力者优先； 有良好的团队合作精神，较强的沟通能力和抗压能力。

title: 【ゲーム事業】プロジェクトマネージャー
responsibilities: ■具体的な業務内容 ・プロジェクトの目的理解、作業範囲の明確化 ・スケジュール作成・管理、タスクの管理 ・進捗管理、予算管理・コントロール ・リスク検討・把握 ・顧客企業・発注先企業との折衝 ・社内の関連部署、協力会社との折衝
qualifications: ◆必須の経験／能力 ・ゲームまたはモバイルアプリのPMとして、新規プロジェクトの立ち上げもしくは長期案件の運用を担当した経験 ・3年以上のモバイルゲームの運営経験 ・ネイティブレベルの日本語コミュニケーション能力 ・中国語、もしくは英語の高いコミュニケーション能力 ・日本市場でのサービスリリース経験 ◆望ましい経験／能力 ・MOBA、あるいは対戦型のジャンルに詳しい方 ・海外のゲーム会社との協業経験 ・プロジェクトマネージャーとして、新規プロジェクトの立ち上げからリリースまで一貫して担当した経験 ・ゲームを構成している技術要素の理解 ・予算管理経験 ・契約から支払まで一貫して担当した経験 ・各種関連法令の理解（コンプガチャガイドライン・資金決済法・派遣法・著作権法・下請法・個人情報取り扱い等） ・品質管理

title: 15575-《王者荣耀》游戏运营-宣发运营方向（成都）
responsibilities: 负责王者荣耀生态产品的宣发运营工作，洞察分析行业、产品和用户动向，提炼产品卖点，制定整合宣发方案； 根据王者荣耀生态产品特点，制定产品的宣发内容策略，把控内容制作品质，对内容的产出、传播效果、口碑负责； 与产品各个模块协作，以营销思维反哺产品的前端设计，更好的实现项目目标； 与合作团队对接沟通，落地宣发核心策略，提升产品的整体热度和影响力。
qualifications: 热爱王者荣耀，王者荣耀重度玩家，且熟悉MOBA及其他重点品类游戏； 本科及以上学历，具备3年以上游戏内容、社区运营或宣发推广相关经验； 具备出色的创意内容能力，优秀的审美表达能力，能够敏锐的洞察不同层级玩家诉求，打造爆款优质内容，并统筹进行落地执行； 拥有较好的逻辑思维能力和学习能力，具备沟通协作能力和推动力，对业务有主人翁意识； 抗压能力强，能承担多线程的工作，积极主动灵活进取。

title: 41338-Strategic Operations Manager -- Gaming -- Overseas Studios

title: TiMi F1 Montreal – Senior Game Designer
responsibilities: Award-winning TiMi Studio Group seeks a Senior Game Designer to develop a AAA, open-world game based on a new IP. The project will be released on multiple platforms using Unreal’s latest technology. As a Senior Game Designer, your role will be to design innovative game features that support our creative direction. TiMi Montreal is a new studio within TiMi Studio Group, a subsidiary of Tencent Games. We are passionate about creating compelling worlds for players to explore for years to come. Are you someone who is engaged with building new worlds, understands what captivates players, and cares deeply about gaming as a medium? Are you ready to channel your passion and energy into creating expansive open world games for global audiences? Then, come join us in our ambitious endeavor. What will you do? The Senior Game Designer works in collaboration with our Game Director, Programmers and other disciplines to design and implement innovative game features. They conceptualize and prototype ideas that integrate well with our game fantasy. They are autonomous and can bring concepts to the screen rapidly. They are comfortable working in a highly collaborative and innovative environment. Help set the direction for a variety of gameplay mechanics, including 3Cs, combat, AI and other systems Define and uphold design principles to ensure gameplay is cohesive, systemic, and fun Communicate the design of the game to the team on a regular basis Work collaboratively with a multidisciplinary team to create gameplay features Share a passion to innovate, especially in the design and development of open world games
qualifications: What we’re looking for? At least 5 years of professional AAA game development experience A demonstrable history of creating industry-leading design A deep understanding of low-level design craft that leads to play experiences that are both immediately accessible and have depth Ability to quickly prototype and iterate in collaboration with others Self-directed, taking initiative to drive progress Strong communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills What is in it for you? Create AAA multi-platform games with ample resources and support: Bring incredible game ideas to players around the world with the support of one of the most successful studios in the world. TiMi has developed some of the most popular games worldwide and is looking for talented individuals to join it in making another major hit. Develop for global audiences and make an impression on the entire industry: Join TiMi in making games as part of an ambitious, talented, and seasoned team. Create new worlds for players to explore, experience and enjoy: Join a team who cares about innovation and wants to delight players with new creative game design for open world experiences. Help create the next great game world for players to immerse in for decades to come.
