title: TB-研发经理 / 高级经理
responsibilities: - 带领20人研发团队，全面负责业务支持系统的开发，维护，升级和扩展对接； - 管理腾讯投资研发团队（包括前端、后端、测试人员等），包括团队的招聘、指导、培养、考核等； - 负责研发流程优化，不断优化与相关方的合作界面，提升团队效率； - 负责业务系统的架构规划、设计与优化，带领团队解决技术难点； - 与产品团队沟通需求，拆分任务，制定开发计划，组织需求评审等； - 分析并解决开发过程中的问题，不断进行系统性能优化和稳定性提升，主导业务技术预研，推动技术落地转化； - 根据产品战略和规划，制定研发方案并组织实施，把控研发进度，保证高质量交付；
qualifications: - 8年以上互联网产品 / 复杂软件研发经验，5年以上研发团队管理经验，带过10人以上研发团队； - 熟悉业界主流架构理念，掌握2B产品的架构设计方法，并有成功经验； - 具有微服务化、分布式系统设计经验，精通Java / Golang等技术栈，深刻掌握常用开源框架的原理及其使用方法，包括SpringCloud、SpringBoot、MyBatis等；熟悉React、Vue等前端框架更佳； - 具有大数据架构和开发经验，掌握Hadoop、Spark、Storm、Flink等相关技术； - 具备金融类系统研发经验、具备大型互联网公司软件架构设计、核心开发等经验者优先； - 有较强的业务理解能力和抽象设计能力，思路清晰，善于思考，能独立分析和解决问题，能和产品团队一起完成业务建模，责任心强，具备良好的团队合作精神和抗压能力； - 良好沟通能力，乐观，有自驱力； - 计算机，物理，数学，电子工程研究生以上学历

title: 【ゲーム事業】シニア運営
responsibilities: 業務内容： ・各プロジェクトの運営業務の管理及びプロジェクト推進 ・運営スケジュールの管理及び想定課題に対する対応 ・運営KPIの分析、改善施策の策定 ・社内外を問わず、関係者、関連チームとのコミュニケーション連携及び業務調整
qualifications: 必要業務経験： ・ゲーム業界で5年以上就業経験のある方 ・KPI分析を基にして、自身の意思決定により戦略から実行までの一連のプロセスを経て結果を残したご経験のある方 ・ゲームが好きで、ユーザーのニーズを理解、把握できる方 ・周囲と円滑なコミュニケーションがとれる方 歓迎条件： ・中国語、日本語ビジネスレベル以上

title: 【ゲーム事業】プロモーション・マーケティング
responsibilities: 【職務内容】 １．弊社タイトルのプロモーション・マーケティング等における戦略の企画・立案・実行をご担当頂きます： ■ デジタルプロモーション戦略の企画・実行 ■ 交通広告、TVCMの企画・発注・進行管理 ■ インフルエンサー施策の企画・運用 ■ オンラインオフライン問わずのキャンペーン及びイベント企画・実行 ■ IP提携 ■ 異業種コラボ ■プロモーションクリエイティブ制作のディレクション ■スケジュールやコストなどの管理 ２．ビジネスパートナーなどのリソースを拡大、代理店やメディア等との調整や折衝。 ３．ゲーム市場の情報を収集してプレイヤー動向の調査及び分析、マーケティングの改善に対する提案など。
qualifications: 求めている人材・必須条件】 ■大学卒（専攻不問） ■ゲーム業界及び広告代理店でゲームアプリのマーケティング及びプロモーション経験者 ※想定3年以上 ■ゲーム・アニメ・漫画等エンタメコンテンツが大好きな方 ■高い論理的思考力、学習・思考・問題の発見と解決に得意な方 ■ストレスにもうまく対処でき、 開拓者精神を持つ方 ■高いコミュニケーション能力を持ち、共同作業に際し、周囲の人と連携でき、チームワーク重視の方 ■データと数字が得意な方

title: TEG09-存储平台研发组长（深圳）【HR-TEG】
responsibilities: 负责腾讯分布式存储相关技术方向的规划，负责存储产品的前瞻性技术拓展和探索；

column1: 负责腾讯云对象存储服务，及其他存储产品的架构设计和技术研发；
指导并培养相关技术方向的团队成员，带领团队不断攻克技术难题；
致力于打造顶级企业级海量存储系统，为腾讯内外各种产品、各个客户提供极致的服务质量及用户体验。
title: 五年以上中大型互联网公司后台研发项目经验；

column1: 具备扎实的计算机技术基础，深入理解操作系统、算法和数据结构知识，精通至少一门编程语言，如C \ C++、Java、C#、Golang等；
具备大规模分布式系统的架构设计能力，具备优秀的逻辑分析能力，和架构模块、功能、逻辑抽象及拆分能力；
富有激情和创造力，具备强烈的求知欲、极强的学习能力、探索能力、技术迁移能力和领悟能力；
具备良好的沟通能力和团队协作能力，勇于接受挑战。
具有以下任一条件者优先：
有后端研发团队的管理经验；
主导过公有云 / 私有云产品的技术架构和实施；
熟悉一个或多个分布式技术领域，如搜索引擎技术、分布式计算、分布式存储、分布式机器学习系统等；
熟悉分布式一致性协议、单机引擎、事务的相关理论知识，有分布式数据库、或数据库的开发经验；
有大规模分布式系统设计架构经验，如AWS-S3、Dynamodb、GFS \ Colossus、BigTable、Spanner、TensorFlow、Hadoop、Mongodb、Kafka等等；
开源社区的活跃贡献者。
title: Shenzhen
29777-智慧工业和服务业工业AI交付项目经理（深圳）
responsibilities: 1、负责工业AI项目的交付和管理，保证项目按合同约定成功交付，对项目范围、进度、成本、交付质量、项目经营结果负责。 2、交付范围包含算法管理平台、模型管理平台、AI算法实施、计算、存储、网络、安全、大数据服务等各类设备及服务。 3、负责整理反馈交付和客户沟通过程中的需求，对行业客户的交付和服务流程进行持续优化；并编写项目所涉及阶段报告及项目验收报告等文档。 4、定期组织交付团队总结和梳理项目进展和问题，协调资源、推动项目顺利进行，对项目过程中的问题进行有效地跟踪和管理。 5、持续积累和提升客户服务、交付实施、项目经营、成本管理等各项能力，持续挖掘客户业务需求。
qualifications: 1、本科及以上学历，8年以上AI项目管理经验，熟悉AI项目运作模式；软、硬件集成实施项目管理经验优先。 2、有较强的抗压能力，能并行处理多个项目工作，能承受一定程度的出差或驻场工作。 3、具备良好的项目管理、客户关系维护能力，和优秀的沟通技巧，能妥善协调好客户、合作伙伴、内部团队的合作关系。 4、具有网络、服务器、存储、人工智能、云计算、容灾备份和信息安全等相关行业背景，有AI相关项目交付经验的优先。 5、有PMP证书者优先，信息产业部系统集成项目经理证书者优先。 通过腾讯云从业资格证或同等资格认证的优先录取。

title: 31506-流量安全高级行销经理(深圳 / 北京 / 上海)
responsibilities: 1. 为腾讯云多行业的流量安全风控服务商业收入负责，支持一线商务经理、架构师达成商业化目标； 2. 制定相关产品的市场战略及运营策略，为产品成功负责； 3. 协助各个团队贯彻执行产品生命周期管理，包括产品定价、需求管理、质量管理、交付管理等流程； 4. 负责对售前架构师的产品赋能，并协助标杆客户的项目落地及持续跟踪满意度。
qualifications: 1. 全日制本科及以上学历，至少5年以上流量安全（泛互、电商行业优先）解决方案等工作经历；有产品行销经验尤佳； 2. 充分理解账号安全、流量风控、黑产对抗、分群运营、流量分发等业务逻辑； 3. 具备出色的跨部门工作推动能力，以及协调和组织能力，能够完成大量需要横向推动的项目工作； 4. 出色的商业化能力和经验，tob尤佳。

title: 24987-海外游戏商业化（上海）
responsibilities: 1、制定商业化运营规划和活动设计，把控整体商业化节奏，确保收入目标达成； 2、负责游戏内容和运营活动效果的数据分析，通过数据发现问题，并能提出有针对性的改进方案，对活动形式进行持续优化总结； 3、了解不同阶段用户需求，拓展游戏内商业化内容，合理利用游戏资源，策划商业化活动，总结传承不同用户特性； 4、能与海外协作方、开发团队协作沟通，有较强的团队协作能力。
qualifications: 3年及以上游戏行业工作经验，熟悉海外市场； 有至少一款以上产品完整发行运营经验，有商业化运营经验者优先； 有一定的研发经验，能够负责活动模块的开发和测试验收，以及线上效果分析跟进； 具有较好的逻辑思维及数据分析能力，能熟练运用EXCEL函数、数据透视图等进行数据统计，能运用SQL、Python、R等相关大数据常用技术者优先； 有良好的英语沟通和写作能力；（如具备日语沟通能力，将优先考虑）； 具备较强的沟通能力和技巧，能够应对跨部门、跨公司、跨文化的合作交流； 有良好的团队沟通和执行能力，有较强的总结归纳能力，能撰写各类文档。

title: 43477-Global Brand Manager
responsibilities: 1. The candidates are required to investigate and summarize the industry environments and user statistics of the key regions based on the overall strategy of Lightspeed studio and the business demands of those key regions. 2. The candidates are required to plan strategies for overseas brand promotion as well as coordinate the implementation of brand novelty and product promotion activities. 3. The candidates are responsible for building the overall brand of Lightspeed studio and helping the promotion of overseas market.
qualifications: 1. More than 3 years of overseas marketing experience in game industry and have excellent marketing integration capabilities. 2. Have a good understanding of the global game industry and its market environment. 3. Excellent English communication and English writing abilities.

title: 40165-手游Unity高级客户端开发（上海）
responsibilities: 负责游戏客户端内容开发，能够搭建核心玩法的框架、涉及对应的工具链、持续优化产品的性能，并且能够沉淀经验形成方法论。
qualifications: 5年以上unity3d的手游开发经验，熟练使用c#，c++，Lua等语言； 精通Unity3D引擎，有DOTS技术栈或者ECS的使用经验，了解底层原理； 精通网络游戏常用的同步方案和优化方案，有过相关的工作经验； 良好的逻辑思维和编程习惯，具备独立解决技术问题的能力； 有完整上线游戏产品开发经验者优先； 持续的学习能力，自驱力强，具有良好的对内、对外沟通协调能力，具备团队合作精神； 能承受一定的工作压力，对游戏开发充满热情。

title: 40165-SLG手游资深策划（上海）
responsibilities: 负责SLG游戏内系统的规划设计和跟进执行，包括但不限于系统框架，特色玩法，商业化活动等；

column1: 负责跟进相关内容上线后各项运营数据的分析总结，结合用户反馈和研究，持续优化指导后续研发。
title: 本科及以上学历，热爱游戏，5年以上游戏策划经验； 对主流SLG游戏有深入理解和分析，至少主导过一款游戏的核心系统 / 玩法设计； 具备优秀的逻辑思维能力，能清晰阐明设计思路和定位，并总结出得失经验； 有良好的团队合作精神，较强的抗压能力； 对大型网络游戏的数值体系有一定研究； 有SLG产品数值设计或海外商业化经验优先。
40165-手游UE4高级客户端开发工程师（上海）
responsibilities: 1. 负责项目玩法、关卡技术方案以及编辑器的研发方案设计； 2. 负责与引擎团队、美术团队、策划团队的沟通协作，保障GamePlay相关系统、玩法的研发及交付； 3. 负责GamePlay研发团队人才招募及梯队培养； 4. 熟练掌握UE4性能分析工具，能对业务进行性能分析，有过性能优化经验，使业务满足目标性能基线。
qualifications: 1. 学历本科及以上，计算机科学与技术，信息工程，信息管理等相关专业优先； 2. 5年以上C++游戏开发经验，3年以上UE4游戏引擎开发经验； 3. 深刻理解客户端框架和引擎核心模块的实现，针对GamePlay，动画，材质，粒子等某一方面有深入的挖掘和优化经验； 4. 对Unreal Engine渲染管线有一定的了解和实战经验的优先； 5. 有广阔的技术视野，对新技术有强烈的好奇心和探索的兴趣。

title: 40165-SLG手游服务器开发工程师（上海）
responsibilities: 负责手游服务器的设计和开发； 分布式后台系统开发、新功能实现和底层优化工作，持续提高研发效率，优化工作流程； 与团队密切配合，进行各种必要的尝试和探索，以游戏体验为核心共同目标； 客观评估工作量，与PM共同制定合理工作计划并保证进度达成； 应对日常运营需求，按照运营流程处理事务。
qualifications: 计算机相关专业本科及以上学历； 3年以上相关经验，良好的学习能力和编程习惯； 熟悉linux系统下的c / c++或java开发和至少一种脚本语言； 扎实的计算机基础知识，深入理解数据结构，网络，数据库，操作系统等知识； 具备良好的分析、解决问题能力，及良好的沟通协作意识，能承受一定的工作压力； 有国际化游戏开发，主流云服务等使用经验优先。

title: 40165-《创新SLG》主关卡 / 玩法策划（上海）
responsibilities: 参与创新SLG项目的前期讨论与探索，完成项目从0到1的内容研发； 负责游戏内地缘与玩法的设计与实现，包括但不限大世界地图、个人地缘、联盟地缘、剧情关卡、剧本玩法等； 建立关卡 / 玩法的设计与开发流程规范，指导组内同事的关卡内容设计。
qualifications: 本科及以上学历，3年以上游戏策划经验，至少主导过一款游戏的关卡 / 玩法设计，SLG / MMO品类经验者优先； 具备良好的关卡 / 玩法设计经验与方法论沉淀，能够独立完成SLG大地图的设计，并有效规划个人与联盟地缘发展体验； 热爱SLG游戏，对市面上各类主流SLG游戏都有良好的体验和理解深度； 对于策略类游戏、军事类游戏拥有广泛的涉猎经验； 具备优秀的逻辑思维能力，能清晰阐明设计思路和定位，并总结出得失经验； 有良好的团队合作精神，较强的抗压能力； 有上线SLG项目或海外项目经验者优先。

title: 40165-次世代SLG高级图形渲染工程师（上海）
responsibilities: 负责图形渲染管线及具体特性的技术研发，和技术美术紧密合作，增强画面品质，分析并解决相关性能问题； 负责渲染流程以及算法的优化，保障产品的渲染性能； 负责图形兼容性分析以及疑难问题的分析定位工作； 紧跟业界技术发展，预研前沿方案，将新技术应用落地到产品中并且产生实际价值。
qualifications: 本科及以上学历，精通C / C++，具备扎实的数据结构和算法基础，熟悉常用设计模式； 3年以上3D引擎（Unreal、Unity等）开发经验，一年以上渲染相关开发和优化经验； 具备计算机图形学知识，熟练掌握3D图形渲染技术，熟悉任意一种图形API（OpenGL / metal / vulkan）以及Shader开发； 熟练掌握3D游戏引擎架构， 熟悉3D引擎的接口和游戏制作流程； 熟悉移动端GPU / CPU架构，有移动端渲染开发经验者优先； 责任心强，善于沟通，对游戏前沿技术应用抱有热情。

title: 40165-SLG手游资深策划（上海）
responsibilities: 负责SLG游戏内系统的规划设计和跟进执行，包括但不限于系统框架，特色玩法，商业化活动等; 负责跟进相关内容上线后各项运营数据的分析总结，结合用户反馈和研究，持续优化指导后续研发。
qualifications: 本科及以上学历，热爱游戏，5年以上游戏策划经验; 对主流SLG游戏有深入理解和分析，至少主导过一款游戏的核心系统 / 玩法设计; 具备优秀的逻辑思维能力，能清晰阐明设计思路和定位，并总结出得失经验; 有良好的团队合作精神，较强的抗压能力; 资深军迷、了解军事战术或二战、越战、海湾战争等战争历史优先; 有SLG产品数值设计或海外商业化经验优先。

title: Live Ops Manager, AoV (Western Europe)
responsibilities: The Live Ops Manager, Arena of Valor (Western Europe) will have the opportunity to be part of a newly formed team in the region, focused on the AoV franchise. The role is responsible for the communication and cooperation with the R&D and middle platform departments, planning all localised game content for the region including but not limited to region relevant in-game characters, character skins & cosmetics and other special programmes. The Operations Manager will work cross functionally across the team to identify market specific opportunities that can be bought to life in the game to drive player growth and engagement. The performance of these programmes will be continuously monitored vs goals. Responsibilities −Analyse AoV player data and competitive data sets to understand the behavior of the current AoV player base in context of the marketplace. −Work with multiple internal stakeholders including player insights, marketing and community leads from each territory cluster to design impactful programmes tuned to player needs in each market. −Partner with marketing team to understand key cultural moments in each market and identify ways for AoV to participate via new in-game content or events programmes connected to these cultural events. −Lead the data and reporting function for AoV, Western Europe. Establish a daily data monitoring mechanism for key performance indicators, regularly presenting output conclusions and reports to the broader team, undertake ad hoc data analysis and output insights on key in-game player trends / variations by market. −Monitor competitive campaigns and their performance, sharing best practice examples across partner teams to help drive organisational learning and development. −Share ideas and best practice with other AoV regional teams around the world and integrate learnings into the Western European team. −Manage one direct report – Performance Analyst & Insights Manager. −Travel regularly to central London to meet with the full regional AoV team at Tencent.
qualifications: −A passion for MOBA games. −Minimum 3 years experience working in Live Ops, games localisation or other games related roles, either within PC & console or mobile gaming. −Excellent analytical skills and the ability to summarise data into clear & tangible recommendations. −Deep immersion in & understanding of culture & pop-culture in multiple European countries. −Versatile project manager able to drill down into detail and clearly think through project timelines & interdependencies. −Bachelor degree or above. −English language proficiency. −A strategic thinker with the ability to conceptualise broadly across various solutions, yet enjoy operating at a hands-on level. −Passionate, committed, self-starter with high levels of initiative, energy, ownership, urgency and a sincere willingness to learn from global team members at all levels. −Strong influencing skills and the ability to effectively engage with a wide variety of stakeholders. −Able to work under pressure and find solutions to multiple and varying needs. −Outstanding written and oral skills, to build productive relationships. −Proactive and approachable personality that thrives in a dynamic team environment. −Valid passport and willingness to travel regularly to London.

title: Senior Cybersecurity Engineer - Blue Team
responsibilities: Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future ready, global IT platforms, applications, and services. We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap, and execution. Satisfying our internal / external customers and becoming a world class global IT team are our top aspirations. Compliance and Security of Overseas IT focus on building a secured and compliant infrastructure to provide our game studios. Our team will partner with Cloud Center of Excellence, Cybersecurity Legal, Privacy office and different Business Group to deliver the best cloud and on-premises solution. We are seeking a Sr. Cybersecurity Engineer to design and implement Security vulnerability program for our Game Studio, making sure our infrastructures are secure and compliant.
qualifications: - Solid understanding of multiple information technologies (e. g. network, server OS, application platforms) including cloud environments such as AWS and / or Azure preferred - Establish a baseline for operating systems, applications, frameworks, and webservers on workstations and servers - Design and create golden image - Document, communicate, collaborate, and handle security incidents - Assist in development and implementation of information security vulnerability management policies, procedures, and standards based on National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) 800-53 and ISO 27001 standards, best practices, and compliance requirements - Improve controls for internal systems, privacy, processes, and policies. - Hands-on experience with AWS Security, Identity & Compliance services (Amazon GuardDuty, Amazon Inspector, AWS Security Hub, etc. . . ) - Experience with game console development kit Security is a plus - Familiarity with Containers and Kubernetes technologies and security concepts - Previous experience with leading security and compliance with game studios is a plus - Assess system vulnerabilities and provide guidance on how to secure Certification: -AWS Certified Security, GCIH, ECIH, CSIH, CEH are plus

title: Community Manager, AoV Europe
responsibilities: The Community Manager, Arena of Valor (UK & Nordics) will have the opportunity to be part of a newly formed team in Western Europe leading community engagement for AoV, a MOBA game available on mobile platforms. You will be AoV mobile's online voice on multiple social platforms for the UK and Nordic markets. Acting as a bridge between the community and the developers, you will represent the game team to the community including designing and implementing community programmes, providing game updates, reporting on community trends and troubleshooting issues. Main duties will involve: - Working with multiple internal stakeholders including player insights, marketing, operations and community leads from other territory clusters to devise and deliver community centric programs. - Create, manage and post on AoV social media channels including Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and Discord. - Work in partnership with PR team and own the relationship of key members and influencers of the player community and content creators who have local significance. - Create player-facing resources and content such as guides, videos, FAQs to help enhance and deepen the player experience. - Teasing upcoming releases for features and programs. - Monitor and evaluate impact of community programs, sentiment of players, and community influencer outreach programs for continued improvement by providing insight to the Western European marketing team. - Be the internal community advocate and provide relevant feedback that represents the players. - Participating in the scheduling and creation of on-line and off-line events. - You will need to maintain consistent and positive presence in discussion forums in order to understand the state of the community and what they need. - Partner with AoV Western European eSports lead to bring tournaments and exhibition matches to life within territory cluster. - Based either in the UK or Sweden, you will be required to travel regularly to central London to meet with the full regional AoV team at Tencent.
qualifications: - English language proficiency. - A passion for MOBA games. - At least 2 years working experience in a community or Live Ops support role within mobile gaming. - Experience creating assets for a community (e. g. streaming, video, gifs, or photoshopped images) is essential for this role. - Understanding of streaming & knowledge of e-sports. - Passionate, committed, self-starter with high levels of initiative, energy, ownership and urgency. - Able to work under pressure and find solutions to multiple and varying needs. - Valid passport and willingness to travel regularly to London.

title: CSIG(Tencent Cloud Group): BD 인턴 채용 공고 - 중국어 필수
responsibilities: 주요 업무 - 한국 IT / 클라우드 산업 동향 리서치 및 전략 / 기획 업무 지원 - 프로젝트에 참여하여 관련 커뮤니케이션 업무 지원 - 회사 시스템을 활용한 Business Development Manager 업무 지원 - 본사 및 해외 지사간 커뮤니케이션 및 기타 행정 업무 지원
qualifications: 자격 요건 - 학력: 4년제 대학 혹은 그 이상 (주 3일 이상 사무실 Full time 근무 가능자) - 컴퓨터공학 혹은 IT 관련학과 우대 - 한국어, 중국어 및 영어 능통 (한중 / 중한 통번역 가능 필수) - IT / 클라우드 산업 BD에 대한 관심과 지식 보유 - 강한 책임감과 긍정적인 마인드로 원활한 커뮤니케이션 능력 보유

title: 43451-ARPG资深动画设计师
responsibilities: 1、负责动作 / 格斗手游战斗设计，尤其是角色和角色招式方面的设计； 2、跟进版本实现，包括美术、声效表现、功能开发，保证玩法的优质呈现； 3、负责角色的手感调优，以达到高品质美术效果；
qualifications: 1、游戏行业3年以上相关工作经验 2、对动作 / 格斗游戏熟悉 3、优秀的审美能力，对动作游戏品类、动作类影视作品、动漫有一定的阅历，有动画、动漫创作经验优先 4、有动作游戏，或RPG游戏，或ARPG类游戏的角色设计经验，硬核动作游戏玩家优先 5、熟悉角色制作相关编辑工具，，有UE4项目开发经验者优先 6、有用户导向意识，具备优秀的自我驱动力、沟通能力、能够承担压力，有良好的合作意识

title: 43451-ARPG资深战斗策划
responsibilities: 1、ARPG手游基础3C及战斗模块相关工作的设计参与和制作跟进； 2、独立的设计战斗职业，职业BD，并跟进制作 3、根据基础模块的整体构架&数值要求，主要参与3C及战斗模块，各种移动操作，各种战斗体验玩法、怪物AI、技能设定及表现力、特色系统的设计和制作等； 4、参与和支持战斗模块整体能力追求构架&平衡性测试。
qualifications: 1、有完整RPG或相关手游项目开发经验，至少3年以上战斗模块工作经验； 2、至少设计过2个完整的战斗角色或者职业 3、热爱游戏行业，游戏体验丰富，至少深入了解或研究过一两款大型MMORPG或开放世界RPG手游； 4、具备一定的数值理解能力或设计功底，对主流游戏的战斗模块&玩家能力构成形式、设计方法和体验乐趣都有一定的研究和心得(热衷战斗模块相关表现设计,动作类游戏体验丰富)； 5、易沟通、善沟通、逻辑思维、分析能力强。感染力强、勇于创新、有主见、能配合、能承担一定压力。

title: 25663-泛互联网行业售前架构师-互联网综合（深圳）
responsibilities: -负责为互联网行业客户提供售前技术咨询，为客户业务上云定制解决方案； -通过服务客户过程中洞察行业发展需求，向后推动腾讯云产品、服务升级；
qualifications: -本科及以上学历，计算机相关专业背景；

column1: -5年以上互联网业务后端研发、架构设计相关经验，有大型互联网项目后端开发经验者优先；
-对互联网业务高并发、高可用业务架构开发与设计熟悉；
-对互联网业务设计的微服务、大数据、中间件（ES \ MQ）、数据库（Mongo \ Redis）、语音 \ 图像AI处理、音视频技术栈及在互联网业务中的应用场景熟悉；
-熟悉云计算，熟悉ToB业务流程，有丰富的客户技术咨询经验，有出色的商机洞察能力；
-积极思考、敢于决断、高效执行、务实坚韧、服务主动；
-心态开放乐观、善于沟通协作，善于资源整合；
通过腾讯云从业资格证或同等资格认证的优先录取
title: Shenzhen
53385-资深3D动画特效设计师（杭州）
responsibilities: 配合主美制定游戏特效风格，输出特效设计模版和规范； 负责游戏中角色特效、场景特效的设计和制作； 有良好的审美参与具体特效设计任务，审核外包提交的特效资源，指导外包制作； 组织动画环节，协同模型、编辑、特效环节进行设计实现工作，并为最终效果负责，确保游戏角色体验； 积累和共享特效设计经验，编写课件并培养新人，分享设计经验。
qualifications: 热爱游戏，关注游戏体验，结合本岗位工作配合产品改进游戏体验； 深厚的美术功底，比如贴图绘制，序列帧特效； 3年以上游戏行业3D特效从业经验，有主导团队开展设计工作经验者优先； 有较强的综合分析能力，创新能力，准确理解工作需求并高效完成； 有较强的责任心，工作投入度高，配合团队完成目标； 较强的学习能力，主动研究或学习新的技术运用到工作中； 熟练运用3DMAX或MAYA以及AE、Photoshop进行美术资源制作。

title: 53385-资深3D动作师（杭州）
responsibilities: 负责设计和制作游戏中的角色的动作，包括技能，交互及角色展示等； 与战斗策划配合，不断打磨和提升游戏战斗体验及操作手感； 制定外包制作标准，指导外包制作，审核外包提交的动作资源； 与主美紧密合作，指定游戏动作风格，输出动作设计模版和规范并贯彻执行； 和中台合作，跟进动捕效果并审核游戏内动捕数据表现效果。
qualifications: 热爱游戏，关注游戏实机体验，对品质精益求精，具备5年以上游戏动作设计经验，对动作游戏有热情； 良好的动画设计基础，对于人物、动物的肢体动作、运动节奏有较强的理解能力； 动作设计能力突出，善于根据角色性格和技能设计进行动作产出； 有良好的团队合作意识，易沟通协作； 对动作游戏比较熟悉，对游戏动作打击感有较深的理解； 有较强的责任心，工作投入度高，配合团队完成目标； 精通动作编辑器并该掌握该岗位所需软件，具有一定动捕对接经验，有表情制作经验者优先。

title: 53385-资深3D角色设计师（杭州）
responsibilities: 负责西方风格化的次世代3D角色的模型制作及引擎材质制作； 根据游戏原画设定，制作3D角色模型以及物件资源、贴图绘制和材质制作； 需要和TA部门合作沟通，推进相关效果在游戏引擎内落地； 对接外包需求跟进审核效果，制定外包制作规范，把控外包品质。
qualifications: 有5年以上的3D角色制作工作经历，2年以上的游戏开发经验，熟悉PBR制作流程； 良好的产品意思，具备良好的语言表达能力及合作态度； 有坚实的美术造型功底和良好的色彩把握能力； 熟练掌握Substance Designer / Painter，Marvelous Designer等相关制作软件； 具备良好的自学能力及学习意愿，对于游戏开发充满激情，做事积极主动； 具备UE使用经验及外包把控跟进经验者优先； 有3A项目制作经验者优先。

title: 53385-资深3D场景设计师（杭州）
responsibilities: 负责次时代西方卡通风格、标准PBR流程的3D场景模型制作； 积累和共享场景制作 / 场景编辑经验，分享设计经验，制定制作标准。 需要保持与策划，设计，技术等相关部门保持紧密的合作与沟通，提升项目的美术品质及优化现有工作流程； 根据游戏设定，理解原画意图，制作3D场景模型以及物件资源、贴图绘制和材质制作； 跟进外包产出进度，审核外包制作效果，制定外包制作标准文档。
qualifications: 具有较好的美术功底，3年以上PBR场景模型制作经验； 具备熟练的建模能力，造型能力突出、有扎实的高模能力和良好的色彩感； 对UE引擎工作有一定游戏制作经验者优先； 具备丰富的制作次世代游戏经验，熟练运用PBR标准流程进行制作，擅长speedtree植物制作流程者优先； 有大世界相关场景模型工作经验者优先； 具有较强责任感及良好的沟通技巧，有较强的团队意识，对新技术有敏锐的嗅觉，学习能力强。

title: 53385-资深场景编辑师（杭州）
responsibilities: 清晰理解策划和原画意图，配合主美制定游戏场景风格，输出场景制作模版和规范标准； 参与具体场景编辑制作任务，和场景模型共同配合，保证产出场景效果品质； 依据场景制作、编辑流程，参与审核； 使用UE编辑器对场景原画地图进行还原和再创作，控制资源优化性能，保证场景最终游戏效果； 配合TA开放和验证场景相关功能效果，有比较好的技术视野及技术思维； 负责行业最新技术研究，引入、消化、推广最新的3D技术和工具； 积累和共享场景制作经验，编写课件并培养新人，分享设计经验。
qualifications: 5年以上地编工作经验，有单机或大型MMO关卡实际经验者优先； 优秀的场景表现把控能力、气氛把控力，丰富的西方建筑结构及人文知识储备； 具备比较扎实的场景模型制作经验，能够和场景模型同学共同推进模型效果表现； 对画面整体构图，地形表现及模型物件搭配有较强的审美把控能力； 具备一定的场景设计能力者优先，可组织场景原画和场景制作人员开展工作； 善于积累和分享技术成果，有比较丰富的TA对接经验； 有开放大地图场景编辑经验者优先，有Houdini，World mechine或World Creator等PCG经验者优先。

title: 53385-资深场景原画（杭州）
responsibilities: 负责场景原画概念设计及拆分，跟进实际设计意图的落地效果； 负责创作高质量的世界环境、室内环境的氛围概念设计原画； 保持与策划，制作等相关部门保持紧密的合作与沟通； 与主美紧密合作，为团队提供场景美术效果方向；
qualifications: 有3年以上的概念设计工作经验，有MMO游戏设计或次世代项目经验者优先； 设计 / 绘画相关专业院校毕业，本科以上学历； 擅长西方幻想 / 写实风格场景概念的设计工作，并有充足的西方建筑、历史及文化的知识储备； 有坚实的绘画技巧和良好的色彩感觉，对氛围烘托及营造比较擅长； 有较好的创造力以及良好的创新设计能力； 良好的沟通能力，并能从玩家角度出发去设计场景，并跟进最后场景设计意图的游戏内落地。 具备blender辅助设计制作能力者优先。

title: 25663-传媒行业高级销售经理（深圳）
responsibilities: 1、五年以上ICT或云计算相关销售经验； 2、熟悉广东、广西、海南、江西、厦门等地的文化、广电、媒体及文创行业客户； 3、具备咨询式销售的能力，具备市场洞察的能力和谈判技巧； 4、重点关注IT业务挑战和业务部门的挑战，将自己定位为IT部门的信任顾问； 5、具备基础财务知识，需要高水平的行业敏锐度，能够参与客户的IT规划。
qualifications: 1、维护客户高层对腾讯云品牌忠诚度，长期保持信任关系； 2、研究和了解运营商行业，深刻理解客户业务需求和挑战； 3、对云、广电、传媒、文创和文化产业的业务有深入了解，理解客户对此的需求和痛点； 4、有效完成季度 / 全年销售任务； 5、建立和执行客户销售计划（Account Business Plan），包括短期的销售机会和长期的战略； 6、组织和参与渠道营销活动，寻找商机，转化销售机会； 7、拓展行业内合作伙伴，并定期进行沟通会，寻找并确认商机，转化销售机会。

title: HY5-高级商务投资经理---游戏
responsibilities: 1、 负责国内游戏市场的商务拓展及合作项目的谈判，包括游戏授权、投资和其他合作机会； 2、能独立主导相关投资业务，包含投前分析以及投后的资产管理，与内部团队合作，确保项目管理和签署交易的顺利执行； 3、负责腾讯游戏重要合作伙伴的关系维护，并持续挖掘新的业务合作机会； 4、探索游戏行业上下游领域的新模式和机会，提供战略洞察和分析。
qualifications: 1、3年+投资 / 商业分析 / 战略规划领域的工作经验，有完整而独到的认知与分析框架； 2、拥有优秀的学术教育背景，以及较强的逻辑思维、书面表达和人际沟通能力；有一定的财务功底加分； 3、热爱游戏，对ACGN领域有独特理解者加分； 4、兼具单兵作战和团队协作的能力，自我驱动、有强烈的责任感和上进心、抗压能力强。

title: 15570-gameplay客户端开发组长
responsibilities: 带团队负责游戏客户端业务的设计和开发，工作包括但不限于框架设计、开发编码和各类协作； 持续优化性能、需求表现和兼容性； 协同策划建立高效的游戏内容制作管线； 完善并持续优化工具链。
qualifications: 计算机相关专业，本科及以上学历； 5年以上游戏客户端研发经验或2年以上UE4引擎开发经验； 有优秀的软件工程功底与知识结构, 精通C / C++及常用脚本语言； 熟悉设计模式，数据结构和算法； 有优秀的学习能力，热爱游戏事业，良好的团队协作能力与敬业精神； 有手游项目研发管理经验。

title: 53385-资深服务端开发工程师（杭州）
responsibilities: 负责Linux环境下游戏服务器架构设计; 负责服务器端系统功能的实现，逻辑开发及调优工作; 负责技术方案设计、系统监控与跟踪、问题定位处理; 负责游戏版本发布、线上问题定位处理.
qualifications: 能熟练地在Linux系统上进行维护和开发工作； 六年及以上游戏项目开发经验，至少有一款上线游戏项目经验 精通C \ C++，数据结构和算法，具备扎实的编程基础和良好的软件工程能力 精通网络编程与高性能分布式系统设计 熟悉MySql / Redis / Mongodb等数据存储场景； 熟悉TCP / IP，对负载均衡、容灾扩容、高并发有较为深刻的认识； 熟悉分布式架构，以及高承载优化经验优先； 熟悉设计模式、RPC机制、数据序列化与反序列化以及线程、协程、多进程的使用和原理； 有上线MMO RPG 服务端框架设计、开发经验者优先.

title: 53385-开放世界游戏文案策划（杭州）
responsibilities: 进行原创IP的世界观架构和剧情构建； 输出角色设计、场景设计文档并跟进美术制作； 负责剧情在游戏中的落地制作和工具链维护； 为各种玩法、系统的包装提供世界观支持。
qualifications: 3年以上游戏文案策划经验，有从游戏研发到上线的完整项目经历，对世界观构建、传统剧作（叙事结构，角色，主题、分镜脚本等）、游戏叙事设计（系统，叙事工具等）、叙事呈现手法（音视频及多媒体交互等）、内容制作落地有深刻理解； 优秀的文案功底，擅长西方题材的撰写和创作，对西方文化及相关的游戏、影视、文学、历史有兴趣和深入研究者优先； 有丰富的游戏经历，深入体验及研究过1款以上大型MMORPG游戏，有丰富的RPG类游戏深入体验者额外加分； 良好的沟通协作与表达能力，能够与美术、中台等岗位紧密合作，主动推进工作； 英语流利，或有外语特长者优先。

title: 53385-开放世界游戏关卡策划（杭州）
responsibilities: 负责开放世界游戏中大世界及副本关卡的设计，使用3D引擎搭建白模关卡并验证可行性； 建立项目关卡设计开发的规范流程，总结方法论，推进关卡设计的可持续产出； 参与大世界玩法的设计和制作，包括但不限于地图事件、怪物布置、谜题设计等； 跟进相关的用户研究及玩家体验，持续对设计进行迭代优化，把控最终品质。
qualifications: 3年以上游戏关卡设计经验，至少负责过一款上线mmorpg游戏或3A主机游戏的关卡设计。 对开放世界有强烈的兴趣和深刻的思考，熟悉相关游戏的设计思路，有开放世界LD经验或3A游戏关卡设计经验者优先。 有UE4引擎使用经验者优先。 有良好的团队合作意识和跨岗位的沟通能力，有创新精神、能够抗压。

title: 53385-开放世界游戏战斗策划-怪物AI（杭州）
responsibilities: 开放世界手游基础3C及战斗模块相关工作的设计参与和制作跟进； 根据基础战斗体验，参与基础技能、职业设计、怪物AI等战斗相关模块的设计与制作跟进； 参与和支持战斗模块整体能力追求构架&平衡性测试； 参与和支持对PVE、PVP玩法的设计和调试。
qualifications: 有完整RPG或相关手游项目开发经验，至少3年以上战斗模块工作经验(次时代游戏开发经验者优先)； 有丰富的游戏经历，深入体验及研究过1款以上大型MMORPG游戏，有丰富的动作类游戏深入体验者额外加分； 具备一定的数值理解能力和美术审美，能够深挖战斗模块相关表现设计。熟悉Unreal引擎及相关设计工具、制作流程者优先； 有耐心易交流，具有匠心精神，能够承担一定的压力。

title: 15581-资深特效师
responsibilities: 棋牌U3D游戏中UI特效及技能特效制作； 过场动画镜头编辑及UE4影视特效制作； 视频后期剪辑及包装制作； 团队协助，人力培养及CP跟进。
qualifications: 影视动漫，游戏相关专业，良好的学习能力，3年以上特效相关工作经验； 熟练使用3DMax，U3D,UE4引擎进行特效制作； 对niagara粒子，材质系统，sequence动画编辑器有深入研究，对Houdini Realflow等影视软件有经验者优先； 有较好的技术积累，熟练掌握各种镜头的应用，能够利用动作 ，场景，模型独立完成从镜头到特效的短片制作。

title: 15581-欢乐游戏海外发行
responsibilities: 负责欢乐游戏产品在海外的发行工作，对海外渠道、用户、买量、社区、区域和发行商有一定了解； 负责海外游戏开发商、发行方合作沟通，共同拓展海外发行市场，英语可作为工作语言； 负责产品国内和海外版本管理，承担红线合规、公共组件、本地化等相关内容接入； 熟练运营数据分析工具，对产品、活动、商业化数据敏感，帮助持续优化发行效果。
qualifications: 【工作内容】 负责欢乐游戏产品在海外的发行工作，对海外渠道、用户、买量、社区、区域和发行商有一定了解； 负责海外游戏开发商、发行方合作沟通，共同拓展海外发行市场，英语可作为工作语言； 负责产品国内和海外版本管理，承担红线合规、公共组件、本地化等相关内容接入； 熟练运营数据分析工具，对产品、活动、商业化数据敏感，帮助持续优化发行效果。 【任职要求】 2年以上渠道 / 平台运营经验，对腾讯国内和海外发行有较深的了解； 优秀的沟通能力和跨团队协作能力，具备多线程工作强推动力； 较强的逻辑分析能力，对数据敏感且具备较强数据分析能力； 具备海外发行经验的游戏运营且英语可作为工作语言优先；

title: 15581-资深动画师
responsibilities: 5年以上游戏动画相关工作经验，美术或动画专业科班毕业，美术功底扎实、富有想象力和创造力； 动画理论基础扎实，对节奏、解剖学和运动规律有深入理解； 能够根据角色性格设计出体现角色性格特征并符合游戏性要求的表演动画； 能设计与制作完成高质量的3D动画，为动画量产制定风格标准，制定详细的执行方案； 熟悉主流游戏美术风格，持续关注并了解业界动态，对游戏行业有热情； 在动画方面有优秀的艺术感，有责任心，执行力强，对自己的工作完成有高品质要求； 具备较强的问题解决能力，能构思新的方案、设计和流程； 技术能力强， 熟悉U3D,unreal4引擎和动画相关的功能模块； 熟练掌握MAX，MAYA，MotionBuilder动画和手K关键帧动画，对写实动画风格有较深的理解； 具备良好的协作意识，能够与开发团队有效沟通。
qualifications: 负责游戏中的3D角色动画设计和制作，负责角色表情绑定； 负责游戏中3D角色动画的风格统一性和资源规范性。制定及优化动画质量标准，确保动画的最佳效果； 指导外包资源的审核修改及外包团队的培养； 协助美术，程序和策划人员，疏通与动画相关工作的开发流程，并跟进动作在引擎里的实现效果； 根据每项工作任务的范围及其对团队的影响，制定合理的工作计划，在期望的目标质量和交付约束（时间、成本、资源等）之间寻求折中方案。

title: 15581-资深角色原画设计师
responsibilities: 独立完成角色原画设计，宣传图，概念设计等任务； 提炼总结角色相关的设计要点，原则，并且制定相应的规范要求； 跟进反馈美术安排，把控品质与时间。
qualifications: 美术功底扎实，设计能力出众，美术表现力出众； 热爱游戏，涉猎广泛； 善于沟通，乐于思辨； 熟悉游戏制作流程，对3D建模，角色骨骼动作等环节的要求有一定程度的了解。

title: 15581-资深3D场景地编设计师（深圳）
responsibilities: 负责游戏中的3D物件、地形模型、贴图制作及修改； 负责游戏中大地图编辑、整合； 确保项目3D场景资源按规格制作并风格统一。
qualifications: 5年以上相关经验，有完整项目研发经验，大型地形制作经验； 了解自然环境对地貌的影响，如地形山体植被生长规律等； 对整体氛围，美感，效率，风格等方面有较好的把控； 很好的模型造型能力，材质贴图调整能力； 对光影有较深了解并在UE引擎内调整运用； 熟悉掌握3DMAX，ZBRUSH，SP,SD Worldmachine，unity，speedtree等（houdini经验更佳）； 擅长写实风格优先； 熟悉资源导入，资源管理，材质管理，性能优化等； 了解外包的流程，能制定相应规范，管理外包的开发和进度，把控品质和指导反馈； 有责任心善于团队合作，沟通能力良好，应聘简历须附带作品。

title: 15581-高级服务器工程师（3D无缝大世界方向）（深圳）
responsibilities: 3D无缝大世界游戏服务器架构搭建； 无缝战斗、视野、数据同步等核心功能设计，以及性能调优； 服务器真3D虚拟世界模拟，物理、寻路等方案设计与实现； 玩法编辑、技能编辑等通用工具建设。
qualifications: 5年以上游戏开发经验，对PhysX等物理引擎有深入理解和使用经验，熟悉UE优先； 对3D场景模拟和调优有丰富经验，熟悉寻路、视野等MMO游戏服务器核心算法； 理解游戏服务器架构，具有丰富的性能调优经验； 熟悉分布式系统的基本原则和解决方案； 高度的责任心、良好的沟通能力和团队合作精神。

title: 26699-智慧零售行业方案经理(深圳 / 北京 / 上海)
responsibilities: 1. 根据重点行业（商超百货、购物中心、鞋服美妆、家居家电、食品饮料等）企业数字化转型需求，输出智慧零售行业解决方案，推进相应解决方案在客户项目中落地； 2. 对腾讯智慧零售、社交零售、私域流量、小程序电商运营的玩法，有深刻地理解和实践，能够站在零售客户的角度，去分析问题所在，跟客户讲同样的业务语言； 3. 通过短期的客户业务调研，能快速捕捉重点行业客户业务痛点，结合腾讯智慧零售核心产品能力，提出相应的定制解决方案，抓住项目合作机会； 4. 能够配合商务推进合适的商机，跟踪项目进展全过程，协同腾讯内部及腾讯生态的力量，积极促成双方合作并顺利项目落地； 5. 负责对接零售行业的需求进行分析、评估、总结行业客户诉求，基于对行业与客户需求的深入理解，为客户提供定制化解决方案，打造行业标杆。 6. 负责客户需求沟通、方案宣讲等工作，配合将客户需求整理成内部相关产品需求，反馈给产品团队，以便产品能进行相应的优化改进。
qualifications: 1. 工学本科以上学历，5年以上工作经验，有IT方案架构沟通能力； 2. 熟悉云计算、大数据、人工智能、广告业务相关技术，有零售企业数字化转型经验优先； 3. 全面的IT基础知识，包括中台、服务器、存储、网络、数据库、中间件、虚拟化、容器等方面； 4. 有方案设计、咨询能力，有技术文档撰写功底，优良的方案宣讲能力； 5. 善于与客户沟通，了解常见企业2B项目进展逻辑，有过投标过程经验； 6. 对零售行业信息化体系有理解，有相关行业最终用户和系统集成工作经历优先，有企业级中台、ERP、电商建站等类型的项目实践经验最佳； 7. 个性乐观、吃苦耐劳、抗压能力强，适应互联网行业勇于创新、快速变化的企业文化，适应频繁的出差。

title: 15618-资深UE4手游引擎开发工程师（上海）
responsibilities: 根据项目需求，负责UE4引擎的功能和效果开发、性能优化等相关工作； 增强游戏的表现力与运行效率，对业务需求进行评估并进行方案的实现与落地； 负责游戏中性能优化相关工作，根据项目需求定制增改Unreal4引擎底层功能； 根据项目的需求搭建高效的内容制作管线，提高团队的研发效率； 关注业界新技术，根据项目的需求预研并应用到项目的后续开发中。
qualifications: 本科及以上学历； 3年以上游戏开发经验，有较好的c++基础，有UE4引擎开发经验优先 熟练掌握3D图形渲染技术与引擎框架； 有3D引擎性能分析和优化经验； 对游戏开发有热情，对引擎技术有追求，熟悉游戏技术趋势和最新技术应用者优先； 具备良好的分析与解决问题的能力； 有高度的责任心与敬业精神，良好的沟通与团队协作能力。

title: 50565-智慧工业和服务业业务运营管理（深圳）

title: 24987-超级IP动作手游服务器开发
responsibilities: 基于Linux平台进行大型多人在线游戏服务器的开发； 负责游戏后台系统架构设计、实现，逻辑开发及调优工作； 负责游戏版本发布、线上问题定位处理。
qualifications: 计算机科学 / 软件工程相关专业本科或以上学历； 热爱编程，基础扎实，理解算法、数据结构、软件设计相关知识； 熟悉C++编程语言； 熟悉linux常用命令； 具备阅读英文技术文档能力； 热爱游戏，渴望未来进入游戏行业者优先； 熟悉或了解Unreal Engine优先

title: 24987-游戏后台高级开发（上海）
responsibilities: 基于Linux平台进行大型多人在线游戏服务器的开发； 负责游戏后台系统架构设计、实现，逻辑开发及调优工作； 负责游戏版本发布、线上问题定位处理；
qualifications: 3年以上游戏服务器开发经验； 熟练C / C++语言； 熟悉TCP / IP和网络编程； 熟悉linux操作系统、脚本编程； 对海量、高性能、分布式开发有经验者优先； 具备优秀的分析解决问题能力与优秀的沟通协作能力； 热爱游戏，对游戏有较深刻的理解;

title: 50565-SIS运营管理组leader（北京 / 深圳）
responsibilities: 1. 负责业务经营体系的搭建，包含经营管理系统化，线上化，数据化平台及指标体系的搭建，推动经营效率的提升，预判业务风险；负责销售业务规划、目标设定与拆解、定期分析业务进展与市场进展，洞察行业变化，组织销售管理团队进行销售与运营目标制定、追踪达成等。 2. 建立行业客户管理、销售管理、流程管理的制度与优化标准，为实现业务健康增长提供支持与流程制度保障；建立客户分层管理机制，明确行业作战地图建设方向，针对标杆灯塔客户输出管理规范，通过运营管理机制实现目标达成及业务调优。 3. 搭建团队销售赋能体系。输出销售培训手册、客户成功案例、行业方案、流程指引、产品知识库、审批流程、审批矩阵等多维度培训赋能资料。定期组织销售培训，通过产品理念讲述、销售标杆打造、目标攻坚等形式，提升销售团队的认知和能力。
qualifications: 1. 熟悉企业信息化等2B行业，具备8年以上销售管理、项目管理经验，具备一线实际项目拓展经验，能总结与提炼方法论、梳理制度与流程； 2. 具备销售项目管理经验与高效沟通能力，有多部门协同拓展经验与能力，具备相关案例证明； 3. 具备大学本科以上学历，计算机、信息工程、企业管理及相关专业学历；对云计算、大数据、物联网等产品知识有初步认识与了解，通过腾讯云从业资格或者同等资格认证优先； 4. 熟悉业界常见CRM系统功能，具备数据分析能力，擅长通过数据洞察业务问题，提出优化建议； 5. 较强的自驱力和创新能力，思维开阔，善于学习，抗压能力强；

title: 15618-开放世界战斗策划
responsibilities: 开放世界手游基础3C及战斗模块相关工作的设计参与和制作跟进； 根据基础模块的整体构架&数值要求，主要参与3C及战斗模块，各种移动操作，各种战斗体验玩法、怪物AI、技能设定及表现力、特色系统的设计和制作等； 参与和支持战斗模块整体能力追求构架&平衡性测试。
qualifications: 本科及以上学历； 有完整RPG或相关手游项目开发经验，至少3年以上战斗模块工作经验(次时代游戏开发经验者优先)； 热爱游戏行业，游戏体验丰富，至少深入了解或研究过一两款大型MMORPG或开放世界RPG手游； 具备一定的数值理解能力或设计功底，对主流游戏的战斗模块&玩家能力构成形式、设计方法和体验乐趣都有一定的研究和心得(热衷战斗模块相关表现设计,动作类游戏体验丰富)； 易沟通、善沟通、逻辑思维、分析能力强。感染力强、勇于创新、有主见、能配合、能承担一定压力。

title: 15618-开放世界系统策划
responsibilities: 责游戏内核心玩法的系统设计、以及各系统功能设计、界面及操作设计; 负责游戏模式及其玩法研究，确保产品具备优良的游戏性和竞争优势; 可独立设计游戏中大型系统，建立系统数值模型，确保体验良好; 熟悉底层实现机制，整理和书写需求文档，供设计、开发、测试人员明确功能需求; 与其他策划，程序，美术密切协作，完成功能开发设计及推进。
qualifications: 3年以上游戏策划经验，参与过大型RPG产品项目流程，有成功上市产品经验者优先; 极具创新力、创造力和激情，在玩法或关卡设计上能发挥自己的想法; 熟悉系统、数值、剧情、关卡、脚本等开发细节； 具备独立开发核心系统、UI、数值等系统的能力，有良好的大局观; 具备细致谨慎的工作作风，有较强的团队合作意识，抗压能力强。

title: 15851-高级游戏测试工程师(上海)
responsibilities: 1、负责移动游戏产品的测试工作，包括功能、性能、自动化、代码质量等维度； 2、负责项目 / 模块的测试计划排期和测试任务跟踪执行，及时提出风险项和确保所负责项目 / 模块的质量； 3、负责项目 / 模块的测试流程优化、测试效率优化、外网质量改进等； 4、针对测试行为中的难点和盲区提出新的测试方案，引入或开发新的测试方法和测试工具；
qualifications: 1、本科以上学历，计算机相关专业，有2年以上竞技手游测试经验； 2、有全局观，对质量体系、流程、测试风险把握、测试范畴的定义有很好的理解和应用，具有移动互联网相关经验(Android、iOS)； 3、熟悉主流操作系统原理（Windows、Linux、Android、iOS）、网络协议等，有过前后端性能、安全、兼容等专项测试经验； 4、熟悉至少一门开发或者脚本语言，C++、C、C#、Java、PHP、Python等； 5、优秀的执行力和抗压能力，热爱游戏测试，乐于主动反馈和积极思考。

title: 15851-高级游戏测试工程师（深圳）
responsibilities: 负责移动游戏产品的测试工作，保障项目顺利发布；

column1: 优化、提高团队与项目组之间的良好沟通渠道，以及测试效率和输出质量。
title: 本科以上学历，计算机相关专业，有3年以上游戏测试经验，有具有快速熟悉业务流程和优化，并建立完善质量体系的能力； 有全局观，对质量体系、流程、测试风险把握、测试范畴的定义有很好的理解和应用，具有移动互联网相关经验(Android、iOS)尤佳； 熟悉至少一门开发或者脚本语言，C++、C、C#、Java、PHP、Python等； 优秀的执行力和抗压能力，热爱游戏测试，乐于主动反馈和积极思考。
43477-海外传播经理（工作室整体品牌）
responsibilities: 基于光子工作室群整体品牌策略，负责海外官方社媒的品牌内容输出和资讯审核铺发； 重点区域的公关传播和品牌舆情的维护与支持； 相应公关资源关系对接、品牌舆情的监测。
qualifications: 3年以上海外游戏推广和海外社媒内容传播经验； 沟通协调能力强，能多线程推进任务； 英语沟通和书面表达能力优秀，base海外者优先。

title: 43477-跨界合作经理（海外跨界合作）
responsibilities: 基于光子工作室群整体品牌策略和业务需求，进行海外合作伙伴的拓展； 发掘和维护各类营销类的重要合作伙伴资源； 协助品牌经理，进行标杆性品牌跨界营销合作案例的打造，推动整体品牌的全球影响力和美誉度提升。
qualifications: 本科以上学历，5年以上品牌或者商务领域工作经验； 具备国际化视野，对全球热门文化及消费品领域有广泛联系，有国际品牌跨界合作项目经验者优先； 英语水平优秀，具备出色的商务沟通能力，有海外留学及工作经验者优先。

title: 43454-修仙RPG手游商业化策划（上海）
responsibilities: 1、负责商业化内容的设计，规划产品商业化投放，把控整体商业化节奏，确保收入目标达成； 2、搭建商业化相关的数据分析框架，跟进系统数据，针对商业化系统进行优化，调整商业化策略； 3、能根据不同用户行为进行针对性的商业化活动设计，提升用户付费体验； 4、深度挖掘用户诉求，拓展游戏内商业化空间，持续进行精细化的深度商业化挖掘； 5、参与游戏内的经济体系的投放设计与落地。
qualifications: 1、本科或以上学历，3年及以上游戏行业运营经验及手游商业化和活动策划经验，有数值经验者优先； 2、对市面主流游戏特别是MMO类游戏的商业化思路&系统设计有深入理解和分析，有手游深度付费经验者优先； 3、熟悉市面主流修仙题材游戏及文学作品，对修仙文化有较深入理解者优先； 4、敏锐的数据洞察力、严谨的逻辑思维能力和系统的分析总结能力。

title: TZ-RA- Senior Analyst / Analyst_ads
responsibilities: -Independent sector / industry coverage, company research and market update -Design / led ad hoc research and projects in data analysis and summary to describe current and long-term trends in the sector -Assist in the preparation of investor relations materials
qualifications: -Genuine enthusiasm, curiosity about business nature and have a high level of integrity -6+ years equity / industry research experience; prior experience and strong understanding in advertising sector is a must -Strong interest and understanding in TMT sector and leading players -Excellent financial modeling, numerical, and writing skills; fluent in English and Chinese, both writing and speaking -Good team spirit and cross-team collaboration -Master in Economics, Mathematics, Engineering is preferred

title: Social & Community Manager - New Products UK & Nordics
responsibilities: - Support the global content strategy and adapt global programmes to the needs of your own markets. You will be responsible for driving community growth and engagement, ensuring varied and engaging content is at the heart of this growth. - Monitor trending content in the UK & Nordics, promptly respond to hot topics and trends in the current West Europe market, adjust strategy and produce pan-entertainment content accordingly. - Develop and own the influencer management strategy for each title, working alongside agency partners to implement and measure our programmes. - Directly responsible for outreach to and management of top tier influencers in the UK & Nordics, building and managing relationships with the influencers via on-going communication. - Develop and manage an overall plan and community KPIs. - Track and report the major issues and opportunities each game’s community in a timely manner. - Identify and deliver localised content opportunities based on locally relevant brands, holidays, festivals and general cultural preferences for UK & Nordic based player communities. - Identify and pursue localised brand partnership opportunities for Tencent titles. - Work with regional creative content agency to bring ideas and programmes to life. - Ensure local market consumer and business insights are integrated into day-to-day work. - Monitor social media updates from competing games and provide new content suggestions accordingly. - Create & host community events such as lucky draws and tournaments. - Develop and own the influencer management strategy for each title, working alongside agency partners to implement and measure our programmes.
qualifications: - Bachelor's degree and above. Excellent spoken and written English. - Good understanding of UK & Nordic market trends, you know the pop-culture / entertainment / internet market in UK & Nordics in order to build relevant, local content. - More than 3 years of content planning and operations experience for a digital entertainment brand, ideally in the video game sector. - Experience running branded campaigns on major content platforms, especially YouTube and TikTok. You will also be in charge of programme deployment on platforms like Discord and Twitch. - A real passion for the games industry with genuine interest and knowledge in the mobile games market and ideally a passion for competitive gaming. You will be the voice of our game to the players in your markets, so some experience of speaking at public events is required along with the ability to empathise with the varied needs of different player types. - Able to communicate and work closely with the Western European team, adapt to different time zones, be able to respond to team requests in a timely manner. - Organised and with very good project management skills. Able to prioritise effectively and be competent in handling multiple programmes across multiple markets. - High levels of initiative, energy, ownership and urgency. - Valid passport and ability to travel as required.

title: 27141-亚太区业务发展翻译（英语 / 日语 / 韩语）
responsibilities: 1. 协助VP和业务leader，进行对外沟通会议的现场 / 电话口译； 2. 根据公司的项目流程和质量标准，翻译及校对项目文件； 3. 承担一定的对外商务沟通职责。
qualifications: 1. 本科及以上学历，日韩英三项语言中至少两种以上语言的翻译专业出身，具备专业语言等级证书； 2. 至少五年以上的专职翻译经验，口笔译技能出色； 3. 热爱游戏行业，了解游戏相关文化背景、各类型游戏及术语者优先； 4. 有良好的跨文化沟通能力和团队合作精神，对待翻译工作认真负责、耐心细致； 5. 对文化差异敏感，有日韩或东南亚的留学 / 工作 / 生活经历者优先。

title: TB-投资组合管理经理
responsibilities: 1) 识别和发现一级市场退出机会 - 根据部门战略，梳理投资组合中适合一级市场退出的投资项目 - 通过内外部渠道确认项目的实际运营状况 - 根据不同项目的实际情况，设计最优的退出方案和路径 2) 协调内外部资源，实施得到批准的一级市场项目退出工作 - 协调和管理内外部资源，如内部法务部，外部律所等 - 解决退出实施中出现的问题，对退出方案和路径进行调整和优化 3) 对投资组合管理提出建议和方案 - 根据部门战略，从投资回报的角度对整体投资组合进行分析，提出框架性的管理建议和方案 - 推动方案的落地实施
qualifications: - 5年左右投后或一级市场退出经验，或与投资退出相关领域（如专注于做退出的律所）经验 - 具有很强的学习能力、分析问题解决问题的能力，以及很强的自我驱动力 - 有好奇心，愿意挑战自己，不断开拓新的领域 - 中英文流利，优秀的中英文书写能力，具备良好的沟通能力 - 重点高校本科以上学历

title: 31506-内容安全高级行销经理(深圳 / 北京 / 上海)
responsibilities: 1. 为腾讯云多行业的安全风控服务商业收入负责，支持一线商务经理、架构师达成商业化目标 2. 制定相关产品的市场战略及运营策略，为产品成功负责； 3. 协助各个团队贯彻执行产品生命周期管理，包括产品定价、需求管理、质量管理、交付管理等流程； 4. 负责对售前架构师的产品赋能，并协助标杆客户的项目落地及持续跟踪满意度。
qualifications: 1. 全日制本科及以上学历，至少5年以上内容安全（音视图文审核等）解决方案等工作经历；有产品行销经验尤佳； 2. 充分理解音视图文合规审核的风控策略及逻辑，对内容安全市场和相关公司有深入研究； 3. 具备出色的跨部门工作推动能力，以及协调和组织能力，能够完成大量需要横向推动的项目工作； 4. 出色的商业化能力和经验。

title: PR Comms Manager West Europe - New Products
responsibilities:  Formulate and implement winning regional PR & comms strategies for Tencent's IPs, creating brand relevant stories that generate awareness & excitement amongst consumers.  Collaborate with all relevant stake holder to shape regional comms strategies and develop actionable programs & tactics.  Lead & collaborate with regional PR agencies to design and implement original feature led angles / ideas throughout technology and lifestyle press.  Collaborate with external partner brands to create and implement regionally engaging programs aligned to strategic comms priorities on each title.  Work with agency partners to ensure effective campaign performance KPIs are calibrated and reported against throughout entire campaign lifecycle.  Allocate, track and report regional PR & Comms budgets across markets, agencies and other initiatives.  Monitor and evaluate campaign performance and ROI using a combination of reporting tools.  Identify best practice for comms within the video game industry (and broader digital entertainment sectors) and share across partner teams to help drive organisational learning and development.  Travel (as necessary) to London and other international locations as a representative of Tencent Games.
qualifications:  Bachelor degree or above.  c. 8+ years experience in consumer PR, of which a significant number must have been spent in a regional role.  Experience in video game marketing is essential, ideally with an understanding of F2P and GAAS models.  Solid social media experience leading both design and measurable execution across multiple platforms and territories.  Strong understanding of communities and how to build, engage and sustain them with a video game or another form of digital entertainment.  A strategic thinker with the ability to conceptualize broadly across various solutions, yet enjoy operating at a hands-on level.  Passionate, committed, self-starter with high levels of initiative, energy, ownership, urgency and a sincere willingness to learn from team members at all levels.  Strong influencing skills and the ability to effectively engage with a wide variety of stakeholders.  Able to work under pressure and find solutions to multiple and varying needs.  Passion for communications, creativity and innovation.  Versatile project manager able to drill down into detail and clearly think through project timelines & interdependencies.  Outstanding written and oral skills, to build productive relationships.  Proactive and approachable personality that thrives in a dynamic team environment.  Ambitious and tenacious in nature, able to work autonomously when required and maintain a great sense of humor.  Personal passion for video games.  Valid passport and ability to travel as required.

title: 43470-资深游戏UI设计师
responsibilities: 与内部资深专家共事，解决源源不断的技术难题，做行业最前沿的探索研究。 助力腾讯游戏合作伙伴UI品质优化，向合作伙伴提供专业的UI设计支持，包括项目研发和发行阶段的UI设计体验、质量把控、技术支持等； 远程专业指导或现场攻坚，可能存在不定时出差情况，助力合作伙伴UI设计质量提升； 协助推动合作伙伴美术开发标准和流程的制定和优化，助力合作伙伴人才培养
qualifications: 5年以上游戏UI从业经验,，少有1款上线游戏的完整UI设计经验，并经历过改进过程； 美术或相关专业毕业、具备优秀的设计表现能力。 具备独立设计制作符合项目美术风格的游戏界面、交互动画等的能力； 对交互设计有深刻的理解， 在设计定位、实施、总结模块都有丰富的经验; 具有较强的责任心、团队合作能力与沟通表达能力； 对游戏行业有热情，能够接受挑战，有较强的抗压能力； 应聘简历请务必附带作品 8、特别优秀者可酌情放宽

title: 43470-资深2D角色原画设计师
responsibilities: 与内部资深专家共事，解决源源不断的技术难题，做行业最前沿的探索研究。 助力腾讯游戏合作伙伴角色原画品质优化，向合作伙伴提供专业的2D角色原画设计支持，包括项目研发和发行阶段的美术原画整体风格设定、设计质量把控等； 远程专业指导或现场攻坚，可能存在不定时出差情况，助力合作伙伴2D美术角色原画质量提升； 协助推动合作伙伴美术开发标准和流程的制定和优化，助力合作伙伴人才培养。
qualifications: 5年以上游戏美术工作经验，有至少一个完整项目的研发经验，具备3A游戏开发经验者优先； 具有深厚的美术功底，较强的整体风格把控能力，较强的风格化创造能力； 熟悉目前流行的游戏美术风格，持续关注并了解业界动态； 能同时在多种艺术风格环境下工作，并且保证项目全程的正确艺术风格； 具有较强的责任心、团队合作能力与沟通表达能力； 对游戏行业有热情，能够接受挑战，有较强的抗压能力。 应聘简历请务必附带作品

title: Narrative intern
responsibilities: As a Narrative Intern at TENCENT, you will support the chief narrative designer and help coordinate between them and the core team. Part administrative assistant, part creative, you will support the vision established by the chief narrative designer and the directors by participating in the realization of the narrative goals of the game. In your coordinator aspect, you’ll be placed to have a unique view of the development of the project, and as a burgeoning creative, you’ll get tasks and direct support from the chief narrative designer. What you’ll do: Partner with the chief narrative designer to understand the overall game vision. Be a key link between HQ and the global narrative team. This means being available for critical meetings, taking excellent notes, and ensuring that all parties have a good understanding of what is needed and expected of them. Create and maintain narrative documentation. Brainstorm and research ideas and discuss your findings with collaborative teams. Work with other writers, designers, and artists to develop consistent content (plot, setting, characters, barks, dialogue, events, lore, item descriptions, menu text, tutorials, etc. ). Write, rewrite, proofread, polish (and repeat). Revise your work to reflect comments from interdependent teams and changes to gameplay. Help with marketing or community teams, on a case-by-case basis. Help new members navigate the team structure and production pipeline.
qualifications: Qualifications: Speak and write perfect English and Mandarin. A highly creative, collaborate, and innovative spirit. Curiosity, flexibility, and plenty of resourcefulness. Excellent organizational, communication, interpersonal, and presentation skills. Ability to adapt to feedback. A desire to work in games and learn how to tell the best story we can. What we need CV A variety of samples of your best work (attach files or send a link to a portfolio). Whatever else HR needs.

title: Game Animation Engineer
responsibilities: 1. Collaborate directly with modelers and animators to develop and support high fidelity character and animation pipeline and tools; 2. Develop and optimize real time animation engine on different game platforms including PC, Console, Mobile; 3. Develop, maintain, optimize tools and plug-in for 3D DCC tools such as 3DMax, Maya; 4. Collaborate with scientists, research and develop next generation animation technologies.
qualifications: 1. 3 years developing experience in animation, CG movie; 2. Deep knowledge of animation, physics and character-related systems from engine to game; 3. Experienced with developing real time skin animation and morph / blendshape animation; 4. Experienced with low level profiling, debugging and optimizing; 5. Knowledge of GPU programming is a plus; 6. Enjoy working closely with creative and technical team members; 7. Strong written and verbal communication skills.

title: Engine Programmer Intern
responsibilities: 1. Work closely with Senior engineer and scientists to research and develop game engine features. 2. Develop and optimize game features on multiple platforms such as PC, Console, mobile. 3. Develop and optimize tools and pipelines for game engine. Note: You are expected to regularly exercise discretion and independent judgement. Meanwhile, you are also fully responsible for the mentioned functions and free from immediate direction or supervision.
qualifications: 1. Proficient in C++, data structure and algorithm 2. Strong foundation in mathematics, such as Calculus, Linear Algebra, Geometry, Numerical Method 3. Good knowledge on key game concepts such as engine , 3D rendering, animation, physics, AI is a plus 4. Passion for making video games, have experience developing video games or 3D features is a plus 5. Familiarity with commercial game engine source codes such as Unreal, Unity is a plus 6. Possess a strong sense of responsibility and good communication skills

title: 49468-lead artist
responsibilities: 作为中台美术总监，⽀持第⼀⽅和第⼆⽅⼯作室，帮助⼯作室建⽴起质量标准体系、⽣产流程，并帮助项⽬找到有辨识度有现代感的⻛格和实现路径。 指导并深⼊参与⼯作室的美术设计和质量控制。 根据游戏的整体创意⽅向，定义、保持和推动项⽬的美术愿景。 推动美术创新并保持统⼀⻛格，制定美术⽣产标准。 在美术和技术限制之间找到平衡，引领优质美术资产的交付。 关注和随时了解游戏开发的美术技术、程序、游戏设计和美术⻛格的最新进展。 参与招聘，建⽴美术团队并促进他们成⻓。 负责整合美术资源，通过经验分享和技术交流解决质量问题，提⾼美术团队的整体⽣产能⼒和效率。 参与美术外包的质量控制。 负责⼯作室项⽬的美术评审。
qualifications: 1、10年以上游戏美术经验，PC / 主机优先。具备美术设计培训能⼒。 2、⾄少5年游戏⾏业美术指导经验，尤其是写实⻛格或卡通渲染⻛格。 3、完整参与过12款成功的AAA研发。熟悉Photoshop和3D软件（例如3DS Max）。 4、熟悉Photoshop和3D软件（例如3DS Max）。 5、优秀的美术判断⼒，能够准确判断各种美术资源的设计和制作质量。 6、熟悉多种游戏美术资源的各种游戏美术开发流程和制作⽅法。 7、具备美术设计培训能⼒。 8、中英⽂流利，具有良好的团队合作和沟通能⼒。 9、充满好奇⼼和创造⼒，乐于探索新想法并向他⼈学习。

title: Senior HR Manager - Japan
responsibilities: - Oversee all aspects of HR, focusing on localization efforts and ensuring a best in class employee life-cycle experience while overseeing aligning between HR strategy and overall business plans - Partners closely with country GM and HQ closely to roll out people initiatives, particularly Talent & Culture building and HR Compliance - Advise the leadership team on management issues and effectively implements new or improved programs, policies, and processes to mitigate risk; - Be the point of contact for all HR operational matters such as performance, conduct, capability, and provide the necessary support to ensure the issues are managed in line with company policy, best practice and current legislation - Advise employees on the company's HR policies, processes and procedures; - Handle Ad-hoc human resources projects.
qualifications: - Possess strong awareness of local market trends, best practices and to consistently share and improve on the company offering to help grow Tencent’s businesses and branding - Strong team player who is highly collaborative and portrays a customer obsessed mindset - Someone who enjoys growing the organization from 0 to 1 and is passionate about what they do - Able to understand local laws and regulations and to also adapt to international cultural nuances - Strong communication capabilities with not just in-country employees but HQ colleagues as well - Fluency in Japanese & English is a must; ability to communicate in Mandarin will be a strong advantage

title: Senior IT Engineer
responsibilities: - Collaborate with HR, Admin and Operations team to provide the best IT solutions and user experience for Tencent employees, as well as affiliate users. - Provide support, troubleshooting and resolve problems to meet end user ‘s satisfaction, including IT hardware, IT systems, business platforms and applications. - Participate in the implementation of global IT projects of Tencent Overseas IT, and can adapt to the local business need of Europe, and contribute to the output of European IT products and solutions. - Be the expert and first point of contact for a certain product and area of IT, such as cloud products, business systems or infrastructure. - Proactive attitude, able to accept the mission and execute it independently, strong sense of ownership - Can use scripting languages, support automated system deployment and operation & maintenance practices in Europe IT team. - Work with business department to coordinate important system maintenance, changes and IT requirements from business side. - Support R&D lab servers, including server installation, configuration and daily maintenance. - Align with continuous improvement program focused on business value, process optimization, cost avoidance, cost reductions and IT “Speed to Market. ” - Consolidate overseas IT knowledge documents in one place for overseas users’ self-help and regional peer support. - As a member, participate in local software development projects led by a software engineer, including develop, build and deploy applications for our internal and external users in Europe. - Other IT tasks arranged by the IT manager, including office IT construction, system deployment, changes and upgrades, etc.
qualifications: - Bachelor’s degree in Business (Management Information Systems), Computer Science, Business (Other) or equivalent. - 3+ years of working experience in providing technical IT system support to ensure smooth and effective delivery of IT services. - 3+ years of experience working with global IT teams and delivering towards global+local business / IT needs. - 1 + years of experience in software development and knowledge of development methodologies. - Experience with a variety of programming languages such as C, Java or python. - Strong knowledge of ITIL Service Management concepts and experience managing ITIL processes - Knowledge of collaborative productivity tools, for example, but not limited to, instant messaging, collaboration, workspace, knowledge management, issue resolution, ticketing is preferred. - Knowledge of IT compliance and global regulations in data security, cyber security, and privacy is preferred. - Experience with ServiceNow, Workday, Jamf, Faronics, Slack, WeCom is preferred. - Fluent in English, Chinese is preferred but not required, Other EU language skill is a plus

title: Senior Legal Counsel
responsibilities: - Provide advice on a wide range of legal and business matters in the areas of development, licensing, technology, operations, marketing, policy, governance, and publishing. - Draft and negotiate complex international licensing agreements, distribution agreements, professional services agreements, content development agreements, and other general commercial agreements. - Contribute to the development and continuous improvement of policies, forms, trainings, and processes to ensure operational efficiency and compliance with US, European, and other international laws and regulations. - Collaborate with external counsel and other Tencent attorneys based around the world, including in mainland China, Hong Kong, EU, and the US. - Develop creative solutions to support business needs while mitigating risk in a constantly evolving industry.
qualifications: - You have three or more years of experience working in a law firm or in-house legal department, providing services to video game, technology, entertainment, or similar clients. - You have strong academic credentials and are a member of a relevant Bar or other recognized legal association. - You are passionate about IP, content, and have broad experience with IP and corporate transactions work. - You enjoy supporting clients from project conception through live operations, in a dynamic environment. - You have excellent communication skills and can establish strong working relationships with business leads. - You can work independently to manage the entire contract process from initial contact through negotiation and execution. - You speak English (mandarin Chinese a plus). - You like video games.

title: Senior IT Engineer
responsibilities: - Collaborate with HR, Admin and Operations team to provide the best IT solutions and user experience for Tencent employees, as well as affiliate users. - Provide support, troubleshooting and resolve problems to meet end user ‘s satisfaction, including IT hardware, IT systems, business platforms and applications. - Participate in the implementation of global IT projects of Tencent Overseas IT, and can adapt to the local business need of Europe, and contribute to the output of European IT products and solutions. - Be the expert and first point of contact for a certain product and area of IT, such as cloud products, business systems or infrastructure. - Proactive attitude, able to accept the mission and execute it independently, strong sense of ownership - Can use scripting languages, support automated system deployment and operation & maintenance practices in Europe IT team. - Work with business department to coordinate important system maintenance, changes and IT requirements from business side. - Support R&D lab servers, including server installation, configuration and daily maintenance. - Align with continuous improvement program focused on business value, process optimization, cost avoidance, cost reductions and IT “Speed to Market. ” - Consolidate overseas IT knowledge documents in one place for overseas users’ self-help and regional peer support. - As a member, participate in local software development projects led by a software engineer, including develop, build and deploy applications for our internal and external users in Europe. - Other IT tasks arranged by the IT manager, including office IT construction, system deployment, changes and upgrades, etc.
qualifications: - Bachelor’s degree in Business (Management Information Systems), Computer Science, Business (Other) or equivalent. - 3+ years of working experience in providing technical IT system support to ensure smooth and effective delivery of IT services. - 3+ years of experience working with global IT teams and delivering towards global+local business / IT needs. - 1 + years of experience in software development and knowledge of development methodologies. - Experience with a variety of programming languages such as C, Java or python. - Strong knowledge of ITIL Service Management concepts and experience managing ITIL processes - Knowledge of collaborative productivity tools, for example, but not limited to, instant messaging, collaboration, workspace, knowledge management, issue resolution, ticketing is preferred. - Knowledge of IT compliance and global regulations in data security, cyber security, and privacy is preferred. - Experience with ServiceNow, Workday, Jamf, Faronics, Slack, WeCom is preferred. - Fluent in English, Chinese is preferred but not required, Other EU language skill is a plus

title: Timi F1 Montreal- Senior Human Resources Business Partner
responsibilities: Join us in our ambitious endeavor of building gaming studios for TiMi North America. Our teams are passionate about creating compelling worlds for players to explore for years to come. The people team is committed to providing a stellar employee experience and driving talent, so our teams are set up to do their best work! You will proactively work with leaders to understand their business goals and challenges. You will be collaborating with the CEO functions to help localize our people practices for North America and deliver people-centered initiatives that positively impact the business and the employee experience. TiMi Montreal is a new studio within TiMi Studio Group, a subsidiary of Tencent Games. What's in it for you? You will be highly involved in building the TiMi North-America people infrastructure while being the main HRBP for the Montreal studio. You will be participating in scaling TiMi studios. You will help set the tone for incredible employee experience and drive a healthy and high-performing culture that will allow us to attract and retain the best talent in the gaming industry. What will you do? - Coaching and guidance: Partner with managers and leaders to understand the business needs, provide business-acumen insights and direction on employment-related matters, and improve employee and team capabilities. - People Program Leadership & Delivery: Support talent programs across client groups, including engagement, talent management, goals setting, performance review, training and change initiative to support the broader talent strategy. - Collaboration: Build relationships with internal partners, including business leaders and the HR team, to provide simple and effective programs and people practices for TiMi studio. - Culture: Actively drive and work with managers, employees, and centers of excellence to help foster a healthy, collaborative, fun, and equitable workplace. - Continuous improvement and localization: proactively identify opportunities to improve the employee lifecycle and partner with management and CEO to develop and implement efficient and sustainable solutions to support the growth of TiMi N-A. - Project: Participate in cross-team projects with the N-A global HR team and get involved in the DEI council. - People operations and compliance: support daily HR operations and Quebec-specific compliance in partnership with the Canadian people team.
qualifications: What we're we looking for? We are looking for someone who is highly effective at communicating with a variety of people who thrives in a fast-paced environment, and is used to thinking creatively and paying attention to the employee experience. Most importantly, we need someone who can drive, execute, and resolve problems creatively and grow continuously by their learning mindset. - Bachelor's degree in a relevant field combined with 5 years + of progressive experience as an HR partner. - HR expertise; with demonstrated experience in overall talent management. - Change management skills - you can work through complex challenges with business and employee needs in mind. - Outstanding program delivery experience by delivering talent programs across the business with high quality. - Experience using data and data-driven insights to support the business by offering appropriate solutions. - Experience with local employment law. - Passion for creating healthy organizations and helping culture be a competitive advantage - Sense of urgency, constant and excellent communication and self-starter, attention to detail, and accuracy. - Ability to navigate ambiguous situations with outstanding judgment, while balancing the employee experience and the business goals. - French and English speakers.

title: Senior Business Analysis Manager
responsibilities: - Keep a close eye on latest gaming industry trends, including technological advancement, emerging IPs and gameplay innovation - Build insights for market development and competitive landscape to support impact evaluation and opportunity identification - Perform market entry analysis based on market trends and consumer insights, develop Go-to-Market strategy
qualifications: - Bachelor's Degree or above, MBA or masters with multi-disciplinary background is preferred - Fluency in Spanish / Portuguese and English are required, familiarity with other Latin American languages or Mandarin is highly preferred. - Ability to gain deep and accurate understanding of gaming industry quickly - Strong analytical skill, highly sensitive to data, proficient in Excel, SQL / tableau experience is preferred - Exceptional communication skill, great team player - Highly self-motivated

title: Legal Counsel (Employment & Labour Law)
responsibilities: Responsibilities - Join a growing legal team based in the Netherlands to support the Company’s expansion in Europe - Advise on compliance across all aspects of general corporate laws and payments laws and regulations, including license requirements, in Europe - Manage outside counsel for projects - Draft, review, negotiate and administer legal and commercial documentations - Keep the business teams abreast of all new relevant laws and regulations that may have implications for the Company
qualifications: Requirements - Qualified lawyer with at least 3 years PQE, admitted to practice in (at least one) European jurisdiction - Must have experience in dealing with issues relating to at least several of the following relevant areas: Employment laws, Fintech matters in Europe (e. g. PSD2 / EMI / Banking licenses), telecommunication (cloud) matters, corporate law matters, general commercial contracting - Experience dealing with relevant regulators / authorities preferred - Interest in Fintech - Team player and can handle projects independently - Excellent problem solving, analytical and organizational skills - Proactive approach and able to handle matters independently - Sound interpersonal and communication skills Excellent written and spoken English, ability to communicate effectively in Mandarin or other European languages are a plus.

title: 日本手游商业化运营 - Intern
responsibilities: 岗位职责： 1、负责卡牌手游的商业化运营规划制定，把控整体商业化节奏； 2、通过运营数据发现问题，针对现状，设计针对不同用户的商业化活动，并跟进活动效果，对活动形式进行持续优化总结； 3、清晰用户需求，拓展游戏内商业化内容，合理利用游戏资源，策划商业化活动，总结沉淀不同用户特性。
qualifications: 岗位要求 ： 1、对游戏策划工作有兴趣（有卡牌商业化运营经验者优先）； 2、对数据敏感，了解用户需求，有敏锐的洞察力和快速学习能力（有海外游戏实习经历优先）； 3、有良好的团队沟通和执行能力，有较强的总结归纳能力，能撰写各类文档； 4、热爱游戏，进取心强，有强烈的责任感。

title: Business Development Manager - PUBGM
responsibilities: Drive partnership planning and management including developing comprehensive partnership strategy for products that expand the brand image and reinforce key messaging that reinforces the overall vision Analyze local market and identify new partnership opportunities with key partners in key business development areas including gaming Develop market research and main competitor analysis reports to better support partnership management decision-making Manage all partnership activity and provide insightful analysis and guidance that result in identifying business growth opportunities Support day to day operations for the marketing approval process for all partnerships Drive weekly syncs between marketing, product development, and legal to achieve strategic objectives and future planning Manage, guide, and mentor direct reports and assist with career and skills development
qualifications: At least 3+ years of Business Development experience preferably on high-profile brands Ability to build and maintain relationships with major Mexico / LATAM partners and familiarity working with game developers Self-motivated, detailed oriented, independent, organized, and proactive; highly responsive, flexible, and adaptable when working across multiple business units and product teams Great teammate with strong collaboration skills who is comfortable with open and consistent communication Excellent communication, presentation, organizational and writing skills Meticulous level of detail and proficiency in using business analysis tools Knowledge and / or experience in interactive entertainment industries Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and deal with ambiguity Experience in managing brand partnership agencies is a plus Avid gamer with extended experience in console and mobile products a plus

title: Senior Business Development Manager
responsibilities: 1. According to the company's business development needs, tap various local cooperation resources in Brazil and explore new business directions; 2. Responsible for business negotiation, cooperation docking, contract signing, and relationship maintenance for local Brazilian partners; 3. Relationship maintenance and support of game application channels such as application stores; 4. Other supporting work.
qualifications: 1. Bachelor degree or above, more than 5 years of relevant work experience in the game industry or business, more than 1 year of management experience,; 2. Good oral and written English skills, with past travel / work experience in Europe and / or America is preferred; 3. Integrity, excellent communication skills, fast learning ability, efficient execution, strong ability to withstand pressure; 4. Have basic data analysis skills, business thinking and proficient office skills; 5. Good teamwork spirit; 6. Love the game industry.

title: Senior Marketing Manager - PUBGM
responsibilities: - Drive the media strategy and execute PR campaigns including frequent media alert push. - Develop or social channels growth in term both of follower & engagement. Manage local agency and / or KOL. - Establish the community strategy and set-up action plan to deploy our ambassador program in LATAM. - Work with UA HQ team to encourage campaign in LATAM and execute specific campaign when it comes to local only UA networks. - Spread local vision's achievements across internal channel of the group. - ROI oriented, manage the MKT budget and track / analyses of each campaigns.
qualifications: - At least 3-5 years working experience in game publishing / marketing, with overseas mobile game promotion experience is preferred - Proficient in game marketing, excellent marketing awareness and creative planning ability, clear thinking and presentation skill - Strong pioneering spirit, strong communication and resource integration ability, able to integrate internal and external platform and partner resources, establish and maintain good cooperation relationship - Good team communication and execution ability, strong summarization ability, able to write various documents - Love games, serious and responsible attitude, good learning ability, strong anti-stress ability and strong sense of teamwork - Native Spanish speaker with excellent English skills as a working language; Chinese is preferred A minimum of 5 years in operational marketing, must know how to run and execute campaign. and have a 360 vision of a marketing plan. Requirements: - Capacity to manage a team and develop Tencent expertise on this market. -Ideal candidate has proven leadership skills to create strong internal / external relationships, while being a global team player. - Excellent communication and presentation skills in English and / or Mandarin. Ability to articulate a vision, strategy or idea clearly with a strong capacity of syntax, learning, sharing with HQ. - Strong team player, behaves like an owner, and ultimately focused on delivering results with high standards. Set out the overall high performing team culture for the marketing team - Self-management skills and self-started attitude highly valued. Bonus - Passion for game, FPS / TPS gamer - Worked with global company before - Chinese fluency preferred

title: Data Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Responsibilities - Work with cross-functional teams and understand how data platform are developed and maintained at scale. - Build scalable data pipelines (using Spark, Airflow and Presto) to move data from different applications into our data warehouse. - Monitor and improve automated solutions to ensure quality and performance SLAs are met. - Maintain and support existing platforms and evolve to newer technology stacks and architectures.
qualifications: Qualifications - Currently pursuing a Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Data Engineering, or a related field. - Coding & scripting proficiency in languages such as Python, C++, Golang. - SQL knowledge in handling volumes of data and performance. Bonus - Passion in gaming. - Scratch-build a highly scalable, available, fault-tolerant data processing systems using cloud technologies, HDFS, YARN, Map-Reduce, Hive, Kafka, Spark, and other big data technologies.

title: Senior Cybersecurity Engineer
responsibilities: Tencent Overseas IT has the mission to empower Tencent’s rapid global growth with future ready, global IT platforms, applications, and services. We are chartered to lead the Overseas IT strategy, architecture, roadmap, and execution. Satisfying our internal / external customers and becoming a world class global IT team are our top aspirations. Compliance and Security of Overseas IT focus on building a secured and compliant infrastructure to provide our game studios. Our team will partner with Cloud Center of Excellence, Cybersecurity Legal, Privacy office and different Business Group to deliver the best cloud and on-premises solution. We are seeking a Senior cybersecurity Engineer to design and implement Security vulnerability program for our Game Studio, making sure our infrastructures are secure and compliant.
qualifications: This role will work closely with our internal IT and Tencent cloud product teams, as well as our game studios to build the best Cybersecurity program. This role will be responsible of running vulnerability and penetration tests, build automated security control, conduct security assessment, and provide guidance on how to secure game studio’s on-prem and cloud systems. The scope includes enable game studio to be compliant with local regulation by implementing appropriate security and privacy controls. In addition, collaborate with different stakeholder to create a clear Cybersecurity standard, guideline, and documentation to be replicated in future implementation.

title: KOL Manager, League of Legends: Wild Rift
responsibilities: Job Description: Tencent Games Indonesia is looking for a KOL Manager to join the League of Legends: Wild Rift team. We are looking for someone who is: passionate about the game, especially Mobile Games in general, can articulate the brand’s objectives through high-quality collaborations and partnerships with KOLs / Influencers, seeks out opportunities to learn / grow / innovate, understands the value of process, and maintains a high level of attention to detail. We are looking for a forward thinker that has a strong willingness to grow the League of Legends: Wild Rift community, is strong in understanding trend, deep understanding of the game itself, and an extraordinary thinking about the content composition. This role will dive into the established brand identity and will be handling successful implementation of KOL collaborations. The ideal candidate will be comfortable in all aspects of handling communication with all potential KOLs / Influencers, engage directly with them, and good in achieving objectives in terms of quality and standards in remarkably quick time frames. Your Mission: This role delivers high-quality partnerships with KOLs, able to engage with our community about our products and brand campaigns through the collaboration, and can maintain them to keep updated. This is an opportunity for a talented, hardworking, and proactive individual to grow and develop in a fast-paced environment while contributing to a wide range of exciting franchises. Responsibilities: 1. Establish & maintain relationship with KOL & Influencer make a feedback and review report. 2. Executing marketing project and campaign promotion. 3. Create & curate social promotion content ideas for KOL and campaign promotion. 4. Maintain cooperation with existing KOL & Influencer partners. 5. Finding new leads in regards to KOL partnership opportunities
qualifications: Requirements: 1. More than 2 years experience ideally in similar roles. 2. Deep understanding about gaming industry and its community. 3. Highly collaborative and good at multitasking. 4. Comfortable with the fast-paced working style, organized, dedicated with ability to plan and deliver on tight deadlines and pay outstanding attention to detail. 5. Excellent communication and writing in both English and Bahasa Indonesia (Mandarin speaker is a plus). 6. Last but not least, Hardcore Game Enthusiast. Plus: - Have experience in the Game Industry and have been working with Gaming KOLs / Influencers. - Deep understand of League of Legends: Wild Rift or other MOBA games.

title: Marketing Manager - Creative Ads
responsibilities: - Pair with Tencent’s internal creative teams and 3rd party agencies to ideate campaign concepts and plans - Plug into the process to create visionary copy and content guidelines for seasonal campaigns and evergreen ads - Lead copywriters and freelancers to create compelling and successful content experiences to drive sales - Write and edit scripts, ads, landing pages, banner copy, contests, and more - Ideate on testing plans to help us create better, more impactful content for local gamer audience - Understand and translate Tencent’s brand and style guidelines into content
qualifications: - 4+ years experience as a content strategist for large, multi-platform campaigns - Experience working with designers and creative teams to create copy plans and guidelines to a larger brand vision - Experience managing and coaching copywriters and freelancers to complete professional copy experiences across multiple platforms (video, static ads, landing pages, etc. - Strong writing and storytelling foundation – ability to conceive and execute fresh ideas that will educate and delight audiences. - Has experience working independently and managing projects with many moving parts. Bonus - Passion for game, FPS / TPS gamer - Worked with global company before - Chinese fluency preferred

title: Senior Game Audio Programmer
responsibilities: 1. Responsible for participating in game audio integration, problem analysis, and solution. 2. Co-ordinating with the game audio designer and share responsibility for audio design and development. 3. Responsible for functional development and performance optimization of game audio middleware. 4. Frontier technology of game audio research and development.
qualifications: 1. Major in signal, multimedia technology, music, computer science, or other computer related field. Familiarity with C / C++ development. Having the capability of good coding habits and rich experience of programming. Preferably with experience in mobile or console game development. 2. Mastering the game audio interface, familiar with common audio function modules, familiar with the mechanism of any of third-party audio middleware, such as FMOD / Wwise / Criware. Have the capability of analyzing and solving problems quickly. 3. Familiar with the common designing methods of game sound effects and music, and mastered the use of game audio middleware. Preferably with the capability of game audio sound designing and familiarity with the usage and mechanism of DAW. 4. Familiar with game engines such as Unity and Unreal or any other internal game engine. Have knowledge of the game development process. Mastering the method and integration mode of game audio, and having the experience and ability of game plug-in development. 5. Having a basic knowledge of digital signal analysis, familiar with Matlab / Python and other scripting languages. Familiar with the framework of common audio signal analysis and processing methods. Preferably with experience in related audio effector implementation. 6. Better to have knowledge of PD, MAX / MSP, FAUST, and other graphics audio programming languages, having the capability to quickly conduct audio synthesis and prototype design of audio effect. 7. Better to have knowledge of the mechanism of spatial acoustics technology, have the capability of spatial acoustics technology application and algorithm design, preferably with relevant development experience. 8. Better to have knowledge of basic music theory, have certain musical literacy, familiar with the related synthesis technology of music or musical instruments is preferred. 9. Strong teamwork ability, learning ability, and team spirit.

title: 【ゲーム事業】ビジネスデベロップメントマネージャー
responsibilities: 【職務内容】 １．日本市場におけるビジネスリソース開拓（異業種コラボ、IP提携、メディアなど）、事業に取り組む上での最適なパートナーシップ構築。 ２．社内マーケティングチームを連携し、社外関係者及びパートナーのコミュニケーション・信頼関係構築・折衝。円滑に業務を進めるためのコミュニケーション力。 ３．パートナーとの長期視点での関係構築
qualifications: 【求めている人材・必須条件】 ■大学卒（専攻不問） ■ゲーム業界、インタネット業界及び広告代理店でビジネスデベロップメント（BD）の実務経験者 ※想定3年以上 ■関連業界（版元、メディア、代理店など）のリソースを有する方を優先 ■ビジネスに向かう鋭さ、高いコミュニケーション力を持ち、チームワーク重視の方。 ■日本ビジネスに対する理解、パートナーシップの構築に経験を持つ方。

title: Senior Business Intelligence Manager - West EU Platform Support
responsibilities: Build the BI framework to track key regional trends within pc, console and mobile games markets throughout the W. EU region. Frequent collaboration with product teams at both strategic and operational levels, ensuring insights are integrated into day-to-day decision making. Support various ad hoc research and insights requests around the regional organisation as needed. Lead our regional relationship with a variety of data providers including Sensor Tower, New Zoo, App Annie, M Science and NPD. Co-ordinate with Tencent’s HQ team in Shenzhen as well as the BI leads in other regions to deliver the most effective frameworks, tools and insights to the organisation. Prepare and present regional insights and trends to the Western European organisation on a quarterly basis. Close collaboration with regional forecasting lead to ensure forecast scenarios are built using clear and appropriate market data. On a twice annual basis, prepare and present regional market insights, trends and forecasts to Tencent owned & part-owned studios developing PC & console games. Identify new tools, systems and insight techniques to continually evolve our organisational capabilities and drive the business. Be an ambassador for Tencent games when dealing with external organisations. Travel (as necessary) to international locations as a representative of Tencent Games.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree or above in a field applicable to the role. Excellent English language skills. >5 years of experience working in a Business Intelligence function for a major brand or organisation, ideally in the digital entertainment sector. Experience developing and reporting insights in a region / multiple markets. Ability to present clearly & effectively at senior management level as well as in smaller team settings. Excellent relationship builder who quickly builds trust through active listening and by consistently delivering on his / her commitments. Strong influencing skills and a proven ability to use build consensus within cross functional teams. Natural drive to ensure insights are put into action across the business by team members and not just presented then forgotten. Passionate, committed, self-starter with high levels of initiative, energy and ownership. Proactive and approachable personality that thrives in a dynamic team environment. Ambitious and tenacious in nature, able to work autonomously when required and maintain a great sense of humor. Personal passion for video games and digital entertainment. Valid passport and ability to travel as required.

title: Compensation & Benefits Manager
responsibilities: Compensation & Benefits - Setting and review of compensation policies, guidance for South East Asia countries, running discussion points with HQ as well as external benchmarking exercises to ensure our compensation principles have relevance and are competitive in the market; - Review of benefits for the South East Asia region, coming up with localized programs targeting employee life milestones, mental health, insurance and annual leaves while ensuring there is fundamental alignment across the region; - Plan and administer benefits programs for all types of employees including enrolments and terminations; - Serve as an expert on all C&B related matters and act as the point of contact for any queries; - Partner with country HR and legal teams to keep abreast of legislative changes to ensure compliance between Tencent’s offering and with local regulations; Payroll - Responsible for the end to end payroll processes across South East Asia, including processing payroll for all types of employees, data accuracy, process control improvements and ensuring to meet the agreed SLAs - Implement and maintain payroll best practices to improve efficiency and consult with human resources team to improve payroll processes; - Works collaboratively with HQ global payroll team and payroll vendor to prepare payroll reports and required data; - Evaluate and implement payroll systems upgrades and changes; - Fulfill all governmental regulatory mandates (monthly contributions and yearly tax filling, etc); - Q&A with employees Ad-hoc - Participating the HR budget planning every year; - Participate in ad-hoc tasks and a diverse variety of HR projects or initiatives if needed;

qualifications: At least 6 years of professional AAA game development experience At least 1 AAA open world titles shipped, during the current generation of video games (PS4 / XBOX ONE) Experience optimizing a game network layer with code and by adjusting features to better fit networking limitations Knowledgeable about replication strategies and techniques Knowledgeable about client side prediction, accurate hit registration and strategies to mitigate poor latency and network conditions in multiplayer games Proficiency with C, C++ Excellent debugging and optimizing skills Ability to quickly prototype and iterate in collaboration with others Self-directed, taking initiative to drive progress Strong communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills Experience developing and sustaining live games and services What is in it for you? title: (Senior) Market & User Research Manager

qualifications: Basic and Preferred Qualifications / What we are looking for: - 5+ years experience in market research; Conversant with various methods including but not limited to qualitative & quantitative research, as well as third-party market database; Capable of conducting research independently. - Expertise in hosting focus group discussions & data analysis. Capable of smoothly communicating with the local people. - Work experience at a video game company or a market research firm is a bonus point. - Proficiency in Japanese is required. Capability of reading and writing English is also required. Competence in Chinese is desired. - Undergraduate or graduate degree in psychology, sociology, marketing, economics, international business, or related field. - Advanced Microsoft Office Software skills, and familiar with data analytics tools such SPSS, SAS, and Tableau. - Strong communication skills. Motivated, team-minded, self-disciplined, and capable of taking on challenges.
